loans.name: Violeta Rosa

texts.es:
Violeta Rosa tiene 37 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con sus hijos en una zona rural de la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como cuyes, pollos, gallinas, patos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 05 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como gallinas, patos, pavos, pollos, entre otros, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto Violeta Rosa espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Violeta Rosa, 37, is a single mother and lives with her children in a rural area of the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru. The inhabitants of this district mainly work in agriculture, livestock and trade.

She raises and sells small animals such as guinea pigs, chickens, hens, and ducks, among others. Her business is located in her home. She has five years of experience in this business and has very good personal and work references in the area. She will use this loan to buy a larger quantity of animals such as hens, ducks, turkeys, chickens, and others. She will also buy balanced feed for the animals. With this loan, Violeta Rosa hopes to offer a better product to her clients, which will allow her to earn a higher income and improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of animals, such as hens, ducks, turkeys, and chickens, as well as animal feed.

loans.name: Husam

texts.en:
Husam is a 32-year-old married man from Gaza city. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a very low income. This income is barely cover all the family needs.

Husam took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family home. By taking this loan, Husam will be able to reduce the electricity use.

Husam appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family home.

loans.name: Ammar

texts.en:
Ammar is a 39-year-old married man from Gaza city. He lives with his wife and kids in a simple house. Ammar works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a very low income. This income is barely cover all the family needs.

Ammar took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family home. By taking this loan, Ammar will be able to reduce the electricity use.

Ammar appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family home.

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es:
Lorenzo tiene 49 años de edad, es soltero, vive con su familia en el distrito de Santa Cruz que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila, sus pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica a brindar los servicios de carpintería elaborando camas, mesas, sillas, entre otros productos, contando con herramientas propias de trabajo, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con más de 4 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. Solicita préstamo para la compra de más madera y una maquina de cortar para implementar su negocio, con esto Lorenzo espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que tendrá un gran impacto en su nivel de ventas y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Lorenzo is 49 years old, is single and lives with his family in the district of Santa Cruz  located in the province of Cutervo, region of Cajamarca in the northern sierra of Peru.  Life in the community is calm with most of the population working on agriculture, cattle raising, and commerce.
He works as a carpenter making beds, tables, chairs, and other products.  He has his own tools and works out of his house.  He has nore than 4 years of experience in the business and has very good personal and working references in his district.
He's requesting the loan to buy more wood and a wood cutting machine for his business.  He will thus be able to provide a better service to his clients which will increase his sales and improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: buy wood and a wood cutting machine for his business.

loans.name: Maria Jose

texts.es:
María José confiesa ser amante de los números,  desde que estaba en el colegio mientras sus compañeros lloraban con las ecuaciones matemáticas ella las disfrutaba, incluso,  las hacía más por hobbies que por responsabilidad. Por eso, cuando tuvo que decidir qué carrera universitaria estudiar, no titubeo al escoger contabilidad pública y finanzas. 

Actualmente trabaja y estudia, para sopesar los gastos universitarios. Sin embargo, solicita el crédito para pagar su titulación, pues está por recibirse de la universidad. María José espera ser egresada lo más  rápido posible, para trabajar en su área de estudio, pues aún no labora en ella. También, quiere continuar fortaleciendo su educación con más estudios.
texts.en:
María José is a self professed lover of numbers.  Since she was in school she's enjoyed math while her classmates complained about it, although she did it more as a hobby.  That's why when she had to choose a college degree she decided to study public accounting and finances. 
Currently she works while attending college to be able to cover the university expenses.  She's requesting the loan to pay for her university fees.  She hopes to graduate as soon as possible so she can start working in her field since she hasn't been working in it yet.  She also wants to keep strengthening her education with additional studies.

loans.use: pay for her college fees.

loans.name: Maria Vicenta

texts.es:
María, de 41 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, es madre soltera de tres hijos.

María, actualmente se dedica a la venta de verduras, gaseosas, golosinas, entre otros productos.- También, vende pupusas desde hace 14 años los fines de semana, para salir a comprar al mercado del cantón tiene que caminar una distancia de 30 minutos.- Sus dos hijos mayores le ayudan a ella a trabajar en los negocios familiares, para salir de los compromisos del hogar.

Ella, necesita el crédito para comprar tomates, aguacates, maiz, arroz, frijoles, entre otros productos para su negocio; ella tambien, comprará un chimbo de gas, porque no le ajusta el que tiene y le queda largo para ir acomprarlo, ella con este credito mejorara la calidad de vida de su familia, porque tendrá mejores ganacias y más oportunidades para sus hijos.

María, sueña con tener una casa digna para ella y sus hijos, además sueña con tener una tienda grande, para obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
María, 41, studied up until the fourth grade. She is a single mother with three children. She currently makes a living selling vegetables, soft drinks, snacks, and other products. She has also sold groceries for 14 years on the weekends. To buy products at the market in her canton, she has to walk for 30 minutes. Her two oldest children help her with the family businesses in order to leave their household commitments.

She needs this loan to buy tomatoes, avocados, corn, rice, beans, and other products for her business. She will also buy a gas container because the one she has does not adjust and it is a long way for her to go buy it. With this loan, she will improve her family's quality of life because she will have a higher income and more opportunities for her children.

María dreams of having a decent house for herself and her children. She also dreams of having a big store to earn a better income.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, avocados, corn, rice, beans, and other products for her business.

loans.name: Orquidea Del Carmen

texts.es:
Orquidea, de 25 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, está acompañada, vive con su hijo y su compañero de vida trabaja de contador en una oficina contable.

Orquidea, tiene 5 años de tener una tienda de productos de la canasta básica en su casa; lo inicio porque en la zona donde ella no hay tiendas cerca y la gente tiene que ir hasta el pueblo, para hacer sus compras.- Además, trabaja en una tienda de articulos deportivos desde hace 5años, cuando se traslada de su casa hacía su trabajo, viaja en pick up ya que tiene que recorrer 15 kilómetros y en su tienda solo vende por la tarde, cuando llega de trabajar y durante el día la atiende su madre.

El prestamo será utilizado para comprar más productos para su tienda y así tener mayores ingresos.

Orquidea sueña con comprar un pequeño lote y contruir una casita, porque actualmente vive en casa de su madre.
texts.en:
Orquidea is 25 years old, has a bachelor's degree, and lives with her son and her life partner who works as an accountant.  Orquidea has had a store for 5 years selling basic need products in her house.  She started it because in her area there are no stores close by and people have to walk to town to do their shopping.  Additionally, she's also been working at a sports store for the last 5 years.  She travels by pick up to work since it's 15 kilometers away so she only works in her store in the afternoons.  During the day her mother tends to the store.  
The loan will be used to buy more products for her store so she can have a better income.  Orquidea dreams with buying a small plot of land to build a house because she still lives with her mother.

loans.use: buy more products for her store.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
The person in the photo is Gladys, a member of Mukeu Unity Women Group. She is thirty one years old and a mother of two children who attend school.

Gladys is a vegetable farmer and also operates a shop. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa to learn more about business development, record keeping, and financial management.

She is taking a loan to help boost her farming by buying certified seeds and adding more stock for her store such as washing detergents and food. She looks forward to improving her businesses to cater for her family's basic needs.

Gladys is grateful to Kiva and their lenders for the help and support.

loans.use: to buy more stock including washing detergent, food for the shop, and farming seeds.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water and a tank for the family home.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is 35 years old and married with three children. With one child in school, Emma works very hard to provide for them.

Emma runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell like canned goods, beverages, eggs, groceries, etc..

Emma has been in this business for 6 years and sells a variety of items such as soap powder, shampoo, candies, coffee, junk foods, biscuits, and fabric conditioner.

In the future, Emma would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like canned goods, beverages, eggs, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water and a tank for the family home.

loans.name: Malak

texts.en:
Malak is a 26-year-old married woman from Jenin City. She lives with her husband and a son in a simple house. Malak's husband works as a taxi driver where he gets a low and unstable income. This income barely covers all the family needs.

Malak took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a solar system for heating water and a tank for the family home. By taking this loan, Malak will be able to reduce the electricity use.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water and a tank for the family home.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica ,49 years old, is married and has four children, one of whom is in school.

Veronica is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Veronica has been in this business for three years now, and she has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Veronica requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

In the future, Veronica would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda is 36 years old, married, and has three children, two of whom are in school, Yolanda works very hard to provide for them.

Yolanda runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as eggs, beverages, peanuts, candies, snack foods and other groceries. 

Yolanda requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like eggs, canned goods, beverages, groceries, etc.

In the future, Yolanda would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like eggs, canned goods, beverages, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Ma. Teresa

texts.en:
Ma. Teresa, 49, has nine children, five of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Ma. Teresa has a food-vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years.

Ma. Teresa requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food-production business.

In the future, Ma. Teresa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Mylene

texts.en:
Mylene, 39, is a married woman with five children, three of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Mylene has a food-vending business in the Philippines. Mylene has been in this business for 10 years.

Mylene requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food-production business. In the future, Mylene would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food-production business.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma, 51, is a married woman with two children who are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Norma has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for one year. 

Norma requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

In the future, Norma would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is 49 years old, married, and has four children, two of whom are in school.

Sarah is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. Sarah has been farming for six years now and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Sarah requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

In the future, Sarah would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a married woman with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Susan is 44 years old and has four children who are in school.

Susan has a gasoline retailing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for one year.

Susan requested a PHP 7,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional stock of gasoline to sell. 

In the future, Susan would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of gasoline to sell.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 53 years old and married. She has ten children, two of whom are in school, Teresita works very hard to provide for them.

Teresita runs a general store in the Philippines. Teresita has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as beverages, canned goods, soap, candles, slippers, rice, and other groceries.
 
Teresita requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, rice, beverages, groceries, etc.

In the future, Teresita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, rice, beverages, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy wax pagnes [bright, colorful fabric]

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy root vegetables

loans.name: Maria Elsenora

texts.es: Maria, de 35 años de edad, es casada, estudió hasta sexto grado, debido a que sus padres eran de muy bajos recursos económicos se les hizo difícil seguirle apoyando en sus estudios. Tiene dos hijos los cuales estudian y al salir de sus actividades escolares se involucran en el campo junto a su padre viviendo únicamente ellos cuatro en su vivienda. Maria, trabaja la agricultura desde hace veinte años su padre fue quien le enseñó este trabajo al igual que la siembra y cultivo de piña y plátano debido al excelente rendimiento económico que este tiene en el mercado al momento de su venta. Maria tuvo mucho interés en este rubro al salir de la escuela esforzándose por aprender ya que pensó en que sería su fuente de ingreso en un futuro y así fue. Su cultivo de café está ubicado muy cerca de su casa de habitacion siendo esta una gran ventaja para poder estar al tanto de sus cultivos. Ella solicita un préstamo el cual será utilizado para comprar formula cafetalera, fertilizante 12-24-12, nitrato de amonio, urea al 46%, insecticidas entre otros insumos que serán utilizados y muy bien aprovechados para el mantenimiento de sus cultivos de café. El anhelo de Maria, es sacar adelante a sus dos hijos y que tenga las oportunidades académicas que ella no tuvo. Así mismo, que la cosecha de los resultados esperados, ya que con la ganancia espera re invertir en la ampliación de su propiedad.
texts.en:
Maria is 35 years old, married, and studied until 6th grade because her parents didn't have the economic resources to support her in her studies.  She has 2 sons which go to school and work the fields with their father after they get out of school. All 4 of them live together.  
Maria has been working in agriculture for 20 years.  Her father taught her how to grow coffee as well as pineapple and plantains due to the excellent yield and economic benefits of these crops in the market.  
Maria was very interested in learning this kind of work when she had to leave school and she strived to learn as much as she could since she saw it as a way of earning a living and so it turned out to be.  Her coffee plantation is very close to her home so she can keep a close eye on the crops which is a big advantage.  
She's requesting the loan to buy coffee formula, 12-24-12 fertilizer, ammonium nitrate, 46% urea, insecticide, and other materials to take care of and maintain her coffee plants.  Her dream is for her sons to move forward and take advantage of the academic opportunities she didn't have.  She also wishes that her harvest have the desired yield so she can invest in expanding her plot with the earnings.

loans.use: buy various fertilizers and other materials to protect her coffee plants.

loans.name: Kossiwavi

texts.fr: Madame Kossiwavi âgée de 26ans est mariée à un commerçant. En 2012, elle a ouvert son atelier. En plus de son activité, elle revend des mèches et tissages. Son premier crédit lui servira d'acheter des marchandises. Elle espère devenir une grande coiffeuse et faire scolariser ses progénitures.
texts.en:
Kossiwavi is 26 years old, married and a businesswoman.  She opened her studio in 2012.  As and addition to her business, she sells hair extensions and weaves.  

Her first loan will allow her to buy merchandise.   She hopes to become a successful hairdresser and to be able to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions and weaves

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy used clothing

loans.name: Blanca Alicia

texts.es: Blanca de 35 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su madre y su hijo, ella se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 14 años siembra maíz y frijol, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la comercializa en los alrededores de la zona donde ella reside, Blanca esta solicita un crédito para la compra de semilla, fertilizantes abono, controles de plagas, herbicidas,  y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía para poder continuar con sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Blanca is a 35 year old single mother who lives in her house with her mother and son.  She's been working in agriculture for 14 years harvesting corn and beans.  When the harvest is ready she sells the product in her nighborhood.  
Blanca is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, plague control, herbicides and improve the soil in the plot shown in the picture so she can continue harvesting her crops.

loans.use: buy seeds, fertilizers, plague control, herbicides to improve the soil.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel, con el préstamo  anterior ha tenido recursos económicos para adquirir los repuestos necesarios para reparar aires acondicionados, lavadoras, refrigeradoras, etc.,  y a entrego con anticipación los artículos a sus clientes, tiene mayor popularidad y cubre las necesidades de su familia, la cual mantiene el mismo número de integrantes y están en óptimas condiciones de salud.
Por los buenos beneficios y el servicio que la institución le brinda está solicitando un nuevo crédito para invertir en tornillos, cables, herramientas, etc., será de ayuda para mantener a sus clientes satisfechos y continuar su buen desarrollo.
texts.en: Manuel with the last loan had the economic resources to acquire the parts needed to repair air conditioners, washing machines, fridges, etc. and return them to his clients in good time. He is more popular and covers the needs of his family which still has the same members and who are in good health. Due to the benefits and the good service that the institution offers, he is requesting a new loan to invest in screws, cables, tools, etc. which will help him keep his clients satisfied and continue his good development.

loans.use: to invest in screws, cables, tools, etc. which will help to keep his clients satisfied and continue his development

loans.name: Sababsongo 2 Group

texts.fr:
Mme WOUGO MARGUERITE représente le groupe SABABSONGO 2. Elle se porte bien. Mariée, elle est mère de 09enfants. Le plus âgé a28ans et le moins âgé a 3an. 05 vont à l’école. Elle a 06personnes en charge. 
Mme vend des tubercules et fruits depuis 13ans. Elle s’approvisionne à Léo et au Ghana.
Elle veut s’acheter 20sacs d’ignames et 20sacs de patate douce.
Mme veut épargner ses bénéfices. Elle ambitionne agrandir son commerce et fruits et subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Wougo Marguerite represents the Sababsongo 2 group. She is doing well.

She is married and a mother of nine children. The eldest is 28 years old and the youngest is three years old. Five of the children go to school. She has six [additional] people under her care.

Wougo Marguerite has sold tubers and fruits for 13 years. She procures her goods in Léo and Ghana. She wants to buy 20 sacs of yams and 20 sacs of sweet potatoes. 

She wants to save her earnings. She hopes to increase her business and revenues and support her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy 20 sacs of yams and 20 sacs of sweet potatoes

loans.name: Agapito

texts.es:
Agapito tiene 39 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus tres menores hijos en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Pomahuaca que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La población de este distrito se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 7 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera Agapito espera mejorar la calidad de su café y ofrecer un producto de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Agapito is 39 years old. He lives with his wife and his 3 young children in his own house made of rustic materials in the district of Pomahuaca which is located in the province of Jaén, Cajamarca region, in the Northern Andes of Peru. The people of this district work in agriculture, commerce and raising cattle.

Agapito works in agriculture specifically growing coffee. He has 7 years experience in the field and has very good personal and work references in the area. The loan that his been given to him will be used for applying phytosanitary treatment, fertilizer and to pay for labor to harvest. In this way Agapito hopes to improve the quality of his coffee and offer a higher quality product to his clients. This will have a positive impact on his level of income and in the end improve his quality of living and that of his family.

loans.use: to use for agricultural labor applying phytosanitary treatment and fertilizers and labor for the harvest.

loans.name: Regina Raquel

texts.es:
Regina es joven comprometida con la labor humana, por eso decidió estudiar tecnología médica, pues es una área de la medicina que permite ayudar a la prevención, fomento y recuperación de la salud. Además, es  importante para diagnosticar enfermedades. Ella se siente realizada en su trabajo, porque en cada diagnóstico que hace aporta para salvar vidas, y eso la hace ser una mejor persona. 

Sin embargo, es consciente que la inclusión de las tecnologías digitales, en su campo laboral, es sumamente necesaria.  Por esta razón, solicita el crédito para comprar un equipo tecnológico ya que está en un curso de computación, y es imprescindible poner en práctica toda la teoría que aprende, para seguir creciendo como profesional.
texts.en:
Regina is a young woman who is committed to working with people.  That is why she decided to study medical technology.  It is an area of medicine that allows her to help with prevention, promotion, and recuperation in the health area.  Also, it is important in order to diagnose diseases.  She feels fulfilled in her work because each diagnosis she makes contributes to saving lives.  This makes her be a better person.

Nevertheless, she is aware that the including digital technology in her line of work is most necessary.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan to buy technical equipment because she is taking a computer course.  It is essential to put all of the theory she is learning into practice in order to continue growing as a professional.

loans.use: to buy technical equipment.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana, es casada vive en casa familiar, hace mucho tiempo aprendió ayudando a su hermana a elaborar pupusas y desde hace 8 años ella ha realizado la apertura de su propia pupuseria, ella también se dedica a cultivar maíz y frijol para el consumo familiar y para el negocio, su familia le apoya a realizar sus actividades económica y no tiene ayuda económica del extranjero.
EL crédito lo invertirá en abono orgánico, plaguicidas e insecticidas para que su cultivo de maíz y frijol este protegido contra plagas y obtener una cosecha abundante, así para tener oportunidad e aumentar la productiva de la venta de pupusas y su familia tendrá alimento diario.
Juana sueña con tener una situación financiera favorable para resarcir la deuda y tener una vida digna junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Juana is married and lives in the family house.  A long time ago she learned to make ‘pupusas’ [stuffed tortillas] by helping her sister.  Eight years ago she opened her own pupusa business.  She also grows corn and beans for family consumption and for her business.  Her family helps her with her business activities.  She does not get financial support from abroad.

She will use the loan to buy organic fertilizer, pesticides, and insecticides so that her crops will be protected from pests and to get an abundant harvest.  This way she will have the opportunity to increase productivity of her pupusa sales, and her family will have daily food.

Juana dreams of having a positive financial situation in order to repay the loan and to have a decent life together with her family.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer, pesticides, and insecticides so that her crops will be protected from pests and to get an abundant harvest.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es:
Guadalupe, de 33 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, está acompañada, su pareja trabaja en un taller de mecánica automotriz y tienen un hijo de 8 meses.

Guadalupe, es una mujer muy trabajadora, desde la edad de 15 años inicio a ayudarles a sus padres en la siembra de maíz y frijol.- Tiempo después aprendió el oficio de costurera y hasta hoy en día, continua trabajando en esta actividad y de esa manera ayuda a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. 

El crédito será invertido para comprar arena, cemento, ladrillos y cancelar la instalación de la energía eléctrica,  de su casa, con estás reparaciones y la instalación de la energía, Guadalupe dará a su familia una vivienda digna a su familia.

Gracias al crédito Guadalupe, cumplirá uno de sus sueños, el cual es de mejorar la vivienda y tener una mejor calidad de vida.- Pero además, de eso desea darle lo mejor a su hijo, para que estudie y sea un profecional.
texts.en:
Guadalupe, 33, has a ninth-grade education.  She's in a relationship and her partner works in an auto repair shop.  They have an eight-month-old son.

Guadalupe's a very hard-working woman.  She started working with her parents growing corn and beans when she was 15 years old.  Later she learned sewing and still works in that job to help her husband with the household expenses

The loan will be invested in buying sand, cement, and bricks, and in paying to install electricity in her house.  With these repairs and the electricity, Guadalupe will give her family a decent home.

Thanks to the loan, Guadalupe will achieve one of her dreams, which is to improve her home and have a better quality of life.  In addition to that, she wants to give her son the best so he will get an education and be a professional.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, and bricks, and to pay to install electricity in her house

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad (pictured here) is a 23-year-old single man from Khan Younis. Three years ago, he started his own business of distributing cooking gas to local citizens. His business is very profitable, since gas is a basic consumption product.

Mohammad has taken a Murabaha loan in U.S. dollars from Palestine for Credit and Development (FATEN). This loan will help him to buy more gas bottles for his business. By taking out this loan, Mohammad will be able to serve a larger number of clients.

loans.use: to buy more gas bottles for his business.

loans.name: Shirly Vanesa

texts.es: Shirly es una joven de 22 años de edad, residente en un barrio del municipio de Soledad, ella trabaja medio tiempo con una empresa de recreación en la que organiza actividades para niños de todas las edades, su idea de negocio nació gracias a la cantidad de madres o acudientes que ella conoció durante todos estos años en los que se ha desempeñado como recreacionista, a quienes les ofrece artículos como ropa de niños, colonias, canastillas y ajuares para bebes. Esta actividad la realiza todos los días y ofrece facilidad de pago a sus clientes para que puedan adquirir sus productos y cancelarlos por cuotas. Como su clientela es bastante extensa y su capital escaso, en la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en la compra de ropa para bebes, canastas con productos de aseo para bebes y ropa para niño. Esta inversión es necesaria para capitalizar su negocio y poder cumplir con los encargos que sus clientes le solicitaron.  Shirly tiene metas familiares a futuro, ella desea terminar de construir la casa donde vive con sus familiares y tener un local comercial donde exhibir sus productos.
texts.en:
Shirly is a young woman, 22 years old, who lives in a neighborhood of the municipality of Soledad. She works part-time at a recreation center where she organizes activities for children of all ages.

Her business idea was born thanks to the number of mothers and guardians she has met through all these years that she's been working in this capacity. She offers them items for sale such as children's clothing, colognes, baby sets and layettes. She sells every day, offering her clients credit so they can buy her products and pay in installments.

Since she's got a fairly large customer base but little capital, she's now requesting her first loan through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will invest in the purchase of baby clothing, baby care sets, and children's clothing. This investment is necessary to capitalize her business and be able to meet the requests placed by her clients.

Shirly's goals are family oriented. She wants to finish building the home where she lives with her family, and also to have a commercial venue to exhibit her products.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of baby clothing, baby care sets, and children's clothing.

loans.name: Isai

texts.es:
Isai tiene 24 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y su hijo en casa de propia de material rústico en el distrito de Querocotillo que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Las actividades principales que se desarrollan en este distrito son la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica al cultivo de café, cuenta con 06 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para brindar un adecuado mantenimiento a su cultivo de café, con esto Isai espera ofrecer un café de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y con esto mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Isai is 24 years old. He lives with his wife and child in his own house made of rustic materials in the district of Querocotillo which is located in the province of Cutervo, Cajamarca region, in the North Andes of Peru. The main businesses in this district are agriculture, commerce and raising cattle.

Isai works growing coffee. He has more than 6 years experience in his business and has very good personal and work references in the area. The loan will be used to buy manure and fertilizer to provide adequate maintenance for his coffee crops. Isai hopes in doing this to offer a higher quality coffee to his clients which would permit him to generate higher income and with this improve his quality of living and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer to apply adequate maintenance for his coffee crops.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda, 50, is widowed with five children, one in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and has been in this business for one year. She sells a variety of items, such as coffee, oil, bread, beverages and candies.  

Yolanda has requested a loan of 5,000 Philippine pesos through the Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation. She will use the loan to buy additional items to sell, such as snack food, canned goods, eggs and groceries.

In the future, Yolanda would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like snack food, canned goods, eggs and groceries.

loans.name: Naji

texts.en:
Naji (pictured here) is a 32-year-old married man from Gaza City. He is a father to one son and a daughter. He earns a low income as an employee in a private company.

Naji would like to improve the family's living conditions, so he has taken out a Murabaha loan with Palestine for Credit and Development (FATEN). This loan will help him buy a solar system for generating electricity. By taking out this loan, Naji will use clean power and also reduce his monthly electricity expenses.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for generating electricity.

loans.name: Florencio

texts.es:
Florencio es un hombre de 54 años de edad, casado, tiene 2 hijos de 35 y 28 años, y su negocio es el comercio de ganado.
Él es emprendedor, independiente, autónomo, responsable y trabajador. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la comunidad de ‘Batallas’ que se encuentra ubicado en cercanías al lago Titicaca, área agrícola dónde se cría ganado; camélido, vacuno, ovino y porcino, se vive de la pesca y también de tubérculos, vegetales y cereales del lugar, como la quinua, el chuño, la haba, la papa, etc. caracterizada por el clima frío y seco, con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 1-12 grados centígrados y donde los rayos solares golpean con mucha fuerza la superficie. Florencio es de tez morena, baja estatura, cabello negro corto, usa sombrero, su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su esposa que se dedica a la agricultura (sus hijos ya son independientes), viven en una casa construida de adobe con techo de calamina que cuenta con electricidad y agua de pozo. Su negocio es el comercio de ganado; él realiza la compra de ganado vacuno, lo alimenta, se ocupa de ponerle las vacunas necesarias, y una vez gordo y grande lo vende. También realiza la venta de leche, sus clientes son productores queseros del lugar. “las épocas de sequía afectan a toda la comunidad porque el ganado enflaquece y producen poca leche…’ comenta. Su sueño es contar con muchas cabezas de ganado. Él desea realizar la compra de ganado vacuno y lechero para engordarlo en la época actual debido a que las lluvias hacen que exista bastante forraje. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 21 años que viene desarrollando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Florencio solicita un préstamo para la compra de ganado vacuno y lechero para aprovechar la época de lluvia y engordarlo.
texts.en:
Florencio is 54 years old, married, has two sons of 28 and 35 years of age and he sells cattle.  He's entrepreneurial, independent, responsible, and hard working.  He works in the neighborhood of Batallas close to Lake Titicaca, an agricultural area known for cattle raising, including alpacas, cows, sheep, and pigs.  The population lives from fishing as well as agriculture, tubers, vegetables, and cereals from the region, like quinoa, green beans, and potatoes, among others. The region is characterized by a cold and dry climate with a temperature between 1-12 degrees celsius and the sun is very strong.  
Florencio is of tanned complexion, short height, short black hair, and wears a hat.  His native tongue is Aymara but he also speaks Spanish because of the general culture and because of his business.   He shares his life with his wife who also works in agriculture (his sons are already independent) and they live in an adobe house with a zinc roof which has electricty and they get water from a well.  
His business is selling cattle.  He buys the animals, fattens them, gives them all the necessary vaccines, and once they are big and fat he sells them.  He also sells milk to cheese producers in the area.  He mentions that "the droughts really affect the whole community because the cows become thin and produce less milk.  His dream is to have many cows.  
Florencio is requesting this loan to buy more cattle to fatten it during the rainy season because there is more grass for feeding them.  This is his second loan in 21 years of conducting his business.

loans.use: buy cattle to take advantage of the rainy season and fatten the cows.

loans.name: Branyo De La Cruz

texts.es:
Branyo tiene 22 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Buenos Aires, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropón que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de transporte público, trasladando a sus pasajeros a las caseríos aledaños a su distrito, cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Ha solicitado un préstamo para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Branyo espera brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le permitirá incrementar su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Branyo is 22 years old and lives with his wife and children in the district of Buenos Aires, a community devoted to agriculture, commerce, and livestock-raising.  It is located in the Province of Morropón, which belongs to the Piura Region of Peru’s northern coast.

He provides public transportation service, carrying his passengers to the villages near his district.  He has experience in the business, and very good personal and work references in the zone.

He has requested a loan for repair and maintenance of his vehicle, as it is in poor condition currently.  With this, Branyo hopes to provide better service to his customers, which will allow him to increase his income and thus improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to repair and maintain his vehicle, which is in poor condition currently.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan tiene 38 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge y sus 04 hijos en el distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Las principales actividades que se desarrollan en este distrito son la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con cultivos de café de variedad catimore, cuenta con fincas de café en buen estado, dichos cultivos se encuentran ubicados cerca de su domicilio. Adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno. Cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en la agricultura y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El crédito será para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para brindar un adecuado mantenimiento a su cultivo de café, con esto Juan espera ofrecer un café de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir incrementar su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Juan is 38 years old. He lives with his domestic partner and his 4 children in the district of Pucara, located in the province of Jaen, Cajamarca Region, on the Northern part of the Peruvian Andes. The main work activities in this district are agriculture, commerce and animal husbandry. Juan works in agriculture. He has coffee crops of the Catimor variety. He has coffee farms in good condition, and these crops are located near his home. Additionally, he works raising cattle. He has more than 10 years of experience in agriculture, and has very good personal and work references. He will use the loan to buy manure and fertilizers in order to give adequate upkeep to his coffee crops. With this Juan hopes to offer a better quality coffee to his customers, which will allow him to increase his income level and therefore, improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers in order to give adequate upkeep to his coffee crops.

loans.name: Barbara Monserrate

texts.es:
En la calle San Eduardo vía a Santa Ana de la ciudad de Portoviejo, conocida como la Ciudad de Los Reales Tamarindos desde épocas coloniales se reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito 16 de Julio.
En este lugar vive la señora Bárbara, tiene 66 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 9 hijos mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo es agricultor. Ella hace varios años aprendió corte y confección en una academia en la ciudad.
Doña Barbara es una mujer que siempre le ha tocado ganar lo suyo y así ayudarle a su marido el cual no gana mucho en el campo, para esto hace más de 10 años instaló un pequeño taller de costura en su casa, ella cose todo tipo de ropa pero lo que más confecciona es ropa para damas  y niños, Trabaja todos los días unas seis horas por día, una de sus hijas que vive cerca de su casa le ayuda en su tarea cuando tiene mucho trabajo por entregar, en época de fiestas o entrada a clases es cuando más trabajo tiene y sus ganancias aumentan. 
Este crédito lo va  emplear en comprar telas, cierres, hilos y otros materiales para la  costura. Lleva más de 2 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos sale adelante. Sus sueños son seguir adelante.
texts.en:
The members of the July 16th Credit Group meet every fifteen days on San Eduardo Street, on the way to Santa Ana, in the city of Portoviejo, which has been known since colonial times as “The City of the Royal Tamarind Trees.” 

This is where Barbara lives. She is 66 years old, married, and has 9 children – both underage and independent – with her husband. Her husband is a farmer. Years ago, she learned sewing and dressmaking at an academy in the city. 

Barbara is a woman who has always had to support herself and help her husband, who doesn’t make a lot in the fields. To do this, more than 10 years ago she opened a small sewing workshop in her house. She sews all kinds of clothes, but she mostly makes clothes for ladies and children. She works every day for about six hours. One of her daughters who lives close to her house helps her with the work when she has a lot to complete. Around the holidays or when the school year is starting is when she has the most work and her earnings increase.

She is going to use this loan to buy fabric, zippers, thread, and other sewing materials. She has been a part of the Credit Group for more than 2 years and she likes it because the loans allow her to get ahead. Her dream is to keep moving forward.

loans.use: to buy fabric, zippers, thread, and other sewing materials.

loans.name: Lissette Mercedes

texts.es:
Lissette, está optando por un nuevo préstamo para comprar cuadernos, lápices, reglas, mochilas y otros útiles escolares, su objetivo es aprovechar la temporada de inicio de año escolar y tener ingresos extras que invertirá en el pago de su deuda y en cubrir necesidades de su familia.
El apoyo que tuvo con el financiamiento anterior le permitió surtir la tienda y la venta de artículos plásticos para cubrir la demanda  de  sus clientes en la época de graduaciones académicas y fiestas de fin de año.
texts.en:
Lissette is opting for a new loan to buy notebooks, pencils, rulers, backpacks and other school supplies. Her objective is to take advantage of the back to school season and have extra income that she will invest in the payment of her debt and in covering the necessities of her family.

The support that she had with the previous loan allowed her to stock the store and sell plasticware to cover the demand of her customers in the time of academic graduations and end-of-year parties.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, pencils, rulers, backpacks and other school supplies. Her objective is to take advantage of the back to school season and have extra income.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to provide essential funds needed to serve her customers and purchase a Zoona branded kiosk, a mobile phone, a cashbox and a chair.

loans.name: Yona

texts.en:
Yona is 25 years old. He is the first born in a family of three. He says being first born comes with a lot of expectations from his family. He describes himself as hardworking and friendly. Yona is requesting his first Kiva loan to start running his own business in Blantyre, Malawi.

Yona has completed training with Zoona to start operating his own mobile money transfer service. He will set up his business outside of one of the busiest and well-known supermarkets in Blantyre in an area called Limbi. His business will help people in the community to send and receive money throughout Malawi. His main customers will be people who are unbanked and need to move their monies safely.

Yona has requested a Kiva loan so that he can pay for his set up costs. This loan will be used to serve customers by providing him with float. Float is the money that Yona will use in his business on a daily basis to serve customers. The loan will also be used to purchase a small trading kiosk, which he will place outside of the supermarket to serve his customers. He will also purchase a mobile phone, which he will use to make the actual transactions. Yona will also use the loan to purchase a chair and a cashbox. 

Yona is excited to start running his own business, he currently does not have an income and struggles to provide for his basic needs. He thanks the Kiva lenders and promises to work hard and make his business successful. Yona’s biggest dream is to be able to provide for his family and employ other people.

loans.use: to pay for set up costs so that he can start running his own Zoona mobile money transfer business

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 24 years old. She is energetic and friendly. She is the third born in a family of four and she lives with her brother in a household of four. Ruth has completed training with Zoona to start running her own Zoona mobile money transfer business in her hometown of Blantyre in Malawi. Her business will provide the services of sending and receiving money to a lot of people in her community.

Ruth is requesting a loan to help her start her business. This loan will help Ruth pay for her set up costs. She will be able to purchase a trading kiosk, a mobile phone to be used to serve her customers, a chair where she can sit as she serves her customers, and a cash box where she can keep her cash for safety. This loan will also provide Ruth with the float needed for her to serve her customers. 

Zoona has done market research in the area where Ruth is going to set up and has determined that the location for this kiosk is ideal. Ruth will be one of the main operators of Zoona mobile money transfers in Blantyre and a large number of families will be using her service to send and receive their monies. 

Ruth’s dream is to create employment to her fellow young people. She explains that employment in Malawi is very scarce and that by starting her own business, she will hopefully be able to empower other young people. Ruth explains that she finished high school in 2010 and went to college but did not complete her course because she did not have the financial support. With her business, she hopes to help other young people in similar situations to be able to earn money and pay for their education. Ruth thanks the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to pay for her set up costs. She will be able to serve her customers and purchase all the equipment needed for her to serve her customers.

loans.name: Jospeph

texts.en:
Joseph is 22 years old. He is the last born in a family of five. He recently relocated from his home village where he lived with his parents to seek employment opportunities in Blantyre. He now lives with his sister in a household of nine and has decided to start running his own business. 

Joseph’s business will deal in the transferring of money from one place to the other. His business will help people in the community to send and receive money when they need to. He will set up his business in an area called Kabula in Blantyre. Zoona has done market research in the area and established that the location is ideal and he will be one of the main operators of the mobile money transfer business.

Joseph is requesting a Kiva loan so that he can have the funds required for him to set up his business. He will use the funds to purchase a kiosk, which he will use to serve his customers. The kiosk will be placed in one of the popular supermarkets and customers can go to him and transact in a safe environment. He will also use the funds as float to serve his customers.

Joseph would like to take this opportunity to thank Kiva and the people kind enough to lend him the money for him to start running his own business. He sees this as a chance to start earning an income and help support himself and his family.

loans.use: to start running his own Zoona mobile money transfer business in Blantyre, Malawi.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a kiosk, an internet enabled phone, a cashbox, and a chair and to provide working capital float to service his customers.

loans.name: Audrie

texts.en:
As a parent of seven children, Audrie works hard to support her family. She has a bicycle transport business in the Philippines and earns additional income from food vending. 

Audrie is borrowing 6,000 Philippine pesos through the Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation. She will use the loan to buy spare parts and other materials for her bicycle transport business.

Audrie has been sustaining her business activities through a previous loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and other materials for her bicycle transport business

loans.name: William

texts.es:
Los negocios siempre han sido una forma de ganarse la vida. Don William, es un hombre de 53 años, al cual, únicamente lo apoya su esposa pues no tuvieron hijos. Él es dueño de una pequeña pulpería desde hace 3 años, en la cual, ofrece a sus clientes diversos productos, entre ellos: arroz, frijoles cocidos, dulces, refrescos. Su negocio es el que le ha permitido mejorar su casa de habitación y comprar electrodomésticos para equipar la misma. 

Don William solicita el crédito para invertir en su negocio y comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, jabón y gaseosa. Este crédito lo ayudará a ofrecer mayor variedad de productos y obtener mejores ganancias. Las metas y planes de este humilde hombre son seguir mejorando su hogar, comprar dos vitrinas para su pulpería y ahorrar para llegar a ser una persona auto sostenible.
texts.en:
Businesses have always been a way to earn a living. William is a 53 year old man. He supports just his wife because they didn't have any children. He has owned a small store for 3 years. He sells diverse products, including rice, cooked beans, candies, and beverages. This business has allowed him to improve his home and buy appliances to equip it. 

William is asking for the loan to invest in the business and buy rice, sugar, oil, soap and sodas. This loan will help him to offer a wider variety of products and get more profits. The goals and plans of this humble man are to keep improving his home, buy two display cases for his store, and save to be a self supporting person.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, soap and sodas.

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
Leonor, vive con su esposa y cuatro hijos de 11, 9, 8 y 3 años de edad, todos dependen de él y no tiene ayuda económica del extranjero, Leonor se dedica a cosechar granos básicos, además practica a la crianza de ganado y cerdos, aprendió el oficio de su familia y lo realiza desde que tenía 15 años de edad, su horario de trabajo es de 6:00 a.m. a 3:00 p.m., hasta la fecha no representa dificultades.
El préstamo será invertido en fertilizantes para dar un buen trato al cultivo de granos básicos y concentrado para alimentar el ganado, fortalecerá un poco su negocio para mejorar los ingresos en esta temporada, espera poder cubrir todos los compromisos y continuar trabajando.
Sus sueños son mejorar el negocio para dar condiciones de vida más dignas a su familia.
texts.en:
Leonor lives with his wife and four children aged 11, 9, 8, and 3, who all depend upon him, and he does not receive any financial assistance from abroad.  He has a business cultivating staple grains, and he also raises cattle and pigs.  He learned to farm from his family, and he's been doing this work ever since he was 15 years old.  He works from 6am until 3pm, and so far he has not had any difficulties.

Leonor will invest this loan in fertilizers for his crops and feed for his livestock.  This will fortify his business a bit so that he can generate more income this season.  He expects to be able to cover his payments and to continue to work.

Leonor's dream is to improve his business so that he can provide his family with more decent living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and animal feed

loans.name: Maria Berta

texts.es:
Berta, de 54 años de edad, no pudo estudiar por falta de recursos económicos, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja en la agricultira, tambien ella le ayuda, tiene 6 hijos, pero solo el menor de sus hijos vive con ella.

Berta, trabaja en la agricultura y la ganadería, junto a su pareja tienen vacas de repasto, para engordarlas y luego venderlas para obtener ganancias. Ella, aprendió la agricultrura con sus padres, ellos le enseñaron a sembrar, tambien tiene un molino para moler maíz que es un pequeño ingreso para el hogar.- Los cultivos están cerca de su casa y se involucran sus hijos y nietos. 

El prestamo será utilizado para comprar ganado de repasto, con está compra aumentará su negocio y obtendrá mejores ingresos para el hogar. 

Berta, sueña con tener varios vacas para trabajar y comercializarlos.
texts.en:
Berta, 54 years old, couldn't study because of a lack of economic resources. She is in a relationship and her spouse works in agriculture, she helps him as well. She has 6 children, but only the youngest of her children lives with her.

Berta works in agriculture and animal husbandry, along with her spouse they have grazing cattle to fatten and later sell them to obtain income. She learned agriculture with her parents. They taught her how to sow. She also has a mill for grinding corn, which is a small income for the home. The crops are close to their house and she involves her children and grandchildren.

The loan will be utilized to buy grazing cattle. With this purchase, she will increase her business and obtain more income for the home. Berta dreams of having various cows to work and to sell them.

loans.use: to buy grazing cattle.

loans.name: Jose Narciso

texts.es:
José, tiene una vivero de plantas ornamentales y frutales, el negocio lo heredo de su madre, actualmente toda su familia lo apoya en sus actividades, abre su negocio a las ocho de la mañana y lo cierra a las cuatro de la tarde, las dificultades en el negocio son los cambios de clima y que no es fácil encontrar abono orgánico adecuado para sus plantas, su negocio funciona desde hace 10 años, José es casado, vive felizmente con su esposa y dos hijos, con edades de 10 y 14 años, no tiene ayuda económica del extranjero, en ocasiones realiza trabajos fuera de su negocio para tener otros ingresos.
Comprará alambre, macetas, tierras, abono, semillas, entre otros materiales que utilizará para mejorar su negocio, espera tener una mejor variedad y cantidad de plantas para cubrir las nuevas demandas de sus clientes.
Sueña con ampliar más su negocio, tener nuevos clientes, cancelar su deuda y optimizar el estilo de vida familiar.
texts.en:
José has a greenhouse of fruit and ornamental plants. He inherited the business from his mother. Currently, all of his family supports him in his activities. He opens his business at eight in the morning and closes it at four in the afternoon. The difficulties in the business are climate change and that it's not easy to find adequate organic fertilizer for his plants. His business has been working for the past 10 years.

José is married, he lives happily with his wife and two children, aged 10 and 14 years old. He doesn't have economic help from abroad. On occasion, he does jobs outside of his business to have other income.

He will buy wire, flower pots, soil, fertilizer, seeds, among other materials that he will utilize to improve his business. He hopes to have a better variety and quantity of plants to cover the new demands of his customers.

He dreams of growing his business more, having new clients, paying off his debt and optimizing his family lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy wire, flower pots, soil, fertilizer, seeds, among other materials that he will use to improve his business.

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es: El bienestar y sentirse cómodos son dos cosas que los humanos siempre desean. Doña Yanet es un humilde mujer de 46 años, dueña de una pequeña pulpería, la cual esta ubicada en su vivienda,  sin embargo, el espacio de la casa es pequeño; por lo cual, ella solicita el crédito para remodelar el baño de su casa, pues este está dentro de la sala de la casa, mismo lugar donde tiene su pulpería. Este crédito le ayudara a estar más comoda y tener mayor espacio para su negocio. Los deseos de doña Yanet son inaugurar otra pulpería en su comunidad y solicitar otro crédito para su negocio.
texts.en: Well being and comfort are two things that human beings always want. Yanet is humble woman who is 46 years old. She owns a small convenience store located in her home. Nonetheless, the space in the house is small. That is why she is asking for a loan to remodel the bathroom in her house. It is off the living room of the house, the same place where she has the store. This loan will help her to be more comfortable and have a better space for her business.  Yanet wants to open another store in her community and ask for another loan for her business.

loans.use: to remodel the bathroom in her house.

loans.name: Lindalisa

texts.en: Lindalisa is 21 years old. Lindalisa was in college studying social sciences but has not yet finished her studies. She has a 6-month-old son who she provides for. She lives in a household of ten family members, including her parents. Lindalisa hopes to gain experience in the business world and learn about how to manage a business and help contribute to solving Malawi’s larger financial issues. Lindalisa has faced financial hardship with regards to providing for herself and her son, and is very excited about the opportunity of having her own Zoona mobile money transfer business. She dreams of providing her son with a full education. Lindalisa is requesting a loan in order to procure working capital to get her Zoona business started, so that she may one day achieve her hopes and dreams. The loan will be used to purchase a Zoona branded kiosk, some branded fee posters, a web enabled mobile phone, a chair and a cash box. The loan will also provide Lindalisa with the funds to serve her customers.

loans.use: to serve her customers and purchase a Zoona branded kiosk, some branded fee posters, a web enabled mobile phone, a chair and a cash box

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard is 34 years old and has one daughter. Richard is an entrepreneur and businessman and has worked with various businesses, particularly with regards to the selling of commercial goods. Richard has an accounting degree and is currently in school for business. He dreams of finishing school and becoming a successful businessman, and of one day owning his own business. Richard is very excited about the opportunity to own his own Zoona mobile money transfer business, as it will allow him to provide for his daughter and her education. A challenge faced by Richard is lack of capital to invest in his Zoona business and get it off the ground. Richard describes himself as an industrious, enterprising young man and is requesting a loan in order to provide him with the working capital he needs to get his Zoona business started. When Richard receives his Kiva loan, he will be able to pay for his Zoona branded trading kiosk, a mobile phone, a chair and a cashbox. All of these are important for Richard to effectively kick-start his business and serve customers. He promises to work hard and thanks the Kiva lenders and Zoona for this opportunity.

loans.use: by providing him with the working capital he needs to get his Zoona business started.

loans.name: Florentin

texts.es:
Florentín es un hombre muy sensato, él tiene 52 años, es casado, tiene una bonita familia de 5 hijos, comprendidas entre las edades de 18 a 31 años. Ellos viven en una  comunidad de Sololá. 

Florentín es una persona  que le ha dedicado siempre empeño es su trabajo, para dar lo necesario a su familia, él desde hace 25 años trabaja para una Agroveterinaria, esa actividad ya es todo una vida para él. Florentín conoce ya muy bien el trabajo y es también es muy reconocida por la sociedad por los años que lleva trabajando. 

Florentín para su bienestar se compró un carro, y a la vez le sirve también para apoyar a su familia cuando hay necesidad de trasportarse de un lugar a otro, por el uso que le han dado al carro, ahora necesita darle mantenimiento, pues Florentín para lograr este trabajo busca un prestamo de  cuatro mil quetzales, el anhelo de Florentín es arreglar su carro, ya es el medio que utiliza también de trasportarse a su trabajo.
texts.en:
Florentín, age 52, is a very prudent man. He is married and has a lovely family of five children, ranging in age from 18 to 31 years old. They live in a community in Sololá. 

Florentín has always worked hard at his job to provide his family with the things they need. For the last 25 years, he has worked for a farm veterinarian, work which has been his life. Florentín knows the job well and is recognized throughout the community for the years he's spent practicing it.

Florentín bought himself a car for his well being and it has also helped him to support his family when they need transportation from one place to another. With use, the car now needs maintenance. In order to get this work done, Florentín is looking for a loan of 4,000 quetzales. His goal is to fix his car since that's how he gets himself to his job.

loans.use: buy spare parts for his vehicle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy a heifer and expand his cattle operations

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy feed for his cattle this season

loans.name: Roxana Raquel

texts.es:
Roxana, vive con su compañero de vida, dos hijos uno de 4 años de edad y otro de 5 meses de nacido, su negocio consiste en atender una mini librería, además ofrece a sus clientes diferentes prendas de vestir para ambos sexos y cosméticos, para hacer la apertura de su negocio se preparó mediante clases,  tiene un horario de siete de la maña a cinco de la tarde, hasta el momento no representa ninguna dificultad que le impida seguir teniendo su negocio en el mercado.
Invertirá el crédito en lociones, cremas corporales, labiales, mascarillas, etc., y variedad de carteras, mejorara la mercadería que oferta a sus clientes así como también busca ahorrar al realizar la compra al mayoreo, espera que sus ventas y ganancias aumenten, así tendrá recursos económicos para cancelar su deuda.
Los sueños que Roxana tiene son lograr mantener su fuente de ingresos para que sus hijos puedan tener oportunidad de estudiar en la universidad.
texts.en:
Roxana lives with her life partner, two children, one aged 4 and the other 5 months old. Her business consists of tending to a small bookstore. Additionally, she offers her clients different clothing for both sexes and cosmetics. To do the opening of her business, she prepared through classes. She has a schedule from seven in the morning to five in the afternoon. Up till now, no difficulty has presented itself that impedes her from continuing to have her business in the market.

She will invest in lotions, body creams, lip balms, masks, etc. and a variety of wallets. She will improve the merchandise that she offers to her customers as well as look to save by buying in bulk. She hopes that her sales and earnings increase, so she will have economic resources to pay off her debt.

Roxana's dreams are to achieve maintaining her source of income so that her children can have the opportunity to study at the university.

loans.use: to invest in lotions, body creams, lip balms, masks, etc. and a variety of wallets. She will improve the merchandise that she offers to her customers.

loans.name: María Josefa

texts.es:
María Josefa es una mujer muy serena, ella tiene 62 años, vive  juntamente con su esposo y sus 6 hijos en una comunidad de San José Chacaya.

María Josefa  a pesar de su edad, su  pasión es el trabajo, ya que esto lo  entretiene, pues para la generación de su economía, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa típica y realiza bordados manualmente, ella lleva ya varios años de experiencia en esta actividad, para su comunidad es reconocida como la antigua vendedora, María Josefa quiere seguir con esta actividad, pero el obstáculo es que ella  no cuenta con suficiente capital de trabajo para su inversión, por lo mismo ella decidió buscar un presta de dos mil quinientos quetzales  que lo utizara para comprar materia prima y todo lo necesario para su negocio.

María Josefa además del negocio anterior, también tiene una su pequeña  crianza de pollos y las personas interesadas le llegan a comprarle hasta su casa, sin necesidad de que ella los lleve al mercado ni destazarlos. Ella se siente afortunada porque ha buscado mecanismos de generar su economía  y de esa manera ella ha apoyado a su esposo en cubrir algunos gastos del hogar. 
El sueño de  María Josefa es seguir buscando prosperidad para su familia.
texts.en:
María Josefa is a very serene woman. She is 62 years old and lives with her husband and their 6 children in a community in San José Chacaya.

Despite her age, María Josefa's passion is work. It is the only thing that entertains her, because it generates income. She sells traditional clothing and does embroidery by hand. She has several years' experience in this activity and she is known in her community as the elder seller. María Josefa wants to continue with this activity, but the obstacle she has is that she doesn't have enough working capital to invest. That is why she decided to seek a loan of two thousand five hundred quetzales that she will use to buy raw materials and everything she needs for her business.  

In addition to the above business, María Josefa also has a small chicken raising business. Customers go to her house, without her needing to take them to market or butcher them. She feels fortunate because she has sought out ways to generate income and that is how she has helped her husband cover the household expenses. 
 
María Josefa's dream is to keep seeking prosperity for her family.

loans.use: to buy raw materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to put grilles on the windows and doors of her house to guarantee security in her home and in her family.

loans.name: Rina Ayam

texts.es:
Rina tiene 35 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene 2 hijos, vive con su familia en el distrito de Nueva Arica que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, aceite, fideos, entre otros, al por mayor y menor, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceite, fideos, entre otros para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Rina espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Rina is 35 years old, partnered, and has 2 children. She lives with her family in the Nueva Arica district, which is located in the Chiclayo province in the Lambayeque region in the northern coast of Peru. Life in the community is peaceful. The population makes its living in agriculture, livestock breeding, and commerce.

She makes a living by selling groceries such as rice, sugar, oil, and noodles, among other items, on wholesale and individually. Her business is located in her residence. She has more than 5 years of experience in her business and has an established customer base who gives her very good personal and professional references. She is requesting a loan to buy a greater quantity of products such as rice, sugar, oil, and noodles, among other items, to increase her business’s stock. With this, Rina hopes to offer a greater variety of products to her clients, which will allow her to generate greater income and improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of products such as rice, sugar, oil, and noodles, among other items, to increase her business’s stock.

loans.name: Jose David

texts.es:
José, se mantiene realizando todos sus cultivos para generar ingresos que le permitan cancelar sus deudas y dar a su familia una mejor alimentación diaria. Con su nueva situación financiera ha tenido la oportunidad de comprar un car wash, para tener un mejor patrimonio para su familia.
En esta ocasión solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar concentrado para alimentar aves de corral, y una máquina para lavar vehículos de esta manera fortalecerá su nuevo rubro y brindara un buen servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en: José continues to harvest all his crops, earning income that lets him pay off his debts and provide his family with better daily nutrition. With his new financial situation, he had the opportunity to buy a car wash, so that he can provide his family a better legacy. At this time, he is requesting a loan which he will use to buy feed for his poultry as well as a machine for washing cars. The latter will help him strengthen his new venture and provide his customers with better service.

loans.use: buy feed for his poultry and a machine for washing cars, his newest venture

loans.name: Gonzalo Natividad

texts.es:
Gonzalo, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo por la facilidad de pago que le brinda la institución y  el apoyo que recibe de los inversionistas Kiva, lo utilizara para comprar pastillas para frenos, aceite, fracciones, bujías, etc., espera tener un inventario más surtido y atender mejor a sus clientes.
Con la ayuda del préstamo anterior ha mantenido su taller equipado para mantener a sus clientes satisfechos, sus ingresos han mejorado y hoy en día su familia vive en un mejor entorno.
texts.en: Gonzalo, pleased with how easy it is to repay loans to the institution and with the support he received from Kiva investors, is requesting a new loan which he will use to buy auto supplies, including brake pads, oil, parts, spark plugs, and more. He hopes to have a more well-stocked inventory so that he can meet his customers' needs better.  With the help from his previous loan, he kept his shop stocked to keep his customers happy. His income has increased and today his family lives in a better environment.

loans.use: buy car parts to increase his supply on hand and improve customer service

loans.name: Leonel Antony

texts.es:
Leonel es un joven estudiante que vive junto a sus padres y 4 hermanos. Su padre es músico junto a sus hermanos, cuyos trabajos son eventuales. Su madre sólo se dedica a las labores de vivienda.
Él empezó a laborar desde los 17 años como cortador en una empresa productora de calzados. Sus estudios los pagaba con la ayuda de su padre. De no contar con un crédito, Leonel se hubiera retrasado en sus estudios, dejando de estudiar al menos un ciclo. La difícil situación por la que está atravesando actualmente su familia y el difícil horario del trabajo con sus estudios, no le permiten culminar tranquilamente su carrera, por lo que está solicitando un crédito para no dejar de estudiar.
Actualmente se encuentra estudiando el 2° Ciclo de Administración Industrial, la cual es de su agrado, porque es rentable en el mercado laboral y le ayudaría a mejorar la calidad de vida familiar.
Para Leonel, es muy importante contar con el apoyo de KIVA y se siente muy agradecido por la labor que realizan, ayudando a personas a surgir profesionalmente en este mundo tan competitivo.
texts.en:
Leonel is a young student. He lives with his parents and four siblings. His father and siblings are musicians, and do not have a fixed job. His mother works as a housewife. Leonel started to work when he was 17, and was in charge of cutting operations for a shoe company. His father helped him to pay for his studies. Without a loan, he would have had to postpone one term and would have fallen behind in his studies.

His family is going through a difficult situation. Since he has to work and study, it is difficult for him to finish his studies, which is why he is requesting a loan so that he does not need to interrupt them. He is now in the second term of his studies in Industrial Management. He likes this program because this profession is appreciated and can help him to improve his family’s living conditions.

It is very important for Leonel to receive Kiva’s support and he deeply appreciates the work they do, and how they help people to become professionals in such a competitive world.

loans.use: to pay for his studies in Industrial Management.

loans.name: Bryan Alexis

texts.es:
Bryan, es un joven estudiante que vive junto a sus padres y su hermana mayor. Su padre se dedica al servicio de taxi, tratando de sacar adelante a su familia. Su madre es ama de casa.
Él se encuentra estudiando actualmente el 2° Ciclo de Mecánica de Producción en SENATI, carrera que le gusta mucho porque le ayuda a emplear todas sus habilidades y así podrá beneficiar a toda su familia apoyándolos en los gastos familiares.
Él recibe todo el apoyo de su padre y algunos familiares para poder culminar con sus estudios en el tiempo estimado. Debido a la actual situación por la que está atravesando su familia, le resulta difícil continuar pagando su carrera, es por ello, que busca en KIVA un apoyo que le permita culminar satisfactoriamente su carrera.
Él se siente muy agradecido por el programa, ya que es muy beneficioso para aquellos jóvenes con deseos de superación que no cuentan con medios económicos que le permitan salir adelante.
texts.en:
Bryan is a young student who lives with his parents and an older sister. His father is a taxi driver and fights to get ahead with his family. His mother works as a housewife. Bryan is in the second term of his studies in Production Mechanics at SENATI. He likes this program because he can make use of his knowledge to help his family with the home expenses.

His father and some relatives give him their full support when it comes to finishing his studies according to plan. His family is going through a difficult situation, so it is a challenge for him to continue paying his studies. This is why he is asking Kiva for support to finish his studies and meet all the requirements.

Bryan is grateful to this program because it helps young people that want to get ahead but do not have the financial resources they need in order to do so.

loans.use: to pay for his studies in Production Mechanics and become a successful professional.

loans.name: Vilma Josefina

texts.es:
