Vilma es una mujer muy responsable en todo lo que emprende, ella tiene 25 años, tiene una hermosa familia de 2 hijos, ellos viven en una comunidad de Sololá. 

Vilma es una mujer que lucha día tras día con su trabajo y su único interés es buscar prosperidad para su familia, Vilma para lograr alcanzar un ingreso económico, hace un hace logro instalar un pequeño negocio  lo que Vilma vende es concentrado   (alimentos para animales) con los ingresos de esta actividad ella va complementando los gastos del hogar. Pues Vilma para seguir con el negocio necesita hacer un poco más de inversión, pero con los ingresos que tiene ahora, no es suficiente, por lo mismo ella está solicitando un prestamo de cinco mil quetzales para comprar más productos. Según la apreciación de Vilma  más adelante este generara ganancias. 
Vilma Josefina además de este negocio también vende medicina natural,  este es otra fuente de ingreso que tiene Vilma. El anhelo de Vilma es luchar con los  negocios para que generen más ingresos cada día y más adelante poder comprar lotes de terrenos para luego construir una casa más grande para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Vilma is a woman who is very responsible in all that she does. She is 25 years old. She has a beautiful family of two children, and they live in the community of Sololá.

Vilma is a woman who fights day after day with her work, and her only goal is to find prosperity for her family. To succeed in achieving a good income, Vilma has succeeded in starting a small business. Vilma sells animal food, and with the income from this activity, she supports the household expenses. 

To continue with this business, she needs to have a little more investment, but the income she has now is not enough. As a result, she is requesting a loan for 5000 quetzales to buy more products. According to Vilma’s assessment, this investment will generate earnings for her down the line. 

In addition to this business, Vilma Josefina also sells natural medicines. This is another source of income for her. Vilma’s desire is to fight with her business to earn more income every day. In the future, she wants to be able to buy lots of land to then build a bigger house for her children.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es:
Marta es una persona muy disciplinada, ella tiene 47 años, tiene una bonita familia de 3 hijos, ellos viven en una comunidad de Sololá 
Marta es una mujer que trabaja duro al lado de su esposa, porque su único propósito es buscar prosperidad para su familia, Marta para ayudar con la economía de su hogar, se dedica a la venta de verduras, pues por su amabilidad y por los años de experiencia en este negocio, mucha gente la conoce y tiene ya clientela permanente. 

Marta quiere mucho a su familia y siempre busca lo mejor para ellos, para que vivan en armonía, pues el plan de ella con el afán de ayudar a su esposo, ella solicita un prestamo que le servirá para comprar materiales de construcción para remodelar su casa tales como: block, cemento, arena y piedrín, Marta con los ingresos que genera su venta estaría pagando el prestamo, este sería el apoyo más grande que le da a su esposo, todo  por amor a su familia. 
Las aspiraciones de Marta es ver terminada su construcción  y seguir apoyando a sus hijos en financiarles  la educación.
texts.en:
Marta is a very disciplined person. She is 47 years old and has a lovely family of three children. They live in a community of Sololá. 

Marta is a woman who works hard at her husband's side because her only purpose is to seek prosperity for her family. To help with her home's finances, Marta makes a living by selling vegetables. Due to her friendliness and the years of experience she has in this business, a lot of people know her and she has a permanent customer base. 

Marta loves her family a lot and she always seeks the best for them so that they can live in harmony. In order to help her husband, she is asking for a loan that will serve to buy construction materials to remodel their house, such as blocks, cement, sand and stones. Marta will pay the loan with the earnings from her sales. This is the best help she could give her husband, all for love of her family. 

Marta's aspirations are to see the construction finished and to keep supporting her children by financing their education.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Ruben Dario

texts.es:
Rubén es un hombre de 29 años de edad, serio, correcto, honesto y trabajador.
El desempleo lo ha llevado a evaluar opciones para generar dinero es por eso que quiere iniciar un  negocio de venta de jugos naturales.
Esta medida la adopta porque hace buen tiempo está buscando trabajo y no encuentra, las deudas no se detienen y en su casa se necesita comer todos los días.
Rubén solicita formalmente un apoyo para iniciar su actividad económica y con esta ayuda comprara carro para la venta de limonada y otras bebidas y surtido de materia prima como limones, mandarinas, tamarindos y los aparatos para realizar las bebidas como un exprimidor, una licuadora etc.
texts.en:
Rubén is a man of  29, serious, respectful, honest and hard-working. Unemployment has led him to evaluate options for generating money and that is why he wants to start a business selling natural juices. He is taking this step because he has been looking for work for some time and not finding it. The bills keep coming and in his house they need to eat everyday. 

Rubén is formally requesting help to initiate his business and with this help he will buy a cart for selling lemonade and other drinks, as well as a supply of ingredients such as lemons, tangerines and tamarinds, and the devices for making the drinks, such as a juicer, blender, etc.

loans.use: To buy a cart for selling lemonade and other drinks, as well as a supply of ingredients such as lemons, tangerines and tamarinds.

loans.name: Denis Maria

texts.es:
Denis es una mujer muy trabajadora y consciente con su familia pues ante una necesidad muy latente de falta de capital decidió buscas alternativas que le permitieran obtener ganancias para colaborarle a su pareja en el mantenimiento del hogar que lo terminan de conformar 2 hijos de 10 y 8 años de edad.
Denis se dedica a la cría de aves, tiene pollos y gallinas, vende huevos y pollos en engorde esta actividad la aprendió gracias a las enseñanzas de un amigo.
Trabaja todos los días, y busca a través de un crédito mejorar algunas falencias latentes en su negocio.
Con el apoyo de un crédito construirá bebederos, una zona común para alimentación, una malla, bombillas, vitaminas y alimento todo esto para sus aves. 
Este crédito le permitirá tener una zona de encubación ambientada y agradable para sus aves.
texts.en:
Denis is a very hardworking woman who is focused on her family. Due to a persistent lack of capital, she decided to seek alternatives that would allow her to earn money to help her partner in maintaining their home consisting of two children ages 10 and 8. Denis makes a living by raising poultry; she has chickens and hens and sells eggs and fattened chickens. She learned this activity thanks to a friend's teachings. She works every day and by means of the loan she is seeking to improve some things her business has needed.
.
With the support of a loan she will build drinking fountains and a common area for food and buy mesh, light bulbs, vitamins and food, all for her birds. 
This loan will allow her to have a pleasant established incubation area for her birds.

loans.use: to build drinking fountains and a common area for food and buy mesh, light bulbs, vitamins and food, all for her birds.

loans.name: Micaela Teresita

texts.es:
Micaela Teresita es una señora muy reconocida por ser  amable y muy solidaria con sus vecinos, Teresita tiene 55 años, ella vive en una comunidad de Suchitepéquez. 

Micaela Teresita anteriormente ya tuvo la oportunidad de adquirir un prestamo en esta  institución, donde manifiesta que el prestamo le beneficio bastante y como resultado  pudo incrementar su negocio generando más ganancias y ahora ella mejoro sus condiciones de vida con su familia. Pues con este resultado ella ahora solicita un nuevo prestamo que lo invertirá nuevamente en la compra de ropa típica y materia prima para seguir elaborando las piezas a la demanda de sus clientes, a Micaela le encanta tejer esa es su pasión.
  
Micaela es una mujer muy perseverante con su negocio y con su familia, ella para adquirir sus préstamos escogió la institución ADICLA ya que los préstamos ahí son rápidos y la buena atención del personal. Micaela sueña que con sus nuevas ganancias anhela tener un nuevo negocio como una tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Micaela Teresita, 55, is a very well-known woman for being friendly and supportive with her neighbors.  She lives in a community in Suchitepéquez.

Micaela Teresita had the opportunity to get a previous loan from this institution.  She said the loan benefitted her a lot and consequently she was able to increase business and earn more profits.  Now she has improved her family's living conditions.

As a result, she's requesting another loan to invest in a purchase of traditional clothing and raw materials to keep on making garments on request from her customers.  Micaela loves to weave; it's her passion.

Micaela's a very determined woman with her business and her family.  She chose to request her loans from ADICLA because it's quick to get loans there and the staff provides good service.  She dreams that with her new profits she can have another business, such as a grocery store.

loans.use: to buy traditional clothing and raw materials

loans.name: Eliecer De Jesus

texts.es:
Eliecer es un hombre casado de 63 años, maduro, muy correcto y honrado, es padre de 2 hijos ya mayores de edad, Eliecer toda la vida había sido un empleado informal por lo que no cotizo una pensión y no tiene un medio de sustento para su familia con lo único que cuenta es con su tienda de abarrotes que ubica en su casa y con la que genera el alimento para él y su esposa.
Este año inicio un poco tedioso para Eliecer el alza en los precios ha sido un impedimento para abastecer su local, sobrevive con el surtido que le quedo el año pasado pero necesita de urgencia surtir su negocio.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de granos, snacks, licores, bebidas, víveres para surtir de buena manera su negocio y seguir generando el dinero para mantener su hogar.
texts.en:
Eliecer is a married, 63-year-old man who is mature, polite, and honest. He is the father of 2 adult children. Eliecer had always been an employee in the informal sector, so he did not pay into a pension and does not have a way to support his family. All he has is his grocery store, which is located in his house, and that is what he uses to obtain food for himself and his wife.

This year started off a bit wearisome for Eliecer. The rise in prices has been an impediment for him to stock his store. He is surviving on the stock that was left over from last year, but he urgently needs to stock his business.

He is requesting the loan to buy grains, snacks, liquors, beverages, and provisions to stock his store well and continue generating money to take care of his home.

loans.use: to buy grains, snacks, liquors, beverages, and provisions to stock his store well.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda es una mujer de 28 años de edad, madre de 3 hijos, soñadora, responsable y con un toque especial para elaborar alimentos el cual aprovecho para ser independiente y tener como actividad principal la elaboración de alimentos.
Sus conocimientos de cocina los heredo de su madre, ella la instruyo y con el paso del tiempo fue perfeccionando sus habilidades las cuales saco al mercado.
Yolanda inicio el negocio primeramente como necesidad económica pues no es fácil mantener una familia de tres hijos, darles estudios, vivienda, alimentación, indumentaria a todos ellos.
Solicita formalmente un crédito para mejorar la silletería, mesas, utensilios dándole un toque de elegancia a su restaurante.
texts.en: Yolanda is a 28-year old woman. She is the mother of three children, is responsible, and has big dreams and a special touch for making food that she capitalized on to be independent and make food as her primary business. She inherited her knowledge of cooking from her mother; she taught her and over time Yolanda perfected her abilities and took them out to the market. Yolanda started her business mostly due to financial need, as it is not easy to maintain a family of three children, pay for all of their studies, housing, food, and clothing. She is formally asking for a loan to improve her chairs, tables and utensils, giving her restaurant a touch of elegance.

loans.use: to improve her chairs, tables and utensils, giving her restaurant a touch of elegance.

loans.name: Mardonia

texts.es:
Mardonia tiene 49 años de edad, es casada, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es bastante tranquila, la población se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como leche, aceite, arroz, azúcar, gaseosa, artículos de aseo, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceite, entre otros, para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Mardonia espera tener mayor stock de productos para poder atender las diversas necesidades, requerimientos y gustos de los clientes de la zona lo que va a incrementar su nivel de ingresos y le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Mardonia is 49 years old, and married.  She lives with her family in a rural zone in the district of Oyotún, which is located in the province of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque Region of Peru’s northern coast.  Life in this district is very tranquil; the people who live here devote themselves to agriculture, livestock-raising, and commerce. 

She sells groceries such as milk, oil, rice, sugar, sparkling water, and toilet articles, among other items. Her business is located in her home; she has more than 10 years’ experience, and regular customers who give her very good personal and professional references. 

The loan will be used for the purchase of a larger quantity of products such as rice, sugar, and oil, among other items, in order to stock her business more. 

With this, Mardonia hopes to have a greater stock of products so that she can attend to the diverse needs, requirements, and tastes of the customers in the zone.  This will increase her income and allow her to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a larger quantity of products such as rice, sugar, and oil, among other items, in order to stock her business more.

loans.name: Sharifa

texts.ru: Шарифа обращается за кредитом уже во второй раз. Первый кредит был успешно профинансирован. Шарифа не может подобрать слова, чтобы отблагодарит Вас. Она очень счастлива и верит, что без Вас она бы не могла значительно продвинуть бизнес. На этот она обратилась к Вам за помощью с той же целью. Она хочет привезти еще больше товара и постепенно увеличиваться и открыть еще один продуктовый магазин. Шарифа уверена, что Вы ей поможете, и заранее благодарит Вас.
texts.en:
Sharifa is now requesting her second loan. She successfully paid off her first one. She can't find the words to thank you - she is very happy and believes that without you she would not have been able to advance her business. 

Now she is turning to you for help with a similar goal. She wants to bring in even more inventory and gradually grow and then open one more grocery store. She is sure you will help her and thanks you in advance.

loans.use: to buy grocery products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a room so her grandson can live with her and keep her company.

loans.name: Rolando

texts.es:
Rolando es un hombre de 42 años de edad, casado, tiene 1 hijo de 11 años de edad y su negocio es la limpieza de ropa en seco.
Él es independiente, constante, activo, responsable y trabajador. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona de ‘Cota cota’, un área residencial caracterizada por el comercio de buen gusto en todas las áreas, de clima cálido y seco. 
Rolando es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, su lengua materna es el aymará que ya no utiliza y habla español por el comercio. Su vida la realiza con su esposa que le ayuda en el negocio y con su hijo que estudia en la escuela, viven en una casa de ladrillo que cuenta con agua potable, alcantarillado y luz eléctrica. Su negocio es la limpieza de ropa en seco, él se dedica a quitar las manchas y la suciedad en forros y entretelas, además de aquellas prendas en las que sus instrucciones de lavado indican el símbolo de lavado en seco. La humedad estropea este tipo de prendas, por eso utiliza líquidos libres de agua, estos líquidos para limpieza en seco no penetran en los tejidos como pasa con el agua manteniendo las prendas en buen estado, disolviendo grasas, aceites, ceras o chicle; ‘trabajé 5 años como ayudante de limpieza, luego adquirí una máquina con la que trabajo actualmente…’ comenta. Debido a la demanda de su negocio debe trabajar más de 10 horas diarias, turnándose con su esposa para entregar prendas a domicilio. Actualmente el carro que tiene para realizar las entregas se encuentra averiado causando gastos extras en transporte para la entrega de prendas. Su sueño es tener sucursales en toda la ciudad y desea reparar su vehículo para realizar las entregas de la ropa limpia. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 19 años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Rolando solicita un préstamo para la reparación de su vehículo para realizar las entregas de ropa limpia a domicilio.
texts.en:
Rolando is a 42-year-old man. He is married and has one son, who is 11 years old. His business is running a dry cleaning service. He is independent, reliable, active, responsable, and hardworking. Ronaldo runs his business in the "Cota Cota" neighborhood, a residential area known for its quality businesses and its warm and dry climate.

Rolando has a darker complexion, short black hair, and is short. His native tongue is alymará, although he no longer uses it; he speaks Spanish for his business. His wife helps him with his work and his son is studying in school. They live together in a house made of bricks, and they count on potable water, sewage services, and electricity in their home.

At his dry cleaning business, Rolando dedicates himself to removing the stains and dirt from the linings and interlinings of clothing. He also works with garments that specifically indicate that they must be dry cleaned. Humidity can damage this type of clothing, and so he is sure to use specialized cleaning products and processes that will keep the garments in a good state and free of grease, oil, wax or gum stains. Ronaldo says that he worked for five years as a cleaning assistant; he was then able to purchase his own machine, which is what he currently uses at his business.

Due to the demand of his business, he works more than ten hours each day, taking turns with his wife when they need to deliver the clean clothing to customers´ homes. The car they currently use is unreliable and damaged, and so they have had to incur extra costs in order to return customers´ clothing on time. 

Rolando´s dream is to have branches of his business throughout the entire city. He would also like to repair his vehicle so that he can make the deliveries. This is the first time that Rolando has requested a loan in the 19 years that he has had his business. Rolando will use the loan to repair the car that he uses to deliver the clean clothes to his customers.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle that he uses to deliver clean clothes to customers´ homes.

loans.name: Gulzadahan

texts.ru: Гулзадахан 52 года, замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее высшее образование. Уже 13 лет Гулзадахан работает бухгалтером в МЧС, получая ежемесячную заработную плату в размере около 31,000 сом (KGS). Гулзадахан начала строить дом для своей семьи, поэтому она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку цемента, кирпичей, арматуры. В дальнейшем Гулзадахан планирует и дальше улучшать жилищные условия, создавая в доме комфорт и уют.
texts.en: Gulzadahan is 52 and married with two children. She has a higher education and has been working as an accountant at a government ministry for 13 years, receiving a monthly salary of about 31,000 KGS. She began building a home for her family, and has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 120,000 KGS to purchase cement, bricks and rebar. In the future she plans to improve her living situation further by making her home comfortable and cosy.

loans.use: to purchase cement, bricks and rebar to construct a house for her family

loans.name: Suiumkan

texts.ru: Суйумкан, 36 лет, замужем, 3 детей. Суйумкан уже четырнадцатый год занимается полеводством и животноводством. В хозяйстве есть корова, 5 овец. На участке мерою 3,0 Га она выращивает фасоль для реализации. В хозяйстве есть трактор для оказания сельскохозяйственных услуг односельчанам. Благодаря упорному труду, Суйумкан на сегодняшний день имеет прибыль около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 75,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 15 овец. Доходы от кредита Суйумкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Suiumkan is 36 and married with three children. She is in her fourth year working in animal husbandry and agriculture. She currently has a cow and five sheep on her farm as well as 3 hectares of land where she grows beans for sale. She also has a tractor and offers services with it to her fellow villagers.

Thanks to her hard work, Suiumkan currently brings in about 10,000 KGS per month. With the goal of further developing her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 75,000 KGS to purchase 15 sheep. She plans to put profits from the loan into further developing her business.

loans.use: to purchase 15 sheep for fattening and resale

loans.name: Totukan

texts.ru: Тотукан 50 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. У Тотукан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Тотукан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 коровы, 2 теленка. Хозяйство развивается стабильно. Ежемесячный доход составляет 25,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Тотукан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 10 овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Тотукан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Totukan is 50 and married with five children. She has a high school education and works in animal husbandry as the primary source of income for her family, a business she began 10 years ago with the purchase of livestock for 10,000 KGS. Thanks to her hard work, she currently has four cows and two calves on her farm, which is developing well. Her monthly income is 25,000 KGS.

With the goal of further developing her business, Totukan has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 40,000 KGS to purchase 10 sheep to increase her herd. She plans to put profits from the loan into further increasing her quantity of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase 10 sheep to increase her herd

loans.name: Larisa

texts.ru: Лариса, 21 год, замужем. Есть маленький ребенок. Семья очень дружная и уважаемая в селе, с Ларисой и ее супругом живут свекор и брат. Лариса занимается животноводством и полеводством. В хозяйстве имеется: 4 коровы, 28 овец, на ежедневной основе она продает молоко. Также у Ларисы в наличии есть земельный надел мерою 1,30 ГА, где она ежегодно выращивает фасоль. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет до 10,000 сом (KGS). Всю прибыль от бизнеса Лариса старается вкладывать в развитие бизнеса. Она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом, в сумме 105,000 сом (KGS) на покупку лошади и минеральных удобрений. Лариса хочет увеличить поголовье скота и построить дом для ее семьи.
texts.en:
Larisa is 21 and married with one small child. Her family is very happy and respected in the village where she and her husband live with his mother and brother. She works in animal husbandry and agriculture and currently has four cows and 28 sheep on her farm, and sells milk on a daily basis. She also has 1.3 hectares of land where she grows beans. Her monthly income is up to about 10,000 KGS. 

Larisa tries to put all her profits into further developing her business. She has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 105,000 KGS to purchase a horse and mineral fertilizers. She wants to increase her number of livestock and build a home for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a horse and mineral fertilizers in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Mabel Maritza

texts.es:
Ella es Mabel una hermosa futura madre soltera de 26 años de edad, tierna y delicada que desea iniciar un negocio de venta de mercancía para buscar recursos para mantener a su hijo.
Mabel desea darle una buena vida a su hija y aunque le toque trabajar estando en embarazo hará todo lo posible porque ella y su hijo tengan una vida digna. 
Mable quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de mercancía en acero como aretes, cadenas, pulseras, ropa y lociones.
Con las ganancias de sus ventas piensa comprar un coche para su bebe, leche, pañales, ropa, juguetes y seguir realizando esta gestión para darle a su hijo una bella vida.
texts.en:
Mabel is a beautiful 26-year-old future single mother. She is caring and delicate, and she wants to start a merchandise sale business in order to have the resources to support her child. Mabel wishes to give her child a good life, and she will do everything she can in order for her and her child to have a dignified life, even if she has to work through her pregnancy.

Mabel is requesting a loan to buy steel merchandise such as earrings, chains, and bracelets as well as clothing and lotions. With the earnings from her sales, she plans to buy a stroller for her baby, milk, diapers, clothing, and toys. She will continue carrying out this work so that she can give her child a wonderful life.

loans.use: to buy steel merchandise such as earrings, chains, and bracelets as well as clothing and lotions.

loans.name: Jose Atilio

texts.es:
Atilio, de 58 años de edad, está acompañado, estudió hasta sexto grado, su compañera de vida se dedica oficios de la casa, es padre de un hijo.

Atilio, se dedica a la agricultura desde siempre, aprendió el oficio por medio de sus padres, aprendió a cosechar sus alimentos.- Atilio, tiene un aparato para soldar, algunas veces trabaja soldando; sus cultivos están a 25 minutos de la casa y  llega hasta ahí caminando.

Atilio, utilizará el crédito para colocar un pequeño negocio de ropa para su esposa.  

Sus sueños son poder mantener la familia y darle buena educación a su hijo.
texts.en:
Atilio is 58 years old and is married. He studied through the sixth grade. His wife dedicates herself to running their home, and they have one son.

Atilio has always made a living in agriculture; he learned this business from his parents, specifically how to harvest different types of crops. He also has a welding device, and so he sometimes works in welding. He walks to get to his crops, which are about 25 minutes from his house.

Atilio will use this loan to set up a small clothing store for his wife. 

His dream is to be able to provide for his family and to give his son a good education.

loans.use: to set up a small clothing shop for his wife.

loans.name: Nelson Arturo

texts.es:
Nelson a sus 45 años de edad es le orgulloso propietario de un taller de mecánico que con años de esfuerzo, trabajo duro, ahorros, pudo montar.
Atiende todo tipo de necesidades, desde motocicletas, carros, cambio de llantas, entre otros. 
Es padre de 3 hijos de 2, 6, 12 años de edad dos de los cuales los tiene estudiando y el último por ser todavía tan pequeño lo cuida su esposa en su hogar.
Su objetivo para este año es mantener su negocio, incrementar la utilidad, matricular sus hijos en una institución y mejorar sus condiciones de vida, todos ellos irán muy de la mano con un crédito que se encuentra solicitando para la compra de herramienta, equipo de soldadura y una polichadora. 
Estas herramientas le darán un gran impulso pues podrá ofrecer estos servicios con toda comodidad sin necesidad de ir a otro taller a prestar o alquilar la maquinaria.
texts.en:
Nelson, at 45 years old, is the proud owner of an auto repair shop, which he was able to establish through years of effort, hard work, and savings.

He takes care of all kinds of needs, including motorcycles, cars, and changing tires, among other things.

He is the father of 3 children of ages 2, 6, and 12. Two of them are studying, and the other one, who is still very small, stays at home in the care of Nelson’s wife.

His goals for this year are to keep his business going, increase his profits, register his children in an institution, and improve his living conditions. All of these goals will go hand in hand with the loan that he is requesting to buy tools, welding materials, and a polisher.

These tools will give him a lot of momentum, since he will be able to provide his services with comfort and without needing to go to another workshop to borrower or rent machinery.

loans.use: to buy tools, welding equipment, and a polisher.

loans.name: Olga Cecilia

texts.es:
Ella es Olga una adorable mujer muy trabajadora de 60 años de edad, soltera sin hijos, muy independiente, siempre le gusto ser su propio jefe, no se veía empleada para alguna persona si recibir órdenes.
Olga se dedica a atender su negocio de salón de belleza, el cual ubica en su casa, la fuerte competencia y la nueva tendencia que ha cogido mucha fuerza la cual es las barberías ha venido quitándole clientes y ha hecho replantear su estrategia para atraer clientes,
Por eso con la ayuda de Interactuar quiere solicitar un préstamo para invertir en shampos, tintas, cremas, esmaltes, y entre otra variedad de productos capilares para enfocar sus servicios a mujeres.
texts.en:
Olga is an adorable, very hardworking 60-year-old woman. She is single and does not have children. She is very independent. She has always liked to be her own boss. She did not see herself being employed by someone else and taking orders.

Olga makes a living in her beauty salon, which is located in her house. The strong competition and the new strong trend towards barber shops have taken a lot of her customers, and have made her reassess her strategy for attracting customers.

For this reason, with Interactuar’s help, she wants to request a loan to invest in shampoos, dyes, creams, nail polish, and other hair products to focus on her services for women.

loans.use: to invest in shampoos, dyes, creams, nail polish, and other hair products to focus on her services for women.

loans.name: Melida Yamileth

texts.es:
Melida, de 26 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado debido a que salio embarazada, situacion que se le hiso dificil de poder seguir con su estudios, está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura, es madre de tres hijos, todos están estudiando.

Melida, desde hace 8 meses trabaja como empleada en una entidad de gobierno, hace trabajos de campo porque siempre le ha gustado este tipo de labores; anteriormente trabajaba como empleada domestica, ahora, va a iniciar a vender en el cafetín de una escuela, porque ya que no seguirá trabajando en la entidad de gobierno.

El cafetín está a 2 kilómetros de su casa y llega hasta ahí en bicicleta, su horario de trabajo es de 7:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m. luego tiene que incorporarse a los oficios del hogar.


Melida, está solitando el crédito para comprar carne, tomate, aceite, maíz y quezillo para la elaboracion de pupusas, espera tener ganancias y poder ayudar en lo económico a su familia.

Melida, sueña en poder comprar un terreno para poder construir su propia casa, ya que por el momento vive en casa rentada.
texts.en: Melida is 26 years old. She studied until third grade because she became pregnant, which made it difficult to continue her studies. She is in a relationship and her partner works in agriculture. She has three children who are all studying. For the past eight months, Melida has worked as a clerk for a government agency. She works in the field because she has always liked this type of work. Previously, she worked as a domestic employee and she will now begin selling in the school cafeteria. She will no longer work for the government agency. The cafeteria is 2 kilometers from her house and she gets there by bicycle. She works from 7:00 a.m to 4:00 p.m., heading home afterwards to do house work. Melida is asking for a loan to buy meat, tomatoes, oil, corn, and cheese to make pupusas (stuffed tortillas.) She hopes to make a profit and be able to help her family financially. Melida dreams to buy a plot of land to build her own home since she is currently renting a house.

loans.use: To buy meat, tomatoes, oil, corn and cheese to make pupusas (stuffed tortillas.)

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to increase her capital and to buy many items of clothing to resell for a profit.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente es un hombre que se destaca  con su familia por su amabilidad y su sinceridad en sus acciones, él tiene 40 años, tiene  3 hijos. Esta familia vive en una comunidad de Sololá. 

Vicente es un hombre muy soñador y es más porque ama a su familia, él trabaja duro para  que sus hijos tengan lo esencial.  Para generar su economía,  Vicente  es empleado en un hotel y trabaja en el área de mantenimiento, desde hace aproximadamente 15 años, de esta manera él ha logrado alcanzar algunas metas en la vida y por el bien de su familia. 
Vicente  para seguir buscando bienestar para su familia, él ahora necesita darle acabados a una construcción que realizo, para que  se le pueda dar uso  y que sus hijos tengan  mejor comodidad para vivir, pues para este trabajo él solicita un prestamo de diez mil quetzales.  Él  con sus ingresos pagara el prestamo y para lograr pagarlo lo más pronto es restringir  algunos  cosas con su familia para que puedan tener la casa que es lo más útil.
texts.en:
Vicente is a man who, along with his family, stands out as a result of his friendliness and the sincerity of his actions. He is 40 years old and has 3 children. This family lives in a community in Solola.  

Vicente is a dreamer, and since he loves his family, he works hard so that his children can have what they need. Vicente is employed by a hotel, and he has been working in maintenance there for approximately 15 years. In this way, he has been able to achieve some of his life goals, fighting for the well-being of his family.

In order to continue looking out for his family's well-being, Vicente needs to put finishing touches on a construction project that he carried out so that it can be used. This way, his children will be able to live more comfortably. He is requesting a loan of 10,000 quetzales for this project. He will repay this loan with his earnings. In order to repay the loan as soon as possible, his family will cut back on a few things so that they can use the house, which will be most useful to them.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Aissatou's Group

texts.fr:
Inauguré depuis le 14 Décembre 2012, les femmes du BV, il existe une bonne connexion entre les membres du groupe. Elles vivent dans le même village et entretiennent des relations de solidarité et d’entre aide. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.
 
Madame Aissatou, âgée de 23 ans (debout à l’extrême droite), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de 02 garçons. Elle s’active dans la vente de légumes qu’elle achète à Kolda pour les revendre dans son village et gère un cafeteria.

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle compte des légumes d’une valeur de 60000f qu’elle revend en détails, du lait, du pain, du café du charbon  d’une valeur de 30000f pour la gestion de son cafeteria.

Les bénéfices lui permettront de prendre en charge les besoins de la famille et de renforcer mon épargne.
texts.en:
The women of the banc villageois got their start on December 14, 2012. There exists a good connection between the members of the group. They live in the same village and maintain relationships of solidarity and mutual aid. As their main activity, they run small businesses.

Ms. Aissatou, 23 years old (standing to the far right), is the star borrower of the group. She is married and has two sons. She is active in the sale of vegetables which she buys in Kolda to resell in the village. She also manages a cafeteria. With this new loan, she expects 60,000 francs worth of vegetables which she will resell at retail prices, as well as a total of 30,000 francs worth of milk, bread, coffee, and charcoal to maintain her cafeteria. The profits will allow her to take care of the needs of her family and strengthen her savings.

loans.use: 60000 francs worth of vegetables that she will resell at retail, as well as 30000 francs worth of milk, bread, coffee, and coal for the management of her cafeteria.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies to help with her vegetable and strawberry crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a branded kiosk, mobile phone, framed fee posters, a cash box, and a chair. This loan will also provide the necessary funds for him to serve his customers.

loans.name: Anlly Tatiana

texts.es:
Ella es Anlly una morena de 20 años de edad, que desea iniciar su negocio de venta de arepas de queso, por lo que necesita tu apoyo para comprar varios insumos como lo son un carro de comidas rápidas para realizar las arepas, una pipeta de gas, utensilios, cubiertos desechables,  materia prima que son las arepas de queso, lecherita y un delantal.
La razón de la necesidad de este préstamo radica en que a sus 20 años ya tiene un pequeño hijo de 6 años de edad y al padre ser igual de adolecente y humilde de recursos no cubre la totalidad de los gastos por lo que Anlly iniciara a vender alimentos para buscar el bienestar de su pequeño.
texts.en:
This is Anlly, a brown-skinned lady, age 20, who wants to embark upon her business, which is selling arepas con queso [corn cakes with cheese].  She needs your support for this, in order to purchase various supplies such as a fast-food-wagon for making the arepas, a gas cylinder, utensils, disposable cutlery, ingredients for the arepas con queso, a milk can, and an apron.

The reason that she needs this loan is because at age 20, she already has a little boy, age 6; and as the father is also young and of humble means, not all of their expenses are covered.  Therefore, Anlly is going to start selling food in order to provide for the well-being of her little one.

loans.use: to purchase a fast-food wagon, a gas cylinder, utensils, disposable cutlery, ingredients for cheese arepas, a milk can, and an apron.

loans.name: Lucious

texts.en:
Lucious is 18 years old. He is very determined and hard working. Lucious is the third of four children in his family. His father is a secondary school teacher and his mother is a businesswoman selling fish. Lucious finished his secondary schooling and has since started his own business selling second hand shoes in order to support himself. 

Lucious is saving his profits with the hopes of going back to school to study business. His dream is to earn enough money to support himself and his family. Lucious has become a Zoona entrepreneur with the hopes of achieving this dream. He hopes to reinvest the profits from his Zoona business into other ventures to diversify his income flow. Lucious is very excited by this opportunity with Zoona as it will provide him with the means to achieve this independence. Lucious is requesting a loan in order to get working capital in order to help him get his Zoona business off the ground and have the means to achieve his dreams. He is relocating from his home in Blantyre to set up his business in Nkhata Bay, about 470.95 km away from his hometown. Lucious will use this loan to to pay for his Zoona branded trading kiosk and to buy a mobile phone, a chair and a cashbox. All these are important for Lucious to effectively kick-start his business and serve customers. 

Lucious sees this as a once in a lifetime opportunity and will work hard to make the business work.

loans.use: to purchase a branded kiosk, a mobile phone, framed fee posters, a cash box and a chair and to serve his customers.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a businesswoman. She comes from a family of 8. She is the first-born and has 3 sisters and 4 brothers. She lives with her sister and helps provide for her family. Grace is requesting a loan to set up a Zoona mobile money transfer business in Salima.

Grace started running her own business at a very young age. She started selling cooking oil in small containers so that she could pay for school and help her mother. The profits from the cooking oil business were very minimal, as she did not invest a lot of capital due to lack of funds. Today, Grace continues to run her small cooking oil business. She has seen the opportunity with Zoona and has decided to open her own Zoona mobile money transfer business. She is hopeful that the businesses will giver her bigger profit margins so that she can improve her standard of living.

Grace will purchase a Zoona branded kiosk, which she will use to serve her customers. She will also use the money to buy a mobile phone, which she will use to facilitate transactions.  The rest of the money will be used as her float. Float is the money that Grace will use to facilitate the sending and receiving of money from her kiosk. 

Grace’s biggest dream is to grow her business and empower her mother by providing her with employment.

loans.use: to purchase a branded kiosk, a mobile phone, framed fee posters, a cash box and a chair and to serve her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to start running her own Zoona mobile money transfer business by purchasing the equipment and funds needed to provide financial services in her community.

loans.name: Moreblessing

texts.en:
Moreblessing is 30 years old. She is living in Blantyre and is a businesswoman supporting her family, most notably her two children who are 7 and 3 years old. She lives with her sister in a household of 8. She operates her own Zoona money transfer business as a way to earn a living. 

Moreblessing has been running her mobile money transfer business for three months in Blantyre, Malawi. She is very happy with the way the business is going so far. She is requesting a loan so that she can pay for the kiosk that she is currently using to serve her customers. This loan will also help her pay for the mobile phone, chair, cashbox, branding materials and money that she uses to serve her customers. Zoona advanced her the working capital to start running her business.

Moreblessing is grateful for the opportunity to run her own business and become financially independent. She plans to move out of her sister’s house with her children soon. Her biggest dream is to see her children complete their education and become successful in life.

loans.use: to pay for the mobile phone, chair, cashbox, branding materials and money that she uses to serve her customers.

loans.name: Semu

texts.en:
Semu is 30 years old. He is single and lives with his parents in a household of seven people. Semu is an emerging entrepreneur. He has just completed training with Zoona to start running his own business. He is requesting a loan to start running his own Zoona mobile money transfer business.

Semu is excited for the opportunity to run his own business. He sees this as a chance for him to improve his life and stop depending on his father for basic needs. When Semu starts making profits from his business, he plans to move out of his father’s house so that he can live on his own and start helping out financially at home.

Semu will run his business in a small town called Liwonde. His business will provide financial services to people in the community. With this loan, Semu will be able to purchase a kiosk, which he will use to serve customers. He will also purchase an internet enabled phone to use for transactions. The money will also provide him float to service his customers.

Semu says his life will never be the same once he starts earning his own money. He thanks the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase a kiosk, an internet enabled phone and to have float to service his customers.

loans.name: Tereza

texts.en:
Tereza is 30 years old. She is married and has two children. She lives in Nkhota-Kota, Malawi. She has just completed training with Zoona to finally make her dream of running her own business come true. Tereza needs a loan to make her dream a reality. 

When Tereza finished secondary school, she took a short course in Human Resource Management. She describes herself as a hard worker who has passed through a lot of hardships in her life. She says this makes her very determined in whatever she applies herself to.

Tereza will use this loan to start up a business of mobile money transfers in her hometown of Nkhota-kota. She will be able to purchase a trading Kiosk, which she can use to serve her customers. She will also use the money to buy a mobile phone, which she will use to facilitate transactions. The other half of the funds will be used to serve her customers by providing the necessary funds needed for her to pay out customers who need to receive money. 

Tereza explains how running her own business will give her the opportunity to improve her family’s basic needs. This prospect excites her and she cannot wait to begin operating her very own Zoona mobile money outlet. She thanks the Kiva lenders for their support.

loans.use: to purchasing the equipment needed to serve her customers who need to access financial services so that she can start up a business of mobile money transfers

loans.name: Jose Elias

texts.es:
Elias, de 47 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, está soltero, su compañera de vida lo abandonó, el vive solo con su hija y nadie mas dependen de el. 

Elias, se dedica a la siembra de camarones desde hace unos 12 años se dedica a hacer este trabajo, trabajo que aprendió de un amigo que realizaba esta actividad, el lugar en donde tiene los camarones está a una distancia de 6 cuadras de su casa, su hora de trabajo es de 6:00 a.m. a 4:30 p.m. 

Elias, está solicitando el crédito para aumentar su producción de camarones.

Elias, sueña con mejorar su casa y que su hija se prepare en una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Elias is 47 years old and studied up to the 6th grade.  He is single because his life partner left him.  He lives alone with his daughter and has no other dependents. 

Elias has worked at shrimp cultivation for the past 12 years. He learned this trade from a friend who was doing this. The place where he cultivates the shrimp is six blocks away from his house, and he works from 6 a.m. until 4:30 p.m.. Elias is asking for this loan so he can increase his production of shrimp.  

His dreams are to fix up his house and for his daughter to earn a university degree.

loans.use: to increase his shrimp production.

loans.name: Ronnie William

texts.es:
Ronnie, es un joven estudiante que vive junto a su madre, 3 hermanos y 2 hermanas. Él es el 3° de los hermanos. Su madre trabaja vendiendo productos variados, como útiles escolares, regalos y cosméticos. Uno de sus hermanos labora como chofer de un camión. Su padre no vive con ellos. 
Ronnie empezó a laborar desde los 16 años como ayudante de calidad, ganando monto mínimo que no le permitían reunir lo suficiente para poder apoyar a su familia, es por ello que recibía también la ayuda de sus familiares. Entre el horario de trabajo y sus estudios, le es muy difícil culminar su carrera. 
Actualmente se encuentra estudiando el 5° Ciclo de Tecnología Ambiental, la cual le interesa mucho porque está dirigida al sector industrial, con tareas específicas, prácticas, relacionada con el tema de cuidado y conservación del medio ambiente. 
De no tener el apoyo de KIVA, Ronnie tendría que buscar trabajar el mayor tiempo posible para poder reunir el dinero necesario que le permita concluir exitosamente su último año de estudios. Es por ello, que él se siente inmensamente agradecido por contar con una organización como KIVA que le permitirá culminar satisfactoriamente sus estudios y así colaborar con la conservación del medio ambiente, que tanta falta hace.
texts.en:
Ronnie is a student and lives with his mother, three brothers, and two sisters. He is the third of the brothers. His mother earns her living selling a variety of products such as school supplies, giftware, and cosmetics. One of his brothers is a truck driver. Their father does not live with them.

Ronnie began working at the age of 16 as a quality control assistant earning minimum wage which didn’t provide him with enough money to help his family. In fact, he also used to receive money from relatives. Because of his work schedule and his studies, it is difficult for him to finish his professional training.

He is currently in the fifth cycle of a program in Environmental Technology, a course he is very interested in because it focusses on industry with specific tasks and practical applications, all on the topic of caring for and conserving the environment.

Without support from Kiva, Ronnie would have to find a long-term job to save enough money to pay for his final year of studies. For that reason he is immensely grateful for an organization like Kiva which will allow him to complete his courses and find a job in environmental conservation, an area where so much remains to be done.

loans.use: complete his final year of a course in Environmental Technology

loans.name: Marta Cecilia

texts.es:
Marta es una humilde campesina de 55 años de edad, es madre de tres hijos, cabeza de familia, vela por el sostenimiento no solo de su familia, sino también de sus animales que son su medio de sostenimiento, ella es ordeñadora, tiene unas vacas que representan el 100% de sus ingresos por eso acoge a estos animales como si fueran uno más de sus hijos.
Marta al ser madre cabeza de familia le queda muy difícil el sostenimiento de una finca, tiene múltiples gastos y la devaluación del precio de leche no le ayuda, por eso necesita de gran apoyo de personas de buen corazón para que le presten dinero para la compra de tres vacas, la razón es que estas tienen un precio de 3’300.000 pesos, cada una pues son vacas que producen de 25 a 30 litros de leche.
texts.en:
55-year old Marta is an ordinary woman who lives in the countryside. She has three children and is the head of the household. Not only is she responsible for her family but also for the animals that provide her income. Marta earns 100% of her living from the milk produced by her cows. For that reason she looks after them as if they were her children.

Because she is the head of the family, Marta finds it difficult to look after her farm too. She has many expenses and the falling price of milk isn’t helping. She needs help from generous people who will lend her money to buy three cows. Each cow will produce 25-30 litres of milk.

loans.use: buy three cows

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs for trade, which will allow her to improve her quality of life.

loans.name: Gladis

texts.es:
Gladis es una productora agropecuaria de 34 años de edad, muy trabajadora y luchadora como toda una campesina leal a sus principios, inicio su negocio por necesidad económica, ella mismo lo forjo no fue heredado por sus familiares pero aspira a que dicha profesión la realicen, alguna de sus dos hijas que aun están muy pequeñas de 9 y 4 años de edad pero muestran gran amor por los animales.
Gladis ha realizado dicha profesión pro varios años pero ahora alguna de sus vacas no están produciendo leche ya por su avanzada edad, por lo que necesita un crédito con urgencia para comprar dos vacas y seguir con su flujo de producción que le permite tener ingresos para vivir dignamente. 
Como las vacas tiene un valor muy elevado, hay que comprarles, vacunas, alimento especial, hay que realizarles fertilización in vito, con lo que justifica el monto solicitado.
Si apoyan a Gladis, apoyaran a una empresaria que diariamente aporta litros de leche los cuales recogen grandes empresa y distribuyen la leche que consumen miles de colombianos.
texts.en:
34-year old Gladis is a hardworking farmer and like all countrywomen, committed to her principles. She started her business because of financial necessity. She built it up herself because it was something she dreamed about; it wasn’t a business inherited from family. Her two young daughters aged 9 and 4 also show a great love of animals.

Gladis has been raising milk cows for several years, but now some of her cows have stopped producing milk because they are old. She therefore needs a loan urgently to buy two cows and continue producing milk. The purchase will allow her to have sufficient income to live a decent life.

Cows are very expensive. You have to buy them, vaccinate them, buy special feed, and then there is in vitro fertilization--that is why Gladis needs this loan.

By helping Gladis you will be helping a farmer who takes litres of milk daily to large businesses where it is distributed and then consumed by thousands of Columbians.

loans.use: buy two cows

loans.name: Einar Octavio

texts.es:
Como se puede apreciar en la foto el señor Einar trabaja incasablemente en la construcción de lo que será su forma de vida de ahora en adelante una tienda, recogiendo materiales reciclados, regalados, algunos comprados con sus propias manos ha levantado los exhibidores que se pueden apreciar en la foto pero aún le falta. 
Solicita un apoyo crediticio para para terminar la construcción de su tienda, comprar surtido de productos de la canasta familiar e iniciar un sueño con el que generara los recursos para él y su pequeña hija de 15 años de edad.
texts.en:
You'd never know from looking at this photo that Señor Einar worked tirelessly to build the store where he's standing, which will be his livelihood from now on. He built the store using some materials that had been recycled or donated and others that he bought himself. He also built the shelves that are visible behind him in the photo that are still bare. 

Señor Einar is applying for a loan so that he can finish construction of the store and purchase basic grocery items to stock it. These investments will thus allow him to start fulfilling his ambition to earn a living for himself and provide for his 15-year-old daughter.

loans.use: to purchase basic grocery items for his store.

loans.name: Maria Consuelo

texts.es:
María Consuelo es una madre cabeza de hogar, responsable, trabajadora, humilde y con un sazón para la cocina increíble, tiene dos hijas, estudiando, una de ellas con aspiraciones de universidad pero falta poco para completar el dinero de la matrícula.
Se desempeña en un restaurante haciendo el trabajo de chef, mesera, promotora, a veces apoyada por su hija mayor.
María consuelo aspira en un futuro poder mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, completar el dinero de la matrícula para la educación de sus hijas y que juntas progresen y conformen un negocio donde aspira a poder generar empleo para este año.
Solicita de manera cordial un apoyo para realizar reformas locativas, arreglo de la cocina, y surtido de alimentos, tu apoyo será muy significativo pues cubrirá algunas falencias que tiene en su cocina, la pintara del color de acuerdo a las normas sanitarias vigentes, y hará de su restaurante un espacio más agradable para el consumo de sus ricos alimentos.
texts.en:
María Consuelo is the head of a household and the mother of two daughters who attend school. One of the children hopes to attend a university after high school, but currently lacks a small amount of funds for tuition. 

María Consuelo is a trustworthy, industrious, and humble woman, with a great talent for cooking. She runs a restaurant, simultaneously filling the roles of chef, waitress, and hostess, sometimes with the help of her older daughter.  

María Consuelo hopes that she will be able to make improvements to her home, pay the tuition for her daughters' education, and that she and her children will together enjoy a better life. She also hopes that later this year that her business will generate jobs that she can fill by hiring people in her community.  

María Consuelo is very kindly applying for a loan for renovations to her business, repairs to the kitchen, and to purchase food supplies. Your support will be crucial as it will allow María Consuelo to make improvements to her kitchen, painting the walls to comply with health regulations. These renovations create a more pleasant atmosphere were her customers can enjoy her rich cuisine.

loans.use: to renovate her business, make improvements to the kitchen, and purchase food supplies.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 25 years old. She just finished her secondary schooling and is the second of three children in her family. Elizabeth lives with her widowed mother and two brothers, and she helps provide for them.

Elizabeth is requesting a loan that will provide her with the necessary capital to start her Zoona business. She will use these funds to purchase a Zoona branded kiosk, some branded fee posters, a web-enabled mobile phone, a chair and a cash box. The loan will also provide Elizabeth with the funds to serve her customers.

Elizabeth is excited by this opportunity with Zoona because it will allow her to serve her community and provide them with much needed access to financial services. She will set up her business in Mulanje, a small town that is the center of Malawi's tea growing industry. This location is key, as most of its population is unbanked. By setting up in Mulanje, Elizabeth will provide much-needed financial services to her community.

loans.use: to purchase a Zoona branded kiosk, some branded fee posters, a web-enabled mobile phone, a chair and a cash box, and to maintain a ﬂoat of funds to serve her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, nylon, buttons, fasteners, etc. to make her own clothing line.

loans.name: Mwai

texts.en:
Mwai is 23 years old. He is the third of four children in his family. Mwai lives in a household with eight other family members. He has worked contract jobs on and off since finishing secondary school in 2012. Mwai also started a business whereby he sells electronics, and he balances running this business with his contract work. Mwai is supporting his siblings through their education by paying for their school fees.

Mwai is excited to work with Zoona because it will give him the opportunity to learn more about being an entrepreneur and will bolster his business skills. He dreams of becoming a successful entrepreneur and of eventually opening his own school to teach computer skills.

Mwai is requesting a loan to access working capital to get his Zoona business off the ground and have the means of achieving his dreams. He will purchase a Zoona branded kiosk, some branded fee posters, a web-enabled mobile phone, a chair and a cash box.

With this loan, Mwai will be able to serve customers who need to access financial services in Ncheu. Ntcheu is a district in the Central Region of Malawi. It shares a border with the country of Mozambique. Zoona has done market research in Ncheu and has determined that its location is ideal for this type of kiosk. Mwai will be the main operator of Zoona mobile money transfers in the district, and a number of unbanked people in the community will be using his service.

loans.use: to purchase a Zoona branded kiosk, some branded fee posters, a web-enabled mobile phone, a chair and a cash box so that he can serve customers who need to access financial services.

loans.name: María Alix

texts.es:
María es una madre cabeza de familia, muy emprendedora y trabajadora, que se dedica al negocio de la confección de línea propia de ropa, con este negocio ha podido generar el sustento para ella y su hija de 19 años de edad, no solo ha mantenido su hogar, le brinda la posibilidad a su hija de estudiar en una universidad. 
María quiere solicitar de manera muy cordial un apoyo para comprar una maquina plana, insumo que le hace falta para completar su taller de confección, además de las ventajas en tiempo de producción, operación, y un posible empleo que podrá brindar.
texts.en:
María is a mother and the head of her household.  She is very hardworking and enterprising.  She works sewing her own line of clothing.  With this business she has been able to generate the income to provide for herself and her 19-year-old daughter.  Not only has she kept up her home, but she has also been able to give her daughter the chance to study in the university.

María wants to politely ask for some support in order to buy a tabletop sewing machine, something that she needs in order to be able to finish putting together her tailoring workshop.  It will also give her advantages in terms of production, operation, and the possibility of offering someone a job.

loans.use: to buy a tabletop sewing machine

loans.name: Lucelis Margot

texts.es:
Sincelejo es una zona muy afectada por la violencia, una zona pobre que necesita mucha incursión social, de entidades que se sensibilicen con la zona y aque apoyen generando oportunidades para que esta zona salga adelante.
Estas zonas son las favoritas de Interactuar una entidad sin ánimo de lucro que hoy vienen apoyando a la señora Lucelis, una persona incapacitada para trabajar, en impulsar un negocio de venta de productos de uso doméstico y personal, como lociones, perfumes, desodorantes, cremas de manos, productos de maquillaje entre otros.
La invitación es para que te unas y apoyes a una mujer como Lucelis que busca comprar surtido de productos anteriormente mencionados pues  con sus humildes ventas puede generar el sustento para su familia conformada por dos hijos a los que aspira sacar a delante para que no vivan en las condiciones que tienen ahora.
texts.en:
Sincelejo is a poor area greatly affected by violence, which needs a lot of social investment from organisations which can commit to the region and support it by generating opportunities so it can move forwards. 

Interactuar is a non-profit organisation which is heavily involved in the area. It supports people like Señora Lucelis, who is unable to work, to set up a business selling domestic and personal products such as lotions, perfumes, deodorants,hand creams, makeup and other items. 

You are invited to unite with and support women like Lucelis, who wants to buy more of the above products. With her humble sales, she can make a living to support her family, made up of two children, who she wants to carry forwards so that they do not have to live in the conditions they currently live in.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics such as lotions and creams.

loans.name: Jose Adan

texts.es:
Adan, de 66 años de edad, solo pudo estudiar hasta segundo grado, está acompañado y su pareja es comerciante de camarones, es padre de dos hijos, pero ya estan acompañados y viven aparte. 

Adan, se dedica a la siembra de camarones y al comercio de este producto desde hace 20 años, este trabajo lo aprendió de un pariente que le enseño el trabajo. El nos comenta que anteriormente se dedicaba a la agricultura, su trabajo está a una distancia de 4 cuadras de su casa, su horario de trabajo es de 6:00 a.m. a 6:00 p.m.

Adan, está solicitando el crédito para comprar cemento, hierro, arena y tablas, esto ayudará a tener una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Adan, sueña con poder comprar 7,500 metros de terreno, para dejarselo a sus hijos como herencia y poder mejorar su casa para estar más segura.
texts.en:
Adan, age 66, was only able to study until the second grade.  He is accompanied by his life companion, who sells shrimp.  He has two children, but they are already living with their companions, in their own homes.  

Adan has been raising and selling shrimp for 20 years.  He learned from his father, who taught him this work, and he says that before this, he worked in agriculture.  His work is about 4 blocks' distance from his house, and his work schedule is from 6:00 A.M. to 6:00 P.M.

Adan is requesting the loan in order to purchase cement, iron, sand, and planks.  This will help him to have a better quality of life for his family.

Adan dreams of being able to purchase 7500 meters of land [1.85 acres], in order to leave it to his children as an inheritance, and of being able to improve his house in order to be more secure.

loans.use: to purchase cement, iron, sand, and planks.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is 23 years old. She is the second born in a family of three. She lives with her mother and has always wanted to run her own business. Alice just finished training with Zoona so that she can start running her own Zoona mobile money transfer business in Mzimba, Malawi.

Alice completed her high school education in 2012 but did not go to college due to lack of sponsorship. Her mother is a single parent and could not afford to pay for her college fees. Alice says her life will change once she starts running her own business because she will be able to provide for her basic needs and help out her mother by buying groceries and paying for utility bills.

Alice needs a Kiva loan in order to start running her Zoona mobile money transfer business. The loan will be used to provide essential funds needed for her to serve her customers who need to access financial services. She will also use the loan to purchase a trading kiosk, a mobile phone, a chair, and a cash box. All these items are necessary for her to start her business.

Alice has big dreams for the future. Her dream is to run a successful business and take herself to college to study human resource management. She would also like to travel and see other countries one day.

loans.use: to start running her own Zoona mobile money transfer business.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is the first-born in a family of four. His main responsibility is to take care of his three siblings. He is 21 years old and lives alone in Blantyre, Malawi. Moses completed training with Zoona and is requesting a loan to start running his own Zoona mobile money transfer business in Blantyre. His business will service people in his community who need access to financial services.

Moses has faced a lot of hardships in his life. He has had to take care of himself from the time he was in high school, as his parents could not afford to. He learnt how to fix computers and would charge people a small fee so that he could buy food and pay for his school fees.

Today, Moses is happy for the opportunity to be connected to Kiva lenders through Zoona. He explains that getting a loan in Malawi is not easy. He tried to access a small loan to start running his own computer engineering business, but no bank would give him money as he does not have collateral. He hopes that being connected to the Kiva lenders will help his dream of becoming an entrepreneur become a reality.

Moses has requested a loan to access the working capital he needs to get his Zoona business off the ground and start serving his community. With this loan, he will pay for his setup costs, which include buying a branded trading kiosk, framed fee posters, some uniforms, an Internet-enabled mobile phone, a cashbox and a chair. The money will also be used as a float for him to serve his customers. He hopes that through his Zoona mobile money transfer business, he will be able to provide employment for his fellow youths.

Moses will use the anticipated profits from his business to provide basic needs for his siblings and himself. He thanks the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to start his own Zoona mobile money transfer business in Blentyre, Malawi

loans.name: José Horaldo

texts.es:
José Horaldo es un hombre que se destaca por ser amable y sincero, él tiene 26 años, vive con su familia en una comunidad de Sololá. 

José Horaldo es una persona con deseos de superación en la vida, pues José ha sido una de las personas que ha logrado sus metas, a través de los préstamos que ha  logrado obtener en ADICLA, los prestamos  ha sido de mucho beneficio para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. 

Pues José  Horaldo con la rapidez y amabilidad de las personas que lo atiende, solicita nuevamente   un prestamo  mas, esta vez le servirá para comprar materiales y pagar mano de obra para la construcción de su vivienda, para José es bien preciso  tener un lugar digno donde descansar. 
José es una persona responsable, porque lo ha demostrado con los prestamos  anteriores, él siempre ha sido puntual con su pago. José ha sido siempre un hombre soñador y él tiene la certeza de conseguir su prestamo,  el anhelo de José es ver en poco tiempo  su vivienda hecha realidad.
texts.en:
José Horaldo is a man who stands out for being kind and sincere.  He is 26 years old and lives with his family in the community of Sololá.

José Horaldo is someone with a desire to improve himself in life.  He has been someone who has met his goals through the loans that he has gotten through ADICLA.  The loans have been of great help in improving his family’s living conditions.

With the quickness and friendliness of the people who take care of him, he is asking once again for a loan.  This time it will help him to buy materials and pay for the labor to build his home.  José sees it as a necessity to have a decent place to rest.

José is a responsible person.  As he has demonstrated with his previous loan, he has always been punctual in making payments.  José has always been a visionary, and he is confident he will get his loan.  José great desire is to see his home made a reality in just a short while.

loans.use: to build his home

loans.name: Balbino Jimenez

texts.es:
Balbino, de 62 años de edad, solo estudió hasta segundo grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios de la casa, es padre de tres hijos, pero todos tienen sus propios hogares.

Balbino, se dedica a trabajar en una entidad de gobierno desde hace 6 meses, en sus tiempos libres desempeña el trabajo de agricultura, oficio que aprendió desde que tenia 10 años de edad, fue su padre que le enseño este trabajo, él cultiva maíz, frijoles y maicillo. 

Su trabajo está a una distancia de 2 kilómetros, su horario de trabajo es de 7:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m. 

Balbino, está solicitando el crédito para instalar la energia eléctrica en su casa, esté servicio nunca lo ha tenido, es por eso que mejorará su calidad de vida.

Balbino, sueña con poder comprar una vaca lechera y reparar su casa.
texts.en:
Balbino is 62 years old, and left school after 2nd grade. He has a partner who looks after their home. He has three children, who all have their own homes.

Balbino has worked in a government body for six months. In his free time, he works in agriculture, which he learned from the age of ten from his father. He grows corn, beans and sorghum.

His work is 2 kilometres away from his home, and his working hours are 7:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. 

Balbino is requesting a loan to install electricity in his home, a service he has never had, but which will improve his quality of life.

Balbino dreams of being able to buy a dairy cow and repair his home.

loans.use: to install electricity in her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sweets, soft drinks, basic grains, coffee, soup, eggs, jelly, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es: Jose de 64 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su esposa, el se dedica desde hace 10 años a la venta de queso y crema vende de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su casa y tiene mucho clientes, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de  mas queso y crema por mayor para poder seguir con sus ventas y asi poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
José is 64 years old, married, and lives with his wife and their two children in a home that the family owns. He has for the past ten years run a business selling cheese and cream in the various neighborhoods near his home, and has built up a large customer base. 

José is applying for a loan for the purchase of wholesale cheese and cream so that he can continue his sales and boost his income.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale cheese and cream.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase soups, eggs, staple grains, soft drinks, snacks, pastries, and other grocery items.

loans.name: Maria Eugenia

texts.es:
María es una mujer soltera de 46 años de edad, madre de una adolecente de 16 años de edad, ella no tiene empleo, no tiene un pensión, no tiene una pareja que le ayude con los gastos, muy preocupada por su situación, quiere acudir ante ustedes para que la apoyen con un préstamo con el cual iniciara su propio negocio como comerciante donde distribuirá, tendidos, lencería, ropa interior, y pijamas.
Con la ayuda de este negocio tendrá una actividad económica para hacer frente a las múltiples deudas que acojan a un hogar común y lo más importante podrá llevar alimento a su hogar.
texts.en:
María is a single woman aged 46, who has a teenage daughter aged 16. She does not have a job, or a pension, or a partner to help her with her expenses. She is extremely concerned about her situation, so she wants to ask you to support her with a loan to set up her own business as a trader, selling sheets, lingerie, underwear, and pyjamas.

This business will give her an economic activity with which she can face the many debts of a shared household and, more importantly, support her family.

loans.use: to buy sheets, lingerie, underwear and pyjamas to set up her business.

loans.name: Carlos Enrique

texts.es:
Carlos es un campesino que ha vivido en las zonas rurales toda la vida ejerciendo como ordeñador en un negocio que el mismo fundo y con el que sostuvo a una familia conformada por su esposa y dos hijos. 
Se caracteriza por ser una persona muy ordenada, muy correcta y trabajadora, que lo ven desde tempranas horas de la madrugada ordeñando sus vacas y alimentándolas.
Carlos quiere solicitar un pequeño monto de dinero para completar el dinero que necesita para comprar una vaca, la necesidad es debido a que si no la compra en un periodo determinado de tiempo se la venderán a otra persona.
texts.en: Carlos is a farmer.  He has lived in rural areas all of his life and has his own business milking cows that supports his family, comprised of his wife and two children.  He is a very organized, polite and hard working person.  He is up very early in the morning milking his cows and feeding them.  Carlos wants to request a small loan to have enough money to buy a cow.  He needs the money now because if he doesn't buy the cow within a certain timeframe, it will be sold to someone else.

loans.use: to purchase a cow to improve his business and his farm.

loans.name: La Amistad Group

texts.es: “LA AMISTAD” es un grupo conformado por socios responsables  y trabajadores. Amelia tiene 61 años de edad es casada con 06 hijos independientes. Ella se dedica a la venta de comida rápida frituras pollo broster hamburguesas  salchipapas en las afueras de su vivienda hace muchos años. De esa manera puede apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de su hogar. El crédito lo invirtió en la compra de más papas pollos aceite y platos descartables. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Amelia es la segunda del lado derecho viste buzo negro. De la misma manera se encuentra adjuntado en la parte superior izquierda de Junior que no pudo estar presente en la reunión del grupo por motivos laborales.
texts.en:
The "LA AMISTAD" ["Friendship"] group consists of trustworthy and hardworking members. Amelia is one of the members, 61 years old, a wife, and the mother of six grown children who live on their own. She has for many years run a business outside her home selling fried chicken and sausages with french fries. The business has allowed her to help her husband meet their household budget. 

Amelia has invested the loan funds in the purchase of more potatoes, chicken, cooking oil, and disposable plates. The group members are grateful to Kiva lenders for their support. Amelia is second from the right in the photo, wearing a black vest. One of the group members, Junior, was working and could not attend this meeting of the group; his photo appears at the upper left.

loans.use: to purchase chicken, potatoes, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Ana Irma

texts.es: Ana de 54 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su hijo, Ella posee una venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 15 años, ubicado en el mercado municipal  que está cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Ana solicita un préstamo para poder comprar más frutas y verduras por mayor, para tener mejores ingresos y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana is 54 years old. She is a single mother who lives in her own house with her son. She has been selling fruits and vegetables  for 15 years in the municipal market that is close to her place of residence. She manages to pay some of the household expenses with what she earns from her sales. Ana is requesting a loan to be able to buy more fruit and vegetables wholesale to have better income and a better quality of living.

loans.use: to buy more fruit and vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Maria Elida

texts.es: Maria de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cinco hijos,  ella se dedica a la venta de conchas desde hace 7 años vende de manera ambulante por los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas conchas por mayor y asi poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Maria is 32 years old and lives in her own house with her 5 children. She has been selling shellfish for 7 years. She sells itinerantly in the different markets that are close to her house. With what she makes from her sales she manages to pay some of the household expenses. Maria is requesting a loan to buy more shellfish wholesale and doing so obtain more income to have a more stable economy.

loans.use: to buy more shellfish wholesale.

loans.name: Balhiya

texts.ru:
Балхия 53 лет. Она проживает в районе Дж.Руми. Она замужем, имеет одного единственного сына, который сейчас находится на заработках в Российской Федерации. Он помогает родителям с финансовыми трудностями.
