 Балхия 10 лет своей жизни посвятила выращиванием крупнорогатого скота. Она занимается животноводством у себя во дворе. Ей в работе помогает муж. Балхия хочет расширить деятельность. Она планирует покупать несколько крупнорогатого скота и увеличить поголовье скотов. У нее крупные планы в будущем. Она хочет в будущем улучшить и расширить бизнес животноводство. Ваш кредит поможет ей достичь своей целей.
texts.en:
Balhiya is 53 years old. She lives in the J.Rumy region. She is married and has a single son, who is currently in the Russian Federation as a migrant worker. He helps his parents with their financial difficulties. 

Balhiya has dedicated 10 years of her live to cattle breeding. She works with this in her yard. Her husband helps her with the work. Balhiya would like to expand her business. She plans to purchase some cattle and increase their headcount.

Balhiya has big plans for the future. She would like to improve and expand her cattle breeding business. Your loan will help her reach her goal.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and expand her business

loans.name: Martha Cecilia

texts.es:
La ilusión de Martha comienza está comenzando, ese anhelo de tener un negocio propio, ser independiente y de sus manos tratar de generar un mejor futuro para su familia que la conforman tres hijas se asoma a la  puerta y es que con un crédito que está muy esperanzada en recibir apoyo, iniciara su venta de alimentos, serán comidas rápidas.
Martha no tiene capital, solo unas ganas enormes de trabajar por ello con un crédito que se encuentra solicitando, comprara un carro de comidas rápidas, utensilios, y surtido de alimentos para iniciar rápidamente su nuevo cambio de vida, donde podrá tener un negocio para apoyar en los gastos del hogar, para el estudio de sus hijos y para ella.
texts.en:
Martha is beginning to achieve her dream and desire of having a business of her own, of being independent, and with her own hands, forging a better future for her family, which comprises three daughters.  She is on the threshold, and with the much-hoped-for loan, and the support that she will receive, she will launch her fast-food sales business.

Martha has no capital, only an enormous will to work for it; and with the loan that she is requesting, she will purchase a fast-food wagon, utensils, and a supply of foods, in order to quickly embark upon this new life, in which she will have a business with which she can provide for the household expenses, for her daughters’ education, and for herself.

loans.use: to purchase a fast-food wagon, utensils, and a supply of food, in order to launch her new business quickly.

loans.name: Henry Nelson

texts.es:
Henry un hombre de 36 años, padre de un pequeño de 2 años de edad, propietario de un cultivo de frutas muy afectado pro fuertes granizadas que lo han llevado a tener medidas preventivas, las cuales se pueden apreciar en la foto.
Su sueño es poder tener una vivienda propia, y trabaja diariamente para lograr este objetivo, aprendió sus habilidades de agricultura de su padre y aspira en un futuro trasmitirle esos conocimientos a su pequeño que está en etapa de crecimiento.
Henry se presenta a ustedes con una necesidad la cual es comprar insumos para el mantenimiento de las tierras, como abonos, riegos, pesticidas y fungicidas, la razón es que estos insumos tienen un elevado costo que no están a su alcance y requiere de un crédito para poder pagarlos.
texts.en: Henry is 36 years old and father of a 2 year old son.  He has a fruit crop that has been heavily affected by strong hail storms, so he has had to protect his plants, as you can see in the photo.  His dream is to have his own home, and he works every day to achieve this goal.  He learned agricultural skills from his father and in the future he hopes to teach these to his child as he grows up.  Henry needs to purchase supplies to maintain his land such as fertilizer, irrigation, pesticides, and fungicides.  These items are expensive and since he cannot afford them he needs a loan in order to pay for them.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, irrigation, pesticides and fungicides.

loans.name: Gladis Adriana

texts.es:
Gladis es una vendedora de comidas rápidas, madre de dos hijos de 13 y 11 años de edad, una incapacidad la privo de un trabajo y busco la forma de generar ingresos y desde su hogar sale todos los días vender comidas rápidas, algunas las prepara en su cocina, se siente muy feliz de desempeñar una actividad que le cree independencia económica de su esposo que siempre estuvo apoyándolo, pero con su trabajo ha mejorado la calidad de vida de los suyos.
Solicita un préstamo para realizar algunas modificaciones a su carro de comida, para desplazarlo más fácil dado que por su incapacidad no puede realizar mucho esfuerzo, también para la compra de panes, cubiertos, panes, ensaladas preparadas, carnes etc.
texts.en: Gladis has a business selling fast food.  She is mother to two children, ages 13 and 11.  A disability prevented her from getting a job so she looked for some way to generate an income.  She goes out every day to sell fast food, some of which she prepares in her kitchen.  She is very happy doing an activity that provides her with financial independence from her husband who was always supporting her.  With this work she has improved the quality of life for her family. She is requesting a loan to make some modifications to her food cart to make it easier to move around, as she cannot apply much force due to her disability.  She will also buy rolls, utensils, prepared salads, meats, etc.

loans.use: to make some modifications to her food cart.

loans.name: Rajabmo

texts.ru:
Рачабмо жительница района Дж.Руми. Ей 33 лет. Она замужем и у нее пять детей. Трое из них ходят в школу. Ее муж находится на заработках в Российской Федерации, по той причине, что он не нашел себе работу в родных краях. Он старается много работать, чтобы его родные не голодали. Заработанные деньги он  отправляет домой. 
Рачабмо тоже трудолюбивая женщина. Она любить трудиться. Рачабмо сейчас занимается шитьем женской одежды. Она освоила кройку и шитье два года назад. Рачабмо хочет купить новую швейную машинку, потому что старая швейная машинка хорошо не исполняет свои функции. Для улучшения процесса работы ей нужно получить кредит купить новую швейную машинку, по этой причине Рачабмо обратилась за кредитом. Она понимает, как мужу тяжело обеспечить семью, она хочет ему помочь и занимается шитьем одежды на заказ.
texts.en:
Rajabmo is a resident of the J.Rumy region. She is 33 years old. She is married and has five children. Three of them go to school. Her husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation, because he could not find work in his native land. He tries to work a lot so that his family does not starve. He sends the money he earns home. 

Rajabmo is also hardworking. She loves to work. She currently sews women's clothing. She learnt to cut and sew two years ago. Rajabmo would like to purchase a new sewing machine because the old one does not fulfill its function well. 

To improve her work processes, Rajabmo needs to get a loan to purchase a new sewing machine. Therefore she applied for a loan. She understands how difficult it is for her husband to provide for the family, and would like to help him and sew clothing on order.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to remodel his house.

loans.name: Bibisara

texts.ru: Это Бибисара. Ей 52 лет. Она проживает в районе Пяндж. Бибисара как многие жители района занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. Этим видом деятельности она занята 16 лет. Бибисара имеет не большую часть земли, где она выращивает сельскохозяйственные культуры. Она готовится к посеву нового урожая и по этой причине она обратилась за кредитом. Для нее данная деятельность является единственным источником дохода. На запрашиваемый кредит Бибисара купить минеральные удобрение и качественные семена урожая. Бибисара надеется на Вашу помощь и считает, что с Вашей помощью она сможет закончить посев и на следующий сезон собрать богатый урожай.
texts.en:
This is Bibisara. She is 52 years old and lives in the Pyandj region. Bibisara works with field crop cultivation, like many residents of the region. She has worked with this for 16 years. 

Bibisara has a small plot of land where she grows crops. She is preparing for sowing a new harvet and for this reason she applied for a loan. This business is the only source of income for her. For the loan requested, Bibisara will purchase mineral fertilizers and quality crop seeds.

Bibisara hopes for your help and believes that with your help she will be able to finish the sowing and get a rich harvest.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers and quality crop seeds

loans.name: Bahriniso

texts.ru: Бахринисо жительница района Пяндж. Она трудолюбивая женщина. Бахринисо 9 лет назад решила освоить деятельность родителей и идти по их стопам. Она сейчас тоже занимается растениеводством у себя во дворе. В течение 9 лет Бахринисо постоянно сажает новый урожай. В этом году она хочет посадить картофель и морковь. Бахринисо за счет кредита купит семена картофеля, морковь и минеральные удобрение. У Бахринисо не получилась собрать достаточную сумму денег для купли семян для посева урожая и у нее все надежда остается на кредит. Ваш кредит поможет ей получить урожая на следующий сезон.
texts.en:
Bahriniso is a resident of the Pyandj region. She is a hardworking woman. 9 years ago she decided to learn her parents' business and follow in their footsteps. Currently she also works with field crop cultivation in her yard. 

Bahriniso has sown new crops regularly during the 9 year period. This year she would like to sow potatoes and carrots. With the loan she will purchase potato and carrot seeds and mineral fertilizers. 

Bahriniso did not manage to save sufficient money to purchase seeds for the harvest and all her hopes are in the loan. Your loan will help her get a harvest in the next season.

loans.use: to purchase potato and carrot seeds, and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Ganiyakhon

texts.ru: Ганияхон жительница северной части Таджикистана, города Исфары. Вот уже несколько лет, как Ганияхон занимается выпечкой. Ей 28 лет. Она замужем. Ее муж в данное время находится на заработках за пределами страны. Ганияхон работает в цехе, где  около рынка арендует цех, где она каждый день выпекает булочные изделия и вкусные фатиры (это национальная слоёная лепешка) и оттуда прямо в горячем виде отправляет на рынок. Ее товар быстро расходится. Ганияхон сейчас нуждается в кредите для развития бизнеса. Она на сумму кредита хочет купить муку, сахар, масло, кефир и разрыхлитель для выпечки. Она очень хороший пекарь и у нее всегда вкусно получается.
texts.en:
Ganiyakhon is a resident of the city of Isfara in the northern region of Tajikistan. She is 28 and married and has been working as a baker for several years. Her husband is currently working abroad. She rents space in a bakery near the market where she makes buns and delicious fatirs (a local type of flatbread) every day and then sells them hot at the market. Her goods sell out quickly. 

Ganiyakhon currently needs a loan to develop her business. She wants to use the loan amount to buy flour, sugar, oil, kefir and baking powder for her baking. She is a very good baker and always has delicious results.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, oil and other ingredients for her bakery

loans.name: Abelino

texts.es:
Abelino tiene 50 años de edad, tiene hogar estable al lado de su cónyuge y sus hijos, vive en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Santo Tomás que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura y ganadería.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de ganado vacuno, las que cría en inverna ubicada en su terreno, se dedica a esta actividad hace 21 años contando con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El destino del crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de ganado vacuno para engordarlo y luego venderlo, con esto Abelino espera incrementar su nivel de ventas lo que le va a permitir mejorar su nivel de ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Abelino is 50 years old, and he has a stable home along with his spouse and their children. He lives in his own house, made of rustic materials, in the district of Santo Tomás.  It is located in the province of Cutervo, in the Cajamarca Region in Peru’s northern sierra.  Life in this district is tranquil; the people here work mainly in agriculture and livestock-raising. 

He raises and sells cattle. He raises them on a winter pasture that is located on his land. He has been doing this work for 21 years, and he has experience in the business and very good personal and professional references in the zone.

The loan is destined for the purchase of more cattle to fatten and sell. With this, Abelino hopes to increase his sales, which will allow him to improve his income and thus his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle to fatten and sell.

loans.name: Miriam Elizabeth

texts.es: Miriam vive en casa propia con sus cuatro hijos, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 8 años, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Miriam lives in her own house with her 4 children. For the past 8 years, she has had a small store, which is located in the place where she lives. She has lots of customers as a result of her good prices and the friendliness with which she conducts her sales. With what she earns from her sales, she is able to cover some of her household expenses.

She is requesting a loan to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, beverages, snacks, sweet bread, etc. so that she can earn a better income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, beverages, snacks, sweet bread, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sodas and potatoes at wholesale.

loans.name: Primavera De Sapahaqui Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “PRIMAVERAS DE SAPAHAQUI” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Patacamaya, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Celia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de frutas, producción de frutas, venta de hortalizas, venta de canastas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Celia es integrante, ella indica que es la primer año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promoción masiva de la institución que realizaron en su zona. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de producción y venta de frutas; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió hace varios años, por herencia de sus padres, mismos que trabajaban con el mismo negocio y ella apoyaba desde niña.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de semilla por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The “Primaveras De Sapahaqui” Communal Bank will begin the second cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Patacamaya Regional Office.  It is composed of eight members and directed by a board of directors, of which Señora Celia is president.  The communal bank’s members have various businesses, which include selling fruit, growing fruit, selling vegetables, and selling baskets.

The loan they are taking out will benefit the women micro-entrepreneurs of whom Señora Celia is a member. She says that this is her first year as a member of Pro Mujer, and that she joined at the invitation of the institution during a massive promotion that it was running in her zone. She has a business producing and selling fruit, and she says that she learned this business years ago. It was passed down to her from her parents, who worked with the same business themselves, and it has supported her ever since she was a little girl.

The loan that she will take out now is for increasing capital through the purchase of wholesale seed that she will acquire from the wholesale vendors in the city of La Paz, and sell later in her stall. This form of work allows her to generate the resources to support her family financially, as she is married with two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the training that the institution offers.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale seed.

loans.name: Rina Margarita

texts.es: Rina tiene 36 años de edad y vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella posee desde hace 4 años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rina is 36 years old and lives in her own house with her family.  For 4 years, she has owned a small store located in place of residence.  She has many clients because of her good prices and how friendly she is.  She is requesting a loan to be able to purchase more soup, eggs, staple grains, sodas, snacks, sweet bread, etc. in order to have a better income and quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more soup, eggs, staple grains, sodas, snacks, sweet bread, etc

loans.name: Roobell Yanira

texts.es: Roobell de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella se dedica a la confección de ropa desde hace 11 años, su taller de costura lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y posee muchos clientes por la calidad con que realiza la ropa, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de hilos, agujas, variedad de tela, botones, elásticos, etc. y así poder continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Roobell is 41 years old She lives in her own house with her son. She has made clothing for 11 years. Her sewing studio is located in his home. She has many customers due to the quality of her clothing. She earns enough to take care of some household expenses. She is requesting a loan to purchase thread, needles, fabrics, buttons, elastic, etc. She will be able to continue with her work which generates a good profit.

loans.use: buy thread, needles, fabrics, buttons, elastic, etc.

loans.name: Ana Elvia

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer trabajadora, con arte y capacidad de fabricar grandes prendas y artículos de decoración para el hogar en lana.
Son artículos que fabrica artesanalmente, el complejo  y los materiales que pone en cada artículo son costosos, la mano de obra es demorada pero el cavado es hermoso. 
Ana junto con su esposo formó un hogar donde nacieron 5 hijos y ella con sus artesanías que tiene desde el año 1980 aporto capital para que vivieran dignamente. 
Solicita un crédito para la compra de materiales como agujas, hilos, lana para farbicar sus bellas prendas y artículos de decoración. 
Hay que tener en cuenta que trabaja con materiales finos para lograr una mejor satisfacción del cliente por lo que el valor que solicita lo justifica con la calidad de materiales que trabaja.
texts.en: Ana is a hardworking woman, with art and ability to make great accessories and decorative articles for the home out of wool. These are artisanal items she makes by hand. The complexity and the materials used in each piece are expensive.  The labor is slow but the result it beautiful.  Ana and her husband have 5 children together. She has had her craft business since 1980 and has brought money into the home so that could live comfortably. She is requesting a loan to purchase materials such as needles, thread, and wool to make her beautiful pieces and decorative items. Keep in mind that she works with fine materials to achieve the best customer satisfaction. The amount she is requesting is justified due to the quality of the materials she uses.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as needles, thread, and wool to make her beautiful pieces.

loans.name: Jose Rene Antonio

texts.es:
José, es comerciante, tiene 31 años de edad, está acompañado, tiene dos hijos, estudió hasta noveno grado y su compañera de vida se dedica a los oficios del hogar.

José, se dedica a la compra y venta de chatarra desde hace 10 años, este oficio se lo enseño su tío, quien también se dedicaba a este trabajo todos los días. 

José,  necesita el préstamo para comprar un vehículo, ya que en el que trabaja es alquilado y paga $15 dólares cada día, adquiriendo su propio vehículo considera le quedara un poco más de ganancia.

José, sueña con tener su propio vehículo, comprar chatarra al por mayor y venderlo directamente a las fabricas distribuidoras de hierro.
texts.en:
Jose, 31, is a merchant. He is married and has two children. He studied through 9th grade; his wife is a homemaker. Jose has been buying and selling scrap metal for 10 years, a trade he learned from his uncle who does the same work every day.

Jose needs a loan to buy a vehicle, since the one he uses for work is a rental for which he pays $15 a day. Getting his own vehicle will allow him to keep more of his earnings. Jose dreams of having his own vehicle and being able to buy scrap metal in bulk and sell directly to the iron distribution factories.

loans.use: to buy a vehicle.

loans.name: Alma Morena

texts.es: Alma de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijas, ella se dedica a la venta de billetes de lotería desde hace varios años vende de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias que están cerca de su casa, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas billetes de lotería para continuar con sus ventas ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Alma is 44 years old and lives in her own house with her three daughters.  For many years, she has made a living selling lottery tickets.  She sells them by walking through different communities that are near her house.  With the money that she earns, she is able to relieve some of her household expenses.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more lottery tickets in order to continue with her sales to be able to have a better income, as it is her only source of work.

loans.use: to purchase more lottery tickets

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to continue improving her humble home by putting in the floor and changing the doors so that she can guarantee the safety of her family

loans.name: Ros Mery

texts.es:
Ros Mery tiene 59 años de edad, es casada, vive con su esposo en casa propia en una comunidad pequeña en el distrito de Zaña que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de cerdos así como para la compra de alimento para la crianza de los mismos. De esta manera Ros Mery espera hacer crecer más su negocio, obtener más ingresos y poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ros Mery is 59 years old.  She lives with her husband in her own house in a small community in the Zaña district, located in the Chiclayo province of the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Perú.  The residents of this district make a living primarily in agriculture, livestock raising, and trade.

She makes a living raising and selling pigs.  She has more than 10 years of experience in the business, with regular customers who can provide very good personal and work references for her.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more pigs, as well as food to raise them.  In this way, Ros Mery hopes to grow her business, obtain a better income, and be able to improve the quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: to purchase more pigs, as well as food to raise them

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente es un hombre muy sincero y a raíz de su sinceridad, ha logrado sus metas, él tiene 54 años tiene una familia de 8 hijos, algunos ya casados. Vicente con su familia vive en una comunidad de Sololá llamada Chaquijya. 

Vicente es una persona que ama su trabajo, para alcanzar el bienestar de su familia,  él para generar su economía, trabaja como agricultor sembrando diversidad de hortalizas. Pues para Vicente no era suficiente sobrevivir con la agricultura, pues hace cinco años coloco una pequeña tienda de abarrotes, este negocio lo tiene en su domicilio donde vive, y por la amabilidad que atiende es visitada la tienda, Pues Vicente con este resultado, decide buscar un  prestamo para equiparlo más, ya que existen  productos que aún no están al alcance de las personas.  La meta de Vicente es agrandar su tienda, para generar más ingresos. 
El sueño de Vicente es que con los ingresos que genere la tienda y la agricultura es construir otra casa y la actual donde él  vive será de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Vicente, 54, is a very sincere man, and this sincerity has been at the root of achieving his goals. He has 8 children, some of whom are already married. He and his family live in a community outside of Solola called Chaquijya. Vicente loves his work as a farmer, planting a variety of vegetables, because it allows him to generate income to provide for his family's well-being.

For Vicente, agriculture alone wasn't enough to survive, so five years ago he put a small grocery store in his home. It is a busy store, thanks to his friendliness. Vicente decided to look for a loan to better equip his store, since there are products that are out of reach of his customers. His goal is to grow his business to generate more income. His dream is to use the income from the store and his farm to build another house so that he can give his current house to his children.

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Patricia Enith

texts.es:
Ella es patricia una mujer creativo y muy recursiva que por falta de oportunidades de trabajo y por una necesidad económica muy marcada, se dedicó  a la venta independiente de mercancía por catálogo, gracias a este actividad ha encontrado la manera de generar recursos para el mantenimiento de sus dos hijos que son menores de edad. 
Su principal dificultad es el cobro de cartera que la deja en muchas ocasiones sin capital de trabajo para el próximo es por dicha razón que solicita un crédito para la compra  de surtido como lociones, desodorantes, acolchados, maquillajes, etc.
Este crédito le permitirá tener mercancía para promocionar y seguir buscando un mejor futuro para los suyos.
texts.en: Patricia is a very creative and resourceful woman who, due to a lack of employment opportunities and serious financial need, works independently selling merchandise by catalogue.  Thanks to this activity she has found a way to generate income to support her two young children.  Her biggest challenge is collecting payment, which often leaves her without working capital for the next order.  For this reason she is requesting a loan to purchase a selection of lotions, deodorants, padded bags, and makeup.   This loan will provide her with merchandise to promote and continue seeking a better life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a selection of lotions, deodorants, padded bags, makeup, etc.

loans.name: Kairos Group

texts.es:
Sarah es una mujer de 36 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y su negocio es la venta de repuestos para motocicleta.
Ella es optimista, feliz, de buena actitud, comprometida con su trabajo, generosa, amable, independiente, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona de ‘plan 3000’ un área caracterizada por el gigantesco crecimiento de su población; mineros relocalizados del occidente y etnias como ‘Los Ayoreos’ nativas del lugar, se establecieron en el área. La siguiente generación, en su mayoría se ocupa del comercio y manufactura en todas las áreas. De clima cálido, tropical y húmedo, con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 21-35 grados centígrados.
Sarah es de piel trigueña, cabello negro largo ondulado, complexión física robusta, estatura mediana, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza (sentada la primera de la izquierda, viste una polera celeste y azul). Sus deseos de superación la llevaron a liderar una banca de personas con negocios como; venta de mandiles, venta de chompas de alpaca, venta de polleras, venta de chamarras para niños, venta de jugos batidos, taller de soldadura y tapizado de autos, para solicitar un préstamo y cumplir sus objetivos.  Su vida la comparte con sus padres que ya no trabajan porque son muy mayores, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. Su actividad principal es la venta de repuestos para motocicleta, tales como neumáticos y tubos, velocímetro, espejo retrovisor, las piezas de motores, bujías, etc. “hace un par de años emprendí mi negocio de venta de repuestos; actualmente no cuento con mucho capital pero tengo clientes constantes que me hacen pedidos y el dinero se mueve solito…” comenta. Su sueño es tener una empresa de transporte de moto taxi. Ella desea realizar la compra de variedad de repuestos para motocicleta para contar con una oferta constante. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos en 3 años que viene desarrollando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Sarah solicita un préstamo para la compra de variedad de repuestos para motocicleta para contar con una oferta constante y generar mayores ventas.
texts.en:
Sarah, 36, is single and has no children. Her business is selling motorcycle repair parts. She is a happy person, an optimist with a good attitude. She is committed to her work and is generous, friendly, independent, responsible and hardworking. Sarah has dark skin, long wavy black hair, a robust figure, medium stature. At home she speaks her native tongue, Guarani, while Spanish is used in general culture and for business. She is seated first on the left, dressed in a blue shirt.

Her business is located in "Plan 3000", an area known for its enormous growth in population. Miners relocated from the west as well as the native Ayoreos people established the area. The next generation of inhabitants became merchants and manufacturers. The area has a tropical climate, warm and humid, with daytime temperatures that range from 21-35C.

Sarah's goal of self-improvement led her to head up a village bank made up of people with businesses including: selling aprons, selling alpaca sweaters, selling skirts, selling children's jackets, selling smoothies, a welding workshop and car upholstery.

She lives with her parents, who are retired. They own their home, which is made of brick with a tin roof and has potable water, electricity and sewer.

Her primary activity is selling repair parts for motorcycles, like tubes, tires, speedometers, rearview mirrors, spark plugs, motor parts, etc. She says, "a few years ago I started my business. I don't have much capital but I have consistent customers who place orders and the money moves itself."

Her dream is to have a motorcycle transport business.She wants to buy a variety of motorcycle parts to always have on hand. This is her second loan in the 3 years she has been running this business. This loan will help her to generate greater profits.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle repair parts to generate more sales.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre casado de 32 años de edad, vive junto a su hermosa familia en una comunidad de Sololá. Jorge es un hombre que ha logrado prosperidad con su familia, esto ha sido gracias a los préstamos que se le ha facilitado en esta institución. Jorge manifiesta, que el primer prestamo que tuvo, pudo  sembrar  en el tiempo estipulado y logro tener buena cosecha y le genero ganancias y con esta ganancia logro colocar una pequeña tienda de abarrotes se siente dichos porque tiene una fuente más de ingresos. 
Con este avance pudo mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, a él le gusta solicitar prestamo en esta institución en primer lugar porque ya conozco la metodología de trabajo y en segundo lugar porque el prestamo se lo dan con rapidez. 
Ahora Jorge solicita un segundo prestamo; que le servirá para capital de trabajo para su nuevo cultivo, con este prestamo estaría comprando: semillas, fertilizantes y todo lo necesario para su cultivo, Jorge tiene esperanzas de conseguir su prestamo cuanto antes, ya que durante este mes es buena época para hacer la siembra. 
Jorge está seguro de que esta nueva cosecha le volverá a dejar ganancias y con este estaría apoyando la educación de sus hijos y alcanzar otras metas más.
texts.en:
Jorge is a 32 year-old married man and lives with his beautiful family in the Sololá community.  Jorge is a man who has achieved prosperity with his family, thanks to the loans that this institution has provided for him.  Jorge expresses that with his first loan, he was able to sow his seeds during the required time frame and managed to have a good harvest that generated him earnings.  With these earnings, he was able to invest in a small convenience store.  He feels lucky because he has another source of income.

With this progress, he was able to improve the living conditions of his family.  He likes to apply for loans with this institution because he already knows the work methodology and also because the loans are given to him quickly.

Now Jorge is requesting a second loan that he will use for working capital for his new crops.  With this loan, he would purchase seeds, fertilizers, and everything necessary for his crops.  Jorge hopes to obtain his loan as soon as possible, as this month is the best sowing time.
Jorge is certain that this new harvest will provide him with earnings again.  With them, he would support his children’s education and achieve other goals.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for agriculture

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es: Noemí de 58 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de pescado desde hace varios años, vende de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias que están cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de mas pescados por mayor para poder seguir con sus ventas y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Noemí, 58, owns the home where she lives with her family. She has been selling fish for some years. She sells by walking through the different neighborhoods near her home. Her earnings cover some of the costs of her home.

She is asking again for a loan to buy more fish at wholesale prices so that she can continue with her sales and have more income.

loans.use: to buy more fish at wholesale.

loans.name: Juan De Jesus

texts.es:
Juan, de 36 años de edad, es comerciante, estudió hasta sexto grado, está acompañado, tiene 4 hijos y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos en casas particulares, además, con ellos vive su suegra.

Juan, se dedica a la venta de cocos desde hace 8 años, se dedicaba a la pesca, pero se cambió de domicilio y decidió dedicarse a este comercio, en el cual le apoya su familia, vende todos los días y está a ubicado a una distancia de 5 cuadras de su casa de habitación.

Juan, necesita el préstamo para comprar más cocos, porque en esta temporada el coco tiene un mayor precio y quiere aprovechar para comprar bastante, para obtener mayores ganancias.

Juan, sueña con obtener cada vez más ganancias, para que sus hijos tengan una mejor calidad de vida y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Juan is 36 years old. He is a businessman. He studied through the sixth grade. He has a partner and four children. His partner takes care of domestic duties in personal homes. In addition, they live with his mother-in-law. 

Juan has sold coconuts for eight years. He used to fish, but he moved and decide to dedicate himself to this business. He is able to support his family. He sells every day. His business is located five blocks from his home. 

Juan needs a loan to purchase more coconuts. At this time, coconuts have a higher price. He wants to take advantage of this and he wants to take advantage of this by buying a lot to have bigger profits. 

Juan dreams about earning more so that his children will have a better quality of life and become professionals.

loans.use: buy more coconuts.

loans.name: Ricardo Adolfo

texts.es: Ricardo de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica desde hace varios años a la reparación de bicicletas su taller lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de repuestos y llantas par bicicletas todo por mayor para continuar con su trabajo y asi poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Ricardo is 49 years old and lives in his own home with his wife. He has been working for the past several years repairing bicycles in his shop, which is located in his home.  He is able to pay for household expenses through this work.  He is asking for a loan in order to purchase replacement parts and tires for bicycles, all in bulk, in order to continue with his work and in that way increase his income.

loans.use: to purchase replacement parts and tires for bicycles, all in bulk.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el posee una librería ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 10 años tiene muchos clientes por la variedad de productos y los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene en su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de cuadernos, lapiceros, papelería, pegamento, memorias, colores, etc. todo por mayor y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Manuel is 39 years old and lives in his own home together with his wife and three children.  He owns an office supply store located in his home and has had it for 10 years.  He has many customers due to the variety of his products and his good prices.  He is able to support his family through this work.  He is asking for a loan in order to purchase notebooks, pencils, paper, glue, memory sticks, crayons, etc. all in bulk in order to improve his income and thus his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase notebooks, pencils, paper, glue, memory sticks, crayons, etc. all in bulk

loans.name: Carlos Humberto

texts.es:
Carlos es un moreno muy alegre, respetuoso y honrado que con su negocio de legumbrera logra mantener  a su familia conformada por su hija de 10 años y su esposa, y con este negocio que lo tiene de 1998, busca juntar recursos para comprar una vivienda propia que es su gran sueño.
Carlos solicita un crédito para la compra de surtido como lo son pepinos, zanahorias, tomates, plátanos, fresas, aguacates, cilantro, lechugas, repollo, papas, entre otros vegetales y frutas.
Con la ayuda de este préstamo Carlos abastecerá su negocio y las ganancias serán un excelente plante para seguir de la mejor manera posible este año.
texts.en:
Carlos is a very happy man who is respectful and honest with his business.  He works selling vegetables and fruit and in this way is able to support his family, which is made up of his wife and 10 year old daughter.  He has had this business since 1998, and he is looking to save money in order to purchase his own home.  That is his great dream. 

Carlos is asking for a loan in order to purchase a range of items such as cucumbers, carrots, tomatoes, plantains, strawberries, avocados, cilantro, lettuce, cabbage, potatoes, and other fruits and vegetables.  

With the help from this loan Carlos will supply his store and with his earnings it will provide him with an excellent foundation to continue in the best way possible this year.

loans.use: to purchase cucumbers, carrots, tomatoes, plantains, strawberries, avocados, cilantro, lettuce, cabbage, potatoes, and other fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Ruth Mary

texts.es:
Ruth, es una mujer muy luchadora, toda una guerrera, responsable de 34 años de edad, separada de su esposo, pero nunca le faltaron los pantalones para sostener su hogar que lo comprenden ella y su pequeño de 14 años de edad quien representa su fuerza vital y su motivo para seguir adelante hacia una mejor calidad de vida.
Ruth tiene una tienda de abarrotes pero paralelo presta el servicio de fotocopiadora, su principal objetivo para este año es no depender de proveedores de productos congelados, si no tener su propio congelador y surtirlo de variedad de productos, por esta razón solicita un crédito para la compra exclusiva de un congelador esperando que le represente buenas ventas para seguir pagando la educación de su hijo y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ruth is a fighter, a warrior. She is 34 years old and is separated from her husband.  But she does not lack any strength for sustaining her household which is made up of her 14 year old child.  Her son represents Ruth's motivation and vital force, pushing her to move forward toward a better quality of life. 

Ruth has a small corner store and she also offers photocopying services.  Her main goal for this year is to not depend on providers of frozen products, but rather to have her own freezer and stock it with a variety of products.  For this reason she is requesting a loan in order to purchase a freezer.  She hopes that this will offer good sales in order to continue paying for her son's education and improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a freezer.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita, tiene 40 años de edad, es casada, tiene 3 hijos y reside en el municipio de Trujillo, Colon. Ella siempre se ha dedicado al comercio, vende comidas y golosinas en una cafetería que tiene en un local que alquila y también vende productos de la canasta básica familiar en una pulpería como son arroz, manteca, frijoles, azúcar, pan, churros, refrescos, dulces etc. Con el propósito de ofrecer más productos a su clientela ha solicitado un prestamo por 21,000 lempiras, con el cual va comprar azúcar, arroz, frijoles, manteca, refrescos, churros, pan, huevos, productos de limpieza y otros abarrotes para vender y obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Margarita is 40 years old. She is married, has 3 children and lives in the town of Trujillo, Colon. She has always worked in commerce. She sells foods and sweets in a cafeteria that she has at a location that she rents. She also sells products of daily need in a small grocery store, such as rice, shortening, beans, sugar, bread, chips, soft drinks, sweets, etc. With the goal of offering more products to her customers, she has requested a loan of 21,000 HNL (Honduran Lempiras), with which she will buy sugar, rice, beans, shortening, soft drinks, chips, bread, eggs, cleaning products, and other grocery items she can sell to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, beans, shortening, soft drinks, chips, bread, eggs, cleaning products, and other grocery items she will sell.

loans.name: Damdinsuren

texts.en:
Mr. Damdinsuren, 36 years old, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been transporting people between Ulaanbaatar and Darkhan, the second largest city of Mongolia. His wife teaches at the high school. Their son goes to elementary school, while their daughter stays at kindergarten. 

He is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD to buy spare parts in order to repair his car. His family's main income comes from his taxi service, so it is important to repair his car. Also, a repaired car will ensure the safety of his passengers.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to repair his car.

loans.name: Lory Joy

texts.en:
Lory Joy is 36 years old and a widow with three children, and one child is still in school. She works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell like shampoo, noodles, canned goods, spices, etc.

Lory Joy has been in this business for five years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell like shampoo, noodles, canned goods, spices, etc.

loans.name: Lucita

texts.en:
Lucita is 56 years old and has four children. She is married, and one of her children is still in school.

Lucita is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Lucita has been in business for ten years now and has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en:
Cynthia is a single woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 22 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Cynthia has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 7,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional fish to sell to her customers.

Cynthia has been in this business for two years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Erlyn

texts.en:
Erlyn works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines.

Erlyn requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell.

Erlyn has been in this business for five years now, and also earns additional income from a general store.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Johan Stiven

texts.es:
Johan es un hombre emprendedor, muy soñador, creativo que con poco ha logrado grandes cosas, se dedica a la confección a terceros en el pequeño negocio que se apreciar en la foto logra generar 5 empleos.
Su necesidad radica en ampliar su espacio de operación, pues tiene pensado generar más empleo, peor para ello necesita atraer un mayor número de clientes y tiene las referencias para hacerlo. 
Johan viene hoy ante ustedes para que conozcan el proyecto de un hombre que con dos hijos, con pocos recursos monto un taller de confección y ahora pide su colaboración para comprar insumos de confección como son surtido de diferentes colores de hilo, broches, mantenimientos de máquinas etc. 
Su meta para final de año es adecuar su espacio, estar más amplio para colocar más máquinas y así brindar empleo.
texts.en:
Johan is an enterprising man, a dreamer, a creative person who, with only a little, has achieved great things. He does sewing sub-contracting in a small business that you can see in the photo. He has been able to create 5 jobs.

He needs to expand his place of business. He plans to create more jobs, but to do it he needs to attract a larger number of clients and he has the references to do so. 

Johan comes before you all today so you can become familiar with the work of a man, who with two children and few resources, started a sewing workshop and is now requesting your collaboration so he can purchase sewing inputs such as a stock of different colored threads, snap buttons, maintenance for sewing machines, etc. 

His final goal for the year is to improve his space, make more room for installing more machines, so he can then provide more jobs.

loans.use: sewing inputs such as different colored threads, snap buttons, maintenance for sewing machines, etc.

loans.name: Omar Segundo

texts.es:
Omar es un sonriente hombre de 45 años de edad, que todos los días sale a las calles a rebuscar el sustento de su familia, lo hace pedaleando en su coche donde vende alimentos a buen precio. 
Es padre de tres hijos de 12, 14, y 10 años de edad y aunque es un hombre muy humilde, muy bajo de recursos, siempre encuentra la forma para generar los ingresos para cubrir sus gastos.
El desea impulsar su negocio, mejorar las ventas, incrementar su utilidad y para ello necesita capital de trabajo que no tiene, por eso quiere pedir un préstamo para la compra de surtido para realizar sus alimentos, y si le sobra capital ira comprando los materiales para construir otro vehículo para salir a vender alimentos.
texts.en:
Omar, 45, is a smiling man who every day goes out to look for sustenance for his family. He pedals his cart around selling food at a good price. He is a father of three children, ages 10, 12 and 14, and even though he is a humble man of few resources he always finds a way to make enough money to cover his expenses.

He wants to push his business, improving sales and increasing his profits. For that he needs capital that he doesn't have, which is why he asks for a loan to buy ingredients to make his foods. If he has capital leftover he will buy materials to build another vehicle to sell his food.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to prepare his food.

loans.name: Alianza De Mujeres (Jipijapa) Group

texts.es:
EL Grupo De Crédito Alianza De Mujeres está formado por 11 mujeres y 2 hombres que tiempo atrás decidieron juntarse y formar este grupo de crédito el cual les ha servido de  de mucha ayuda para salir adelante en sus negocios. Ellos se reúnen cada quince días en el Cantón Jipijapa, cantón conocido con el nombre de la sultana del café, por los extensos cultivos de café el cual tiene un sabor incomparable. 
Una de las socias de este grupo es la señora Paola, tiene 24 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tiene un hijo de 4 años y actualmente está en su séptimo mes de embarazo de sus segundo hijo Su marido es taxista.
Doña Paola es una mujer que le gusta trabajar para ayudarle a su marido  a mantener el hogar, ella  tiene una tienda de víveres en la casa de sus padres en la cual vive con sus marido y su pequeño, allí vende todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad como aceite, arroz, detergentes, carne, pescado, queso, entre otros productos, le gusta su negocio ya que se gana lo suyo sin salir de su hogar y está al tanto de las necesidades de su pequeño hijo, ella tiene más de 5 años con este negocio.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar víveres para surtir aun más su tienda. Lleva 3 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por los beneficios que recibe de la institución. Sus sueños son tener su casa propia y su bebé.
texts.en:
The loan group “Alianza de Mujeres” [Alliance of Women] is made up of 11 women and  2 men who a while ago decided to get together and form this loan group, which has been very helpful to them in getting ahead with their businesses. They meet every fifteen days in the cantón of Jipijapa, a cantón well-known as the “Sultan of Coffee,” due to its extensive coffee farms, the coffee of which has incomparable flavor. 

One of the members of this group is Paola. She is 24 years old. She is in a common-law marriage and has 4 year-old child from this relationship. She is also seven months pregnant with her second child. Her husband is a taxi driver.

Paola is a woman who likes to work in order to help her husband provide for their household. She has a store selling groceries in her parent’s house, where she lives with her husband and her child. She sells all kinds of products of daily need, such as cooking oil, rice, detergents, beef, fish, and cheese, among other products. She likes her business because she can earn an income without leaving the house, so she can take care of the needs of her young child. She has had this business for 5 years.

She will use this loan to buy grocery items to better stock her store. She has been in the loan group for 3 years and she likes it because of the benefits she receives through the institution. Her dreams are to have her own house and her baby.

loans.use: to buy grocery items for her store.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell rice business in the Philippines.

Jocelyn requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of rice to sell.

Jocelyn has been in this business for 20 years now, and also earns additional income from raising pigs.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of his family.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 35 years old and has two children who are still in school.

Jocelyn has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more sacks of rice to sell.

Jocelyn has been in this business for five years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Kristine Marie

texts.en:
Kristine Marie is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 32 years old and has three children who are still in school.

Kristine Marie has a buy-and-sell used clothes business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more boxes of used clothes to sell.

Kristine Marie has been in this business for three years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more boxes of used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Sandra Maria

texts.es:
Sandra es una mujer de 39 años de edad, madre de 3 hijos todos ellos adolecentes, se dedica a la venta de mercancía como productos de uso personal, como desodorantes, talcos, perfumes, maquilla, también vende útiles escolares y productos para el hogar. 
Sandra es felizmente casada, y junto con su esposa están en un proyecto para pagar la educación universitaria de sus tres hijos, juntos trabajan en cada una de sus labores para aportar para este sueño mutuo.
Ella pide tu apoyo, el cual necesita para la compra de surtido de útiles escolares, productos de uso personal y del hogar netamente para vender.
texts.en:
Sandra is a 39 year old woman and the mother of three children, all adolescents. She works selling merchandise like personal products such as deodorant, talcum powder, perfume, makeup and she also sells school supplies and household products. 

Sandra is happily married and along with her husband, is in a project to pay for a university education for their three children. They each work in their jobs to contribute to this mutual dream.

She requests your support which she needs to purchase an assortment of school supplies, personal and household products, purely for sale.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of school supplies, personal and household products, purely for sale.

loans.name: Lieu's Group

texts.en:
Lieu, born in 1963, is a member of the Kinh ethnic majority. She has been in the program of M7-MFI since August, 2013. She lives with her husband in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main occupation is small business so the income is not significant. It is just enough to cover the family’s living expenses. She is planning to invest in raising pigs for meat and breeding chickens but she hasn’t got enough money. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan to buy pigs and breeding chickens.

She hopes the loan amount will help her family invest in breeding effectively. The next year when she sells the pigs and chickens it will bring her family a considerable interest. She will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to buy pigs and breeding chickens

loans.name: Jane Irene

texts.en:
Jane Irene is 26 years old, single and has one child.

Jane Irene is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Jane Irene has been in this business for one year now, and has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Ma. Fatima

texts.en:
Ma. Fatima is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 38 years old and has four children who are still in school.

Ma. Fatima has a direct selling business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more products to sell.

Ma. Fatima has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more products to sell.

loans.name: Luz Dary

texts.es:
Luz Dary es una mujer de 44 años de edad es madre de dos hijos de 8 y 13 años de edad, se caracteriza por ser una persona muy servicial, amigable y responsable.
Luz Dary tiene una heladería, en donde una multinacional de helados le ayudo con indumentaria y neveras por acoger su nombre y distribuir solo sus productos. 
Ella tiene una petición y es un préstamo para comprar surtido de sabores de helados, barquillos, conchas, cucharas, vasos plásticos, servilletas, pues inicia la temporada escolar y como esta va casi a lo largo de un año es la temporada que mejores ventas presentan y quiere recibir a los estudiantes con ricos sabores de helados.
texts.en:
Luz Dary is 44 years old. She is the mother of two children who are 8 and 13 years old. She is a very helpful, friendly, and responsible person.

Luz Dary has an ice cream store where a multinational ice cream company helped her with uniforms and freezers in exchange for displaying the company’s name and selling only its products.

She is requesting a loan to buy a stock of various flavors of ice cream, ice cream cones, ice cream cones in the shape of bowls, spoons, plastic cups, and napkins. The school year is starting and since it's almost one year long, this is the season with the best sales. She wants to have good ice cream flavors for the students.

loans.use: to buy a stock of various flavors of ice cream, ice cream cones, ice cream cones in the shape of bowls, spoons, plastic cups, and napkins, because the school year is about to start.

loans.name: Ha's Group

texts.en:
Ha, born in 1989, is a Thai ethnic woman. She lives with her husband and her two children, one son and one daughter in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main income is from cultivation, so the income after deducting all costs is just enough to cover the basic living expenses of the family and save a little amount left. She wants to buy fertilizer for the coming coffee season, but she doesn’t have enough money. So, she wants to borrow a loan for this purpose.

She hopes the loan will help her family invest effectively in the coffee field with high productivity, and it will bring her family a considerable interest. She will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 41 years old and has three children who are still in school.

Marilou has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell.

Marilou has been in this business for 15 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell

loans.name: Kelly Viviana

texts.es:
Kelly es una mujer de 32 años de edad, dedica la venta de bisutería, negocio que inicio por vocación al trabajo independiente y con el que ha podido cubrir muchas necesidades económicas pues ella es madre de una adolecente de 16 años de edad.
Kelly como se ve en la foto está un poco obesa y es su peso uno de sus principales retos para este 2015, quiere rebajar y poner en forma su estado físico y su negocio, ya que tiene ciertos problemas cuando necesita realizar largos desplazamientos.
Kelly quiso comentar este deseo para que tengan un mayor acercamiento con su historia y sus metas para este año son aumentar sus ventas, mejorar sus ingresos y buscar montar un local comercial.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de mercancía en bisutería de diferente material, aretes, collares, pulseras, en fantasía, hierro, cobre, murano entre otras.
texts.en:
Kelly is a 32-year-old woman who sells jewelry which is a business she began as her independent vocation. She has been able to cover many economic needs with this business. She is the mother of a 16-year-old child.

Kelly, as seen in this photo, is a little obese and weight is one of her main challenges for this year of 2015. She wants to get into shape and improve her fitness for her business because she has certain problems when she needs to travel long distances.

Kelly commented about this wish so that she could have a better reconciliation with her past and her goals. For this year, her goals are to increase sales, improve her income, and find and establish a place to have a shop. 

She applied for this loan to purchase jewelry merchandise and different materials including earrings, necklaces, bracelets, costume jewelry, iron, copper, and glass beads, among others.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise and materials for her jewelry business

loans.name: Tomás

texts.es:
Tomas es un señor de 40 años de edad, él vive en una comunidad de Argueta Sololá,  su familia lo conforma su esposa y sus tres hijos. 

Tomás es un padre muy responsable con su trabajo y sobre todo con su familia, para lograr su ingreso económico, él trabaja en una institución fuera de su comunidad, esto lo hace con el fin de ser un poco mejor asalariado.
 Los hijos de Tomas están aún estudiando, y en varias ocasiones les dejan tareas que deben de trabajarlo a computador como ellos no cuentan con esta máquina, ellos salen con sus amigos para elaborar los trabajo, en medio de esta necesidad Tomas y su esposa deciden buscar un prestamo de diez mil quetzales, para comprar un equipo de cómputo que consiste en computadora con su propia impresora,  Tomás es un hombre muy responsable con los ingresos que devenga Tomás pagar el prestamo poco a poco. 
Uno de los sueños de Tomas para con sus hijos, es que ellos sigan estudiando hasta  lograr ser profesionales, para que pueden tener mejores condicione de vida.
texts.en:
Tomás is 40 years old. He lives in the community of Argueta Sololá. His family is made up of his wife and their three children.

Tomás is very responsible as a father and with his job and his family. In order to earn a living, he works in an institution outside of his community. He does this in order to earn a little bit better salary.

Tomás’ children are still studying and sometimes they have homework that they should do on a computer. Since they don’t have one, they go to their friends’ houses to do that homework. Due to this necessity, Tomás and his wife decided to request a loan of 10,000 GTQ (Guatemalan Quetzal) in order to buy a computer set that consists of the computer and a printer. Tomás is a very responsible man and with what he earns, he will repay the loan a little at a time.

One of Tomás’ dreams is for his children to continue studying until they become professionals, so they can have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a computer and printer.

loans.name: Elizabeth Del Socorro

texts.es:
Elizabeth es una mujer de 53 años de edad, madre soltera de 2 hijos de 20 y 18 años de edad, con un sueño de poder brindarles educación y mejorar las condiciones de vivienda de su hogar.
Se dedica a la venta de mercancía como lo son lociones, desodorantes, talcos, maquillaje entre otros.
Está actividad la realiza ambulantemente divagando por puertas, con vecinos, con familiares buscando ventas para llevar a su hogar un alimento que consumir.
Elizabeth busca tener sostenibilidad de negocio y dado que sus productos los pide por catálogo quiere realizar un pedido al por mayor para que le salga más económico y poder sacar mayor rentabilidad de sus ventas.
Con el préstamo pedido quiere comprar lociones, maquillaje, cremas de manos, siempre buscando un mejor futuro para su familia.
texts.en: Elizabeth is 53 years old, and is a single mother with two children aged 20 and 18. Her dream is to be able to provide them with an education, and to improve the living conditions for her family. She works selling products such as lotions, deodorant, talcum powder, makeup, and other things. She sells door-to-door to neighbors and relatives, in order to provide food for her household. Elizabeth would like to sustain her business. She orders her products from a catalogue, and would like to place a wholesale order, which will be cheaper and will allow her to earn more profit from her sales. With the loan she would like to buy lotions, makeup, and hand cream. She is always looking for a better future for her family.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics for her business.

loans.name: Rosaura

texts.es:
Rosaura tiene 39 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia en el distrito de La Matanza que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en el caserío se desarrolla tranquilamente, sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y crianza de animales.

Ella se dedica a la producción y venta de verduras, realiza esta actividad desde hace 01 año, contando con experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de una refrigeradora para conservar en buen estado las verduras que vende, con esto Rosaura espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ventas y le generará mayores ingresos lo que mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Rosaura is 39 years old, and lives with her life partner in their own home. She lives in the district of La Matanza, which is located in the province of Morropon, in the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru. Life in the hamlet is quiet, and its residents work in agriculture and livestock. She works growing and selling vegetables, and has done this for one year. She has experience in the business, and established customers who provide her with good personal and professional references. The loan will be used to buy a refrigerator to keep the vegetables that she sells in good condition. This way, Rosaura hopes to provide better products to her customers. This will have a positive impact on her sales, and create more income which will improve the quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator to keep the vegetables that she sells in good condition.

loans.name: Elizabeth Juana

texts.es:
Olmedo es uno de los últimos cantones creados en la provincia de Manabí, las fuentes de riqueza de Olmedo son la agricultura (cultivos de café, cacao, banano, plátano, maíz, arroz, cítricos) y grandes extensiones de pasto para ganado vacuno.
En este lugar vive la señora Elizabeth, tiene 64 años de edad, es madre soltera de  tres hijos  mayores de edad,   aún vive con ella un hijo. Ella vive en casa propia.
Doña Elizabeth con la finalidad de obtener sus propios ingresos y aprovechando sus conocimientos en corte y confección puso en su casa un pequeño taller de costura, ahí ella se dedica a confeccionar todo tipo de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, trabaja a base de pedidos de personas particulares, este lo tiene por más de 47 años,  también tiene un bazar en el cual vende materiales para costura (encajes, tiras bordadas, telas, hilos, botones, cierres, etc.) Trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 22h00 y a veces hasta más tarde cuando tiene pedidos que entregar ya que este está en su casa.
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar telas y otros materiales para la costura. Le gusta Fundación por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos y el interés es bajo. Su sueño es tener el Bazar más grande y completo que haya en Olmedo.
texts.en: Olmedo is one of the last cantons created in the province of Manabí. Its sources of wealth are agriculture (coffee, cocoa, banana, plantain, corn, rice and citrus crops), and large areas of pasture for cattle. Elizabeth lives here. She is 64 years old and is the single mother of three grown children, one of whom still lives with her. She lives in her own home. In order to earn income, and because she knew people in the tailoring business, she started a small sewing business in her home. She makes all kinds of clothing to order for women, men and children, and has been doing this for 47 years.  She also has a shop where she sells sewing materials (lace, embroidered strips, fabric, thread, buttons, fasteners, etc.) She works every day from 6:00 am until 10:00 pm, and sometimes later when she has orders to fill, as she works from home. This new loan will be used to buy fabric and other sewing materials. She likes Fundacion because of the help that it provides with loans, and  the interest is low. Her dream is to have the largest and fullest shop in Olmedo.

loans.use: to buy fabric and other sewing materials.

loans.name: Kevin Hernan

texts.es:
Olmedo es uno de los últimos cantones creados en la provincia de Manabí, las fuentes de riqueza de Olmedo son la agricultura (cultivos de café, cacao, banano, plátano, maíz, arroz, cítricos) y grandes extensiones de pasto para ganado vacuno.
En este lugar vive es señor Kevin tiene 20 años de edad, está soltero y estudia el sexto semestre de electromecánica, vive con sus padres en casa propia.
Don Kevin con la finalidad de obtener sus propios ingresos y aprovechando sus conocimientos en mecánica automotriz y electromecánica  puso en su casa un pequeño taller donde se dedica a reparar motos. Trabaja todos los días en las tardes porque en las mañanas estudia.
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar repuestos para las motos de diferentes marcas y modelos. Tiene un año en el grupo comunal, le gusta la unidad del grupo y la facilidad de los créditos.   Sus sueños es terminar sus estudios y ser un buen profesional a más de tener la mejor mecánica especialista en motos.
texts.en:
Olmedo is one of the last cantons created in the province of Manabí. Olmedo's sources of richness are agriculture (coffee, cacao, bananas, plantains, corn, rice, and citrus crops) and large extents of pasture for cattle.

Señor Kevin lives in this place. He is 20 years old. He is single and is studying in the sixth semester of electromechanics. He lives with his parents in their own house.

Don Kevin, with the goal of obtaining his own income and taking advantage of his knowledge in auto mechanics and electromechanics, set up a small workshop at his house where he repairs motorcycles. He works every day in the afternoons, because in the mornings he goes to school.

He is going to use this new loan to purchase spare parts for motorcycles of different makes and models. He has been in the communal loan group for a year. He likes the unity of the group and the convenience of the loans. His dreams are to finish his studies and be a good professional, and further, to be the best mechanical specialist in motorcycles.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for motorcycles

loans.name: Lucia Magdalena

texts.es:
Olmedo es uno de los últimos cantones creados en la provincia de Manabí, las fuentes de riqueza de Olmedo son la agricultura (cultivos de café, cacao, banano, plátano, maíz, arroz, cítricos) y grandes extensiones de pasto para ganado vacuno.
En este lugar vive la señora Lucia, tiene 70  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene cinco  hijos mayores de edad. Su esposo no trabaja, viven en casa propia.
Doña Lucia para salir adelante junto a su familia tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa,  ahí vende todo tipo de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras y frutas,  trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, un nieto que vive con ella  y su esposo le ayudan en su trabajo cuando están desocupados, pero es ella la que más pasa en su negocio ya que es ahí donde le gusta estar ya que además de ganarse la vida se entretiene y se informa de las novedades que pasan a sus alrededor. Tiene treinta años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir más su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Grupo De Crédito  hace tres  años y le gusta la unidad del grupo y que los créditos son rápidos y fáciles sin tantos documentos. Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
Olmedo was one of the last counties created in the province of Manabí. Olmedo’s sources of wealth are agriculture – including crops of coffee, chocolate, bananas, plantains, corn, rice and citrus fruits – and large tracts of pasture for cattle.  

In this place lives Señora Lucia, who is 70 years old, is married and has five grown children. Her husband does not work, and they live together in their own home. 

In order to get by, Doña Lucia together with her family has a small grocery store in her house where she sells all types of products such as rice, sugar, oil, detergent, vegetables, greens and fruits. She works everyday from 6:00 am until 8:00 pm – and sometimes much later. 

A grandson that lives with her and her husband helps her with the business when he is not busy. But, it is Doña Lucia who spends the most time at the store because that is where she likes to be as she makes a living and learns about the news around her neighborhood. She has made a living through this business for 30 years, and it is going well. 

She is going to use this loan to stock her store more. She will buy rice, sugar, oil, detergent, meats and other staple products. She has been in a borrower group for three years, and she has liked the unity of the group – and that the loans are much quicker and easier without as many documents. Her goals are to continue advancing her business and grow her store more every day.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, detergent, meats and other staple products.

loans.name: Dina Raquel

texts.es:
Dina Raquel es una señorita de 20 años, ella es soltera, se destaca dentro de su familia porque es una persona muy responsable con sus acciones, Dina Raquel vive en una comunidad de San Andrés Semetabaj junto a sus padres y hermanos.

Dina es una persona  muy soñadora  para prosperar en su vida,  pues actualmente ella trabaja  con una familia en la 
comunidad donde vive, haciendo oficios domésticos, Dina  con este trabajo genera su economía, ella cerro sus estudios del  diversificado, pero por escases de trabajo enfocado a su profesión, ahora trabajo como ama de casa, pues no tiene problemas en desempeñar este trabajo, porque desde pequeña su mamá le enseño esta actividad.

Dina quiere continuar con su preparación académica, estudiando en la universidad, pues para poder cubrir los gastos  universitarios para estos dos semestres del año, ella  solicita un prestamo de tres mil quetzales y con este dinero ella estaría pagando por anticipado el primer semestre y este sería un reto para ella para no dejar la universidad,  para que Dina pueda pagar el prestamo, tendrá que ser muy disciplinada con su horario para que pueda responder en ambos lados.
Las aspiraciones en el futuro de Dina es, seguir la carrera universitaria hasta graduarse y después construir su propia casa donde vivir.
texts.en:
Dina Raquel is a 20 year-old young woman. She is single. She shines in her family because she is a very responsible person. Dina Raquel lives in a community in San Andrés Semetabaj with her parents and her siblings. 

Dina is a person who dreams of succeeding in her life. She currently works with a family in her community doing domestic work. Dina earns her living with this work. She has completed secondary school, but due to a shortage of work in her profession, she now works as a housekeeper. She has no trouble doing this work because her mother taught her how to do it from a very young age.

Dina wants to continue with her academic preparation by studying at the university. To cover the costs for these two semesters a year she is requesting a loan of three thousand quetzales. 

She would pay in advance for the first semester with this money and this would provide her with a challenge not to leave the university. To pay back the loan, Dina will have to be very disciplined with her schedule so that she can be present both places. Dina’s aspiration for the future is to pursue her studies until she graduates from the university and then to build and live in her own home.

loans.use: to cover education costs.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is 39 years old and widowed with five children, four of whom are still in school. Melanie works very hard to provide for them.

Melanie runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell like canned goods, shampoo, noodles, spices, coffee, milk, and sugar.

Melanie has been in this business for 4 years.

She would like to save enough money so that she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell like canned goods, shampoo, noodles, spices, coffee, milk, and sugar.

loans.name: Melania

texts.en:
Melania is 49 years old and has two children.  She is married and has one child who is still in school.

Melania is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Melania has been doing this business for four years now, and has borrowed one time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Aniceta

texts.en:
Aniceta is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a dried fish vending business in the Philippines and earns additional income from fermented fish. Aniceta is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF in order to buy more dried fish to sell to her customers.
