Aniceta has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Jessenia Maribel

texts.es:
Olmedo es considerado un cantón ganadero, pero por el hecho de que un gran porcentaje de los campesinos siembran arroz y maíz, se lo considera como “el granero de Manabí”. Los platos típicos de la zona son: viche de maní con pescado de río, picadillo de carne con fréjol y estofado de gallina criolla.
En este lugar vive la señora Jessenia, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 12, 7 y 5  años de edad. Su esposo es ebanista y viven en casa de familiares.
Doña Jessenia es una muy  buena esposa que trata de ayudarle a su esposo con la dura carga del hogar, ella realiza los créditos para que él  utilice en su trabajo, él tiene una pequeña ebanistería donde trabaja con la ayuda de su esposa en la cual realiza puertas, camas, muebles, sillas, etc.  el local está en la misma casa por trece años y es conocido en la zona por su buen trabajo, trabaja todos los días, le va muy bien y tiene bastante acogida. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar madera, pinturas, herramientas, etc. para los contratos adquiridos. Lleva dos años con el  Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por los beneficios que la Fundación le da. Sus sueños es tener casa propia.
texts.en:
Olmedo is considered ranching country, but since many of its people grow rice and corn, it is considered "the breadbasket of Manabí". Traditional dishes of the area are viche de maní con pescado de río (peanut soup with river fish), picadillo de carne con fréjol (beef and bean soup), and estofado de gallina criolla (chicken stew). 

This is where Jessenia lives. She is married and she and her husband have three children, ages 12, 7 and 5. Her husband is a carpenter and they live with family.

Miss Jessenia is a very good wife and trying to help her husband out with the tough responsibility of taking care of the home. She is taking the loan for him to use for his work. He has a small woodworking workshop where he works with her help, and where he makes doors, beds, furniture, chairs, etc. The business has been in the same house for thirteen years and is known in the area for its good work. It is open every day, is going well, and is very welcoming. 

This loan is going to be used to buy wood, paint, tools, etc. for work taken on. Jessenia has been with Grupo de Credito [Credit Group] for two years and she likes it for the benefits Fundación provides. Their dream is to have their own house.

loans.use: to buy wood, paint, tools, etc.

loans.name: Luz Angelica

texts.es:
Luz Angélica tiene 32 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia ubicada en una zona rural del centro poblado de Nueva Arica que se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito se desarrolla tranquilamente, los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Luz Angélica se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, realiza esta actividad desde hace 10 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio. Cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de cerdos, patos, cuyes, gallinas, entre otros, así como alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto ella espera diversificar su stock y asi poder cumplir con todos los gustos de sus clientes, lo que le va a permitir captar nuevos clientes, aumentar sus ingresos, mejorar sus ganancias y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Luz Angélica is 32 years old. She lives with her partner in their own house, located in a rural zone of the population center of Nueva Arica, which is located in the district of Cayaltí, in the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. Life in this district is peaceful. The people work in agriculture, livestock raising, and commerce.

Luz Angélica raises and sells pigs. She has had this business for 10 years. Her business is located behind her home. She has experience in this business and has regular customers in the zone who offer very good personal and work references. The loan will be for the purchase of a greater quantity of pigs, ducks, guinea pigs, and hens, among other animals, as well as balanced feed for them. With this she hopes to diversify her stock and thus be able to satisfy all the preferences of her customers, which will allow her to attract new customers, increase her income, improve her earnings and in the end her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of pigs, ducks, guinea pigs, and hens, among other animals, as well as balanced feed for them.

loans.name: Myra

texts.en:
Myra works hard to support her family. Myra is single and has a buy and sell of frozen foods business in the Philippines.

Myra requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more frozen food to sell like hot dogs and other frozen foods.

Myra has been in this business for one year now.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of his family.

loans.use: to purchase more frozen food to sell like hot dogs and longganisa

loans.name: Medelyn

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Medelyn works hard to support her family.

She has an electrical supplies business in the Philippines and earns additional income from food vending and a general store businesses. Medelyn is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy additional stocks of electrical supplies to sell.

Medelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of electrical supplies to sell.

loans.name: Janneth

texts.es:
Janeth es una mujer casada, responsable, amorosa, con gran sentido de pertenencia y muy correcta, es madre de dos hijos de 15 y 2 años de edad y fue su sentido de responsabilidad por sus dos criaturas la que la llevaron a iniciar un negocio de miscelánea donde oferta servicios de impresión, fotocopiadora, además que vende algunos artículos de papelería y dulces. 
Como su negocio mejora, quiere invertirle y volverlo cada día mejor, es muy consciente que carece de muchos productos, de decoración de pintura y son estos motivos lo que la llevan a pedir un préstamo para cubrir esta falencia e ir dándole poco a poco mas forma a su negocio, mejor presentación y mayor oferta al cliente.
texts.en:
Janeth is a married woman, responsible and loving, very proper with a great sense of community. She is the mother of two children of 15 and 12 years of age. It was the feeling of responsibility for her two babies that lead her to start her own general store where she offers printing and photocopying services, in addition to selling some stationery supplies and sweets.

As her business improves she wants to invest in and improve it every day. She is very conscious of lacking many products like paint decorations. These are the motivations that lead her to request a loan to address this shortcoming and to gradually give more form to her business, a better presentation and more on offer for the customer.

loans.use: to restock a general store.

loans.name: Sherley Azucena

texts.es:
Olmedo es considerado un cantón ganadero, pero por el hecho de que un gran porcentaje de los campesinos siembran arroz y maíz, se lo considera como “el granero de Manabí”. Los platos típicos de la zona son: viche de maní con pescado de río, picadillo de carne con fréjol y estofado de gallina criolla.
En este lugar vive la señora Azucena, tiene 62  años de edad, es divorciada  y de esta relación tienen  cuatro  hijos mayores de edad quienes tienen su familia y viven a parte, ella viven en casa propia.
Doña Azucena en su casa vende frutas y verduras, trabaja todos los días desde las  05h00 hasta las 14h00, ella se desplaza desde la madrugada hasta el mercado mayorista a comprar los mejores productos para poder ofrecerles el mejor producto a sus clientes, ella trabaja en compañía de un empleado o a veces su ex marido quien los fines de semana le ayuda a vender haciendo recorridos. Tiene este negocio dos  años.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar frutas y verduras, (zanahoria, papas, aguacates, tomates, naranjas, cebollas, etc.). Está en el Grupo De Crédito  hace seis meses en el Grupo de Crédito y le gusta por la unión que existe entre el grupo. Su sueño es tener su negocio siempre surtido.
texts.en: Olmedo is considered to be a cattle region, but due to the large number of residents who grow rice and corn it is called "the granary of Manabí". The typical dishes of the region are peanut soup with river fish, ground meat with beans, and Creole chicken stew. Azucena lives here. She is 62 years old and is divorced. She has four grown children from her marriage who live on their own. She lives in her own home. Azucena sells fruit and vegetables from her home. She works every day from 5:00 am until 2:00 pm. She goes out early to the wholesale market to buy the best produce to offer to her customers. She works with an employee, and sometimes with her ex-husband, who helps her on the weekends with her route. She has had this business for two years. This loan will be used to buy fruit and vegetables (carrots, potatoes, avocados, tomatoes, oranges, onions, etc.). She has been in the credit group for six months, and she likes it because of the solidarity that exists within the group. Her dream is to have her business constantly supplied.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Joselo

texts.es:
Joselo tiene 50 años de edad, vive en casa propia en la provincia de Cutervo que se encuentra ubicado en la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú. La población se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de café y tubérculos, crianza de animales menores y comercio de los mismos.

El se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como arroz, menestras, fideos, aceite, leche, entre otros, así como ollas, depositos de plásticos y ropa, realiza esta actividad desde hace 5 años, contando con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de mercadería como arroz, azúcar, aceite, leche, entre otros, para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Joselo tendrá mayores ingresos y podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Joselo is 50 years old and lives in his house in the province of Cutervo, which is in the region of Cajamarca, in the northern mountains of Peru. The people are farmers, mainly of coffee and tubers, and raise and sell small animals.

Joselo sells groceries such as rice, vegetable soup, noodles, oil, milk, etc. He also sells pots, plastic storage containers, and clothes. He has been doing this for 5 years. He has a lot of experience in the business, and good personal and work references in his area. 

The loan will be used to buy more goods such as rice, sugar, oil, milk, etc., in order to increase the stock at his business so he will have greater income and be able to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more goods such as rice, sugar, oil, milk, etc., to increase the stock at his business.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is a 49-year-old married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Rebecca has a dried fish business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more boxes of dried fish to sell.

Rebecca has been in this business for 26 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more boxes of dried fish to sell

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
Fernando es un hombre muy disciplinado con su trabajo y con su familia, él tiene 32 años es casado tiene una bonita familia, ellos viven en una comunidad de Sololá. 
Fernando es una persona que tiene una visión muy clara, pues él trabaja con toda sus energías  para generar su economía  él trabaja fuera de su comunidad,  esto lo hace porque el salario es favorable, pues él trabaja para una tienda de consumo diario.
Fernando con los conocimientos adquiridos, él logro instalar su propia tienda en su comunidad hace 7 años, es de esa manera Fernando ha progresado con su familia, dándoles mejores condiciones de vida y lo ideal es tener lo esencial. 
Pues Fernando lo que busca es agrandar su tienda, pero no cuenta con suficiente capital  para hacerlo, es por eso que él busca un prestamo  de seis mil quetzales para comparar más producto  El anhelo de Fernando es tener bastante producto y satisfacer a su clientela.  Fernando tiene esperanzas que este negocio prosperara y con los ingresos pagara su prestamo.
texts.en:
Fernando is a man who is very disciplined with his work and with his family. He is 32 years old. He is married and has a lovely family. They live in a community of Sololá.

Fernando is a person who has a very clear vision, since he works with all his energy to generate his income. He works outside of his community. He does this because the salary is favorable, since he works for a store with products for daily use.

Fernando, with the knowledge he has acquired, managed to set up his own store in his community seven years ago. It is in this way that Fernando has progressed with his family, giving them better living conditions, and the ideal is to have the essential.

Now what Fernando is seeking is to expand his store, but he doesn't have sufficient capital to do it. It is for this reason that he is seeking a loan of six thousand quetzales to buy more products. Fernando's goal is to have sufficient products and to satisfy his customers. Fernando hopes that this business will prosper and with the income he will pay off his loan.

loans.use: to buy groceries for his store.

loans.name: Arsenia

texts.en:
As a married mother of five children, Arsenia works hard to support her family.

She has a dried fish business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from fermented fish and food vending businesses. Arsenia is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy more stock of dried fish to sell.

Arsenia has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Ma. Rosaly

texts.en:
Ma. Rosaly is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Ma. Rosaly is 36 years old and has two children who are still in school.

Ma. Rosaly has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of rice to sell.

Ma. Rosaly has been in this business for three years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 50 years old and single.

Jocelyn runs a grocery store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stock of goods to sell.

Jocelyn has been in this business for 22 years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future, Jocelyn would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of goods to sell.

loans.name: Hermenegildo

texts.es:
Hermenegildo es un hombre muy reconocido por su comunidad por ser una persona amable, él tiene 37 años, vive en una comunidad de Sololá conocida como Chaquijya.
Hermenegildo es un señor que le encanta trabajar con la agricultura y es más con esa actividad genera su economía,  pues Hermenegildo ha logrado progresar con su familia, por los préstamos que ha adquirido en esta institución, porque ha tenido capital de trabajo a su alcance, para su cultivo, le gusta adquirir créditos en ADICLA por la rapidez en que lo atienden y porque tiene créditos agrícolas y esto viene a beneficiar a los agricultores. 
Pues esta vez nuevamente solicita un prestamo que le servirá para comprar semillas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de zanahoria,  la meta de Hermenegildo es tener el prestamo  lo más rápido para que pueda empezar a labrar la tierra y cultivar en la época indicada. 
Hermenegildo, además de ser agricultor tiene otra fuente de ingreso, a través de una tienda de consumo  diario, estas actividades han contribuido a que la familia tenga lo esencial. 
Los sueños de este señor es seguir luchando con el trabajo para que pueda seguir apoyando la educación de sus hijos y seguir con otros proyectos en beneficio de su familia.
texts.en: Hermenegildo is well known in his community as a friendly person. He is 37 years old, and lives in a community in Sololá called Chaquijya. Hermenegildo loves to work in agriculture. With this activity he earns his income, and has been able to make progress for his family due to the loans that he has received from this organization, which have allowed him to have working capital at his disposal for his crops. He likes receiving loans through ADICLA because they help him promptly, and because they provide agricultural loans that help farmers. He is now requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer for his carrot crop. Hermenegildo's goal is to obtain a loan as soon as possible, so that he can begin working the soil and planting in the right season. In addition to being a farmer, Hermenegildo has another source of income from a grocery store. These activities have allowed him o provide for his family. His dream is to continue working in order to support his children's education, and continue with other projects that will benefit his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for agriculture.

loans.name: Mai's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Mai, born 1984, is a Thai ethnic woman. She joined in the program of M7-MFI in January 2013. She lives with her husband and her two sons in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main occupation is cultivation and breeding, so the annual income is just enough to cover the family’s living expenses and pay for her children’s education fees. She has saved a small amount of money but it is not enough to buy fertilizer for the next coffee crop. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan for this purpose. 
	
She hopes the loan will help her family have good conditions to take care of the coffee field and next year the harvest will bring her family a considerable interest. She will try to find an additional job to work to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Bich's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Bich, born in 1982, is a Thai ethnic woman. Her family consists of three members including her husband, her son and her. Her family now is living in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main income is from cultivation and breeding, so the income after deducting all costs is just enough to cover the family’s living expenses and save a small amount of money. She wants to buy fertilizer for the next crop but that saved amount is not enough. Therefore, she really wants to borrow a loan to buy fertilizer for the coffee field.

She hopes the loan will help her family invest effectively in the coffee field with high productivity and this crop yield is half again as much as last year's crop. She will work hard to have money to repay the loan to M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Rosenie

texts.en:
Rosenie is a single woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Rosenie is 27 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Rosenie has a direct selling business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell like body lotion, perfume, shampoo, etc.

Rosenie has been in this business for one year. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of his family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell like body lotion, perfume and shampoo

loans.name: Ruby

texts.en:
Ruby is 31 years old and married. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Ruby runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell like shampoo, noodles, canned goods, spices, sugar, coffee, milk, eggs, etc.

Ruby has been in this business for eight years.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell like shampoo, noodles, canned goods, spices, sugar, coffee, milk, and eggs

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
As a married mother of five children, Rosita works hard to support her family.

She has a charcoal retailing business in the Philippines and earns additional income from fruits and vegetables. Rosita is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to buy more stocks of charcoal and vegetables and fruits to sell in her food stall.

Rosita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 12 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of charcoal plus vegetables and fruits to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma is 54 years old and married with five children, one of whom is still in school, Thelma works very hard to provide for them.

Thelma runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like shampoo, noodles, spices, canned goods, sugar, etc.

Thelma has been in this business for five years.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of his family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like shampoo, noodles, spices, canned goods, and sugar

loans.name: Ma.schuzerry

texts.en:
Ma. Schuzerry is 53 years old and married with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Ma. Schuzerry has an internet café business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy computer supplies for her internet café business.

Ma. Schuzerry has been in this business for five years. In the future, Ma. Schuzerry would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy computer supplies for her internet café.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is 47 years old and has three children.  She is married and has one child who is still in school.

Vilma is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Vilma has been in this business for one year now and has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of his family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Marilyn is 48 years old and has three children who are currently in school.

Marilyn has an internet cafe business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase spare parts and maintenance for her computer.

Marilyn has been in this business for one year. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of his family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and maintenance for her computer

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is a single woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Monica is 31 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Monica has a buy and sell of dried fish business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more boxes of dried fish to sell.

Monica has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of his family.

loans.use: to purchase more boxes of dried fish to sell

loans.name: Annie Rose

texts.en:
Annie Rose is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Annie Rose is 37 years old and all of her children are in school.

Annie Rose has a used clothing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more stocks of used clothes to offer for sale.

Annie Rose has been in this business for four years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more stock of used clothes to offer for sale.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 57 years old and married with six children, one of whom is in school.

Lolita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

Lolita has borrowed and paid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and earns an income from e-loading (mobile prepaid load) and vegetables vending businesses.

Lolita aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in her business and continue with her trade, which allows her to cover household costs and her son's expenses.

loans.name: Las Rosalinas Group

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal LAS ROSALINAS,el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Lamay,provincia de de Calca y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Mateo tiene 68 años de edad tiene 04 hijos y es viudo, él socio alterna sus  actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura como cultivos de papa entre otros, él socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  este negocio  el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, él socio a la vez es artesano, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir  apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de abono entre otros.
EL socio se siente agradecido con el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
Los demás socios son artesanos.
texts.en:
Mateo is a member of the “Las Rosalinas” communal bank in the Lamay district of the Calca province in Cusco department, Peru.

Mateo is 68 years old and a widower. He has four children. As well as looking after his home, Mateo makes a living in farming, growing potatoes and other crops. Mateo has been doing this work for quite some time and it is going well thanks to the hard work he puts in every day. Mateo also works producing handicrafts. Mateo wants to be able to continue working in order to keep on supporting his family.

Mateo is applying for a loan in order to buy manure and other items.

Mateo is grateful for this loan and promises to make his repayments.

The other members of this group produce handicrafts.

loans.use: to buy manure and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in the purchase of clothing to stock her business and be able to improve her income for the well-being of her family.

loans.name: Juan Gabriel

texts.es:
Juan Gabriel es un comerciante de ropa y calzado de bajo costo, tiene un almacén el cual siempre trata de surtirlo con ropa de acuerdo a la temporada, una estrategia que le ha servido para mejorar su calidad de vida y consolidar su negocio pues siempre está cambiando de ropa y la que queda de temporadas anteriores la vuelve y la saca y así va rotando y tiene a sus clientes pendiente de que va a sacar.
Como se acerca la temporada escolar Juan quiere realizar un préstamo la razón es comprar mercancía como lo son calzado para niña y niña, son muy comunes los tenis blancos, para ambos sexos y las zapatillas para las niñas y los zapatos para los hombres, camisetas blancas, medias, abrigos entre otras cosas.
Su negocio brinda trabajo a una persona pero aspira a ser mejor empresa y poder dar otro empleo este año.
Con el crédito podrá seguir teniendo actualizado su negocio en temporada y aspira a que sea muy productivo este ya inicio de año.
texts.en:
Juan Gabriel sells low-cost clothes and footwear. He has a large shop that he always tries to fill up with seasonal clothing. This strategy has always helped him to improve his quality of life and to strengthen his business as he is always offering new clothes. The clothes remaining from the previous season are kept and brought out later. With the stock rotating like this, his customers are always waiting to see what Juan will bring out next.

With the new school year approaching, Juan wants to take out a loan in order to buy merchandise, such as children’s footwear. White trainers are very popular among both sexes, while pumps are popular with girls, and shoes with boys. White shirts, socks, jackets, and other items are also popular at this time of year.

Juan has one employee but he wants to have a better business and to be able to offer another job to somebody this year. 

With this loan, Juan can continue to keep his business up-to-date. He aspires to have a very productive start to the year.

loans.use: to buy stock for the start of the school year.

loans.name: Julian

texts.es:
Julian tiene 52 años de edad, vive con su esposa en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Querocotillo que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de maíz amarillo, cuenta con experiencia en el rubro y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de maíz así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Julian espera ofrecer un maíz de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Julian is 52 years old and lives with his wife in a house that owns. The house is made with rustic materials and is in the Querocotillo district, in the Cutervo province of the Cajamarca region in Peru’s northern highlands. Here, life is quiet and the people mainly work in farming, trade and cattle-raising.

Julian himself works in farming growing yellow corn. He has experience in this work and has good personal and professional references locally. Julian will use this loan to buy manure and fertilisers to look after his corn crops. He will also hire labourers for the harvest season. With this loan, Julian hopes to offer higher quality corn to his customers. This will have a positive impact on his level of income and will, in the end, improve his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to look after crops and to pay labourers to work during harvest.

loans.name: Aura Leonor

texts.es:
Los Arenales es una de las Parroquias de Crucita del Cantón Portoviejo, la pesca es una actividad económica importante para la provincia de Manabí, su gastronomía es muy variada, sus alimentos se elaboran a base de mariscos, plátanos, maní, entre otros.
En este lugar vive la señora Aura, tiene 53 años de edad, es madre soltera de tres hijos mayores de  edad, uno de ellos viven con ella y comparten gastos de la casa que es propia.
Doña Aura se dedica a la cría pollos en una pequeña granja en su casa, ella en temporadas compra una gran cantidad de pollos los cuales los cría durante dos o tres meses que es el tiempo para que ya estén listos para la venta, después de este tiempo los entrega a algunas tiendas en la localidad y también vende por libras y en pie a comerciante que llegan hasta su casa. 
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar pollos, alimentos y medicinas para los pollos.  Tiene seis años en el Grupo De Crédito y está muy contenta,  le gusta que le den créditos rápidos. Sus sueños es crecer y  tener una empresa.
texts.en:
Los Arenales is one of the parishes belonging to Crucita in the Portoviejo Canton.  The most important business in the province of Manabi is fishing.  It has a varied gastronomy and the foods are based on shellfish, bananas, peanuts, etc.

This is where Aura, 53, lives.  She is a single mother with three adult children. One of them still lives at home and shares the household expenses in the home which belongs to Aura.

She raises chickens on a small farm at her home.  She buys chickens seasonally and raises them for two or three months until they are ready for sale.  Afterwards she delivers them to stores in the area.  She also sells by the pound to merchants who visit her at home.

With this new loan she will buy chickens, feed and medicine for the chickens.  She has been a member of the communal bank for six years and is very content.  She likes the fact that the loans are so fast.  Her dream is to grow her business and have her own company.

loans.use: To buy chickens, feed and medicine.

loans.name: Evelia

texts.es:
Evelia tiene 54 años de edad, es casada, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y crianza de animales.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como leche, aceite, arroz, azúcar, gaseosa, art. de aseo, etc. su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con más de 2 años de experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de mercadería como arroz, azúcar, aceite, leche, entre otros, para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Evelia espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes satisfaciendo sus gustos y preferencias lo que va a permitirle generar mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Evelia is 54 years old, she is married, she lives with her family in a rural area of the Oyotún district which is located in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, in the northern coast of Peru. The inhabitants work in agriculture and livestock. 
She works in the sale of groceries, such as milk, oil, rice, sugar, sodas, cleaning supplies, etc. Her business is located in her home. She has more than 2 years of experience in the business, and has loyal clients who have good personal and work references for her. She is asking for a loan for the purchase of a larger quantity of merchandise, such as rice, sugar, oil, milk, among others, to increase the stock in her business. In this way, Evelia hopes to offer a larger variety of products to her clients, satisfying their tastes and preferences, which will allow her to generate a bigger income, and therefore improve her quality of life and of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a larger quantity of merchandise, such as rice, sugar, oil, milk, among others, to increase the stock in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy rice and other goods.

loans.name: Kelly Yelesy

texts.es:
Los Arenales una de las Parroquias de Crucita del Cantón Portoviejo la pesca es una actividad económica importante para la provincia de Manabí, su gastronomía es muy variada, sus alimentos se elaboran a base de mariscos, plátanos, maní, entre otros.
En este lugar vive la señorita, Kelly tiene 19  años de edad, es soltera y estudia el primer año de Colegio, vive con sus padres en casa alquilada, el papá es pescador.
Doña Kelly para ayudarles a sus padres con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ceviche de sardina o pinchagua, ella curte y cocina  con limón estos pescados y los deja listos para prepara el ceviche, después de este tiempo los entrega a algunas tiendas en la localidad y también a comerciantes que llegan hasta su casa, vende todos los días, deja a crédito y los días sábados y domingos se dedica hacer cobros.
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar sardina y limón para la preparación. Está en el Grupo De Crédito hace dos años  y le gusta porque las charlas educativas le han ayudado en su vida diaria y la rapidez de acceder a los créditos. Sus metas esseguir adelante en el negocio y ser una buena profesional.
texts.en:
Los Arenales is one of the parishes belonging to Crucita in the Portoviejo Canton. The most important business in the province of Manabi is fishing. It has a varied gastronomy and the foods are based on shellfish, bananas, peanuts, etc.

This is where Kelly, 19, lives.  She is single and studying her first year of college.  She lives with her parents in a rented house and her father is a fisherman.

In order to help her parents with the household expenses, Kelly sells ceviche made of sardines or pinchagua.  She uses the lemon to treat and prepare the fish which she sells to stores in the area and to merchants who travel to her home.  She sells every day on credit and collects payment on Saturday and Sunday.

This loan will be used to buy sardines and lemon for food preparation.  Kelly has been a member of the communal bank for two years and she enjoys the educational talks that hep her out in her daily life.  She also likes how quickly the loans are granted.  Her goal is to continue with her business and be a good professional.

loans.use: To buy sardines and lemons.

loans.name: José

texts.es:
José es un Señor  muy extrovertido en su trabajo, él tiene 61 años, vive en una comunidad de Sololá, conocido como Chaquijyá.
José es  un señor que  domina muy bien su trabajo que es la  agricultura y asimismo con esa actividad genera su economía,  José ha logrado avanzar con su familia, gracias a los préstamos que  ha adquirido en esta institución, porque ha tenido capital de trabajo  para implementar su agricultura, le gusta adquirir créditos en ADICLA por la rapidez en que lo atienden y  es más porque tiene créditos agrícolas y esto viene a beneficiar a los agricultores. 

 José sabiendo ya de las políticas de trabajo de esta institución,  nuevamente solicita un prestamo que le servirá para comprar semillas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de zanahoria,  la meta de José es tener el prestamo es conseguir su prestamo, para que pueda empezar a labrar la tierra y cultivar en la época indicada. 
José con las ganancias del primer prestamo, logro implementar otro tipo de hortaliza .Los sueños de este señor es seguir luchando con el trabajo para que su familia prospera cada día y alcanzar otros objetivos.
texts.en:
Jose, 61, is an extrovert in his work.  He lives in the community of Solola which is known as Chaquijya.  He is very good at what he does, which is agriculture, and at generating an income from his work.  Jose has been able to prosper with his family thanks to the loans he has received through ADICLA  which has given him the necessary work capital.  He likes the fact that the loans are so quick and geared toward agriculture for the benefit of farmers.

Knowing the policies of the institution, Jose is requesting a new loan to buy seeds and fertilizers for his carrot crop.  His goal is to have the loan to begin working the land for the new crop season.

With the earnings from the first loan Jose was able to grow other vegetables.  His dream is to continue his work so his family can prosper daily and reach its goals.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizers for agriculture.

loans.name: Viviana Monserrate

texts.es:
Los Arenales es una de las Parroquias de Crucita del Cantón Portoviejo, la pesca es una actividad económica importante para la provincia de Manabí, su gastronomía es muy variada, sus alimentos se elaboran a base de mariscos, plátanos, maní, entre otros.
En este lugar vive la señora Viviana, tiene 28  años de edad, es madre soltera de una niña de 13 años que estudian en octavo año. Ella vive con su madre alquilando una casa.
Doña Viviana tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa, ahí vende todo tipo de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras y frutas,  trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, su madre le ayudan en su trabajo, cuando ella puede y está desocupada pero por lo general es ella la que más pasa en su negocio ya que es ahí donde le gusta estar ya que además de ganarse la vida se entretiene y se informa de las novedades que pasan a su alrededor. Tiene dos años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir más su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Grupo De Crédito  hace dos años y le gustan todos los beneficios que le brinda la fundación. Su sueño es tener casa propia.
texts.en:
Los Arenales is one of the parishes belonging to Crucita in the Portoviejo Canton. The most important business in the province of Manabi is fishing. It has a varied gastronomy and the foods are based on shellfish, bananas, peanuts, etc.

This is where Viviana, 28, lives.  She is single and has a 13-year-old daughter in eighth grade.  They live with Vivana's mother in a rented house.

Viviana has a grocery store in her home where she sells all kinds of goods including rice, sugar, oils, detergents, legumes, vegetables and fruits.  She works every day from 6:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.  Her mother helps with the work when she can, but in general Viviana is the one who spends more time in the store.  She enjoys the work and also finding out about what is going on in the neighborhood.  She has been in business for two years and it is going well.

This loan will be used to stock the store with goods including rice, sugar, oil, detergents, sausages and other basic products.  Viviana has been a member of the communal bank for two years.  She likes the advantages of belonging to the foundation.  Her dream is to have her own house.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, sausages and other basic goods.

loans.name: Gulmira

texts.ru: Гульмира, 30 лет, замужем, есть 3 детей. У Гульмиры средне образование. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, с 2006 года занимается сельским хозяйством, начав этот бизнес с 15,000 сом (KGS). В хозяйстве Гульмира есть 3 коровы, 60 овец, продает молоко. На участке мерою 3,0 Га собственной и 6,0 Га арендованной земли она выращивает фасоль и клевер. Вся экологически чистая продукция Гульмира пользуется большим спросом и приносит хорошую прибыль в размере около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы для увеличения объемов реализации экологически чистого молока и минеральных удобрений для полеводства. Доходы от кредита Гульмира планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего бизнеса, чтобы иметь возможность достойно воспитывать своих детей.
texts.en: Gulmira is 30 years old, married, and she has three children.  She has a secondary education.  As the main source of income for her family, she has been involved in farming since 2006.  She started in this business with an initial capital of 15,000 som (KGS).  She currently owns three cows and 60 sheep, and she sells milk.  She also grows beans and clover on three hectares of her own land and six hectares of leased land.  Gulmira's entire organic production is in high demand and brings a good profit of about 10,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her farming business, Gulmira has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 100,000 som (KGS).  This loan will help her to buy a dairy cow (in order to produce and sell higher volumes of organic milk) and some mineral fertilizers for farming.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further expand her business, which will allow her to give a decent education to her children.

loans.use: to purchase one dairy cow and some fertilizers in order to increase the income she gets from the sale of organic farming products.

loans.name: Máxima

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD DE TAMBO REAL, la socia continua dedicándose al negocio de venta de quesos, manjares y yogures para todos sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia agradece a los inversionistas por el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia es una persona responsable, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de leche.
texts.en: The member belongs to the communal bank SOLIDARIDAD DE TAMBO REAL. She continues to make a living from her business of selling cheese, delicacies and yogurts to all her clients. The member thanks investors for the loan and promises to comply with the established payment terms. The member is a responsible person, this being the way she gets ahead. The member is asking for a loan to buy milk.

loans.use: to buy milk.

loans.name: Gulira

texts.ru: Гулира, 28 лет, замужем, есть 3 детей. У Гулиры среднее образование, 8 лет занимается полеводством и животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду и целеустремленности Гулиры, на сегодняшний день у нее имеется 1,0 ГА собственного земельного надела и 0,4 Га арендованного, где Гулира ежегодно выращивает фасоль для реализации. Также в хозяйстве есть 13 овец. Ежемесячный доход от сельскохозяйственной деятельности составляет 8,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулира обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) для покупки скота с целью дальнейшего разведения и реализации. Гулира намерена развить свой бизнес, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи.
texts.en: Gulira is 28 years old, married, and she has three children.  She has a secondary education and has been involved in agriculture and animal husbandry for eight years.  Thanks to her very hard work and her determination, she currently owns one hectare of land and leases another 0.4 hectare.  She cultivates beans for resale, annually.  In addition, she has 13 sheep.  Thanks to her farming activity, Gulira makes a monthly income of 8,000 som (KGS).  In order to further grow her farming business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 20,000 som (KGS).  She will use this loan to buy additional livestock, in order to increase her activity and sales.  Gulira really wants to grow her business, as this will surely allow her to increase her family's capital.

loans.use: to buy livestock to fatten and resale.

loans.name: Halimatou's Group

texts.fr:
Inauguré depuis le 14 Décembre 2012, les femmes du BV, il existe une bonne connexion entre les membres du groupe. Elles vivent dans le même village et entretiennent des relations de solidarité et d’entre aide. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce. 

Madame Halimatou, âgée de 60 ans (assise à l’extrême droite), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est veuve et mère de 02 enfants dont 01 garçon et 01 fille. Elle s’active dans la vente de lait frais qu’elle transforme en lait caillé.

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter 20 litre de lait frais par jour qu’elle transforme pour le revendre en détails.

Les bénéfices lui permettront de prendre en charge les besoins de la famille et de renforcer mon épargne.
texts.en:
These women belong to the "banc villageois," which was inaugurated on the 14th of December 2012, and have strong bonds with each other. They all live in the same village and maintain supportive and cooperative relationships. Their main business activity is retail.

Halimatou, who is 60 years old (sitting on the far right in the picture), is the group's featured borrower. She is a widow and mother of two children, one boy and one girl. She sells curd which she makes from fresh milk. Using her new loan, she plans to buy 20 litres of fresh milk every day to turn into curd and resell to retail customers. The profits she makes will enable her to take charge of the family's needs and to build up her savings.

loans.use: to buy 20 litres of fresh milk daily for curd production.

loans.name: Leocadia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD DE TAMBO REAL, la socia continua dedicándose al negocio de venta de leche para todos sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia agradece a los inversionistas por el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia a la vez continua dedicándose a  la ganadería, la socia es una persona responsable, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de leche.
texts.en: The member belongs to the communal bank SOLIDARIDAD DE TAMBO REAL. She continues to make a living from her business of selling milk to all her clients. The member also continues to work raising livestock at the same time. The member thanks investors for the loan and promises to comply with the established payment terms. The member is a responsible person, this being the way she gets ahead. The member is asking for a loan to buy milk.

loans.use: to buy milk.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD TAMBO REAL, él socio sigue dedicándose a la ganadería, el socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, él socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante  a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para hacer algunos arreglos en su establo.
texts.en: This individual is a member of the Solidaridad Tambo Real community bank. He continues to work raising livestock. He is happy with the loan and is committed to making his loan repayments on time. He is a responsible, hard-working person, which is how he supports his family. He is requesting a loan to make some repairs to his stable.

loans.use: to make some repairs to his stable.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es:
La socia Cirila pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD TAMBO REAL, la socia sigue dedicándose a la  ganadería y agricultura, la socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia continua cultivando papa, maíz entre otros, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar abono  entre otros.
texts.en: Cirila is a member of the Solidaridad Tambo Real community bank. She continues to work raising livestock and growing crops. She is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her loan repayments on time. She continues to grow potatoes, corn, and other crops. She is a responsible, hard-working person, which is how she supports her family. She is requesting a loan to buy compost and other items.

loans.use: to buy compost and other items.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es:
Ernesto tiene 47 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Querocotillo, una comunidad de clima variado, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de maíz desde hace 10 años, su esposa le apoya en esta labor, ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de fertilizantes y abono para el mantenimiento de su cultivo así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha, de esta manera Ernesto espera tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes, generando mayores ingresos para su familia lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ernesto is 47 years old. He lives together with his wife and children in the Querocotillo district, an area with a varied climate. Its people work in agriculture, commerce and raising livestock. It is located in the province of Cutervo which belongs to the Cajamarca region, in the North Andes of Peru.

For 10 years Ernesto has worked in agriculture and especially growing corn. His wife supports him in his work. He is asking for a loan to buy fertiliser and manure to maintain his crop and to hire workers for the harvest. In this way, Ernesto hopes to improve his production and have more to offer his clients. This will, in turn, increase his income and allow him to improve his and his families' quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertiliser and manure to maintain his crop and to hire workers for the harvest.

loans.name: Akossowa

texts.fr: Akossowa, femme célibataire de 52 ans vit avec un enfant et habite dans le quartier de Bè-Kpéhénou à Lomé. Akossowa vend des produits d’alimentation générale qu’elle achète deux fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé pour les revendre. Avec son dynamisme, elle arrive à tirer une bonne rentabilité de son activité. Pour acheter plus de sacs de riz et des fruits afin de soutenir ses charges quotidiennes, Akossowa nécessite ce crédit pour accroitre sa marge bénéficiaire
texts.en: Akossowa is single and 52 years old. She lives with a child in the district of Bè-Kpéhénou in Lomé. Akossowa sells groceries which she buys twice a month at the Lomé Grand Market and then resells. Her dynamism enables her to earn a good income from her business. Akossowa needs this loan in order to buy more bags of rice and some fruit so that she can meet daily demand and increase her profit margin.

loans.use: to buy a bag of rice and some fruit.

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr: Agée de 27 ans, Abla est une femme veuve vivant à Lomé dans le quartier d’Attiégou avec ses quatre enfants. Abla arrive à subvenir à ses besoins grâce à la vente des bassines plastiques et en aluminium ; elle achète les bassines deux fois par mois au Grand marché de Lomé pour les revendre et réalise de bons profits pour son épargne. Abla nécessite ce fonds pour accroitre son commerce et permettre à ses enfants de bénéficier d’une éducation favorable.
texts.en: 27-year-old Abla is a widow who lives in Lomé, in the Attiégou district, with her 4 children. Abla is able to meet her needs thanks to her business selling plastic and aluminium bowls. She gets the bowls twice a month at the Lomé Grand Market and resells them for a good profit which she puts into her savings. Abla needs this loan so that she can grow her business and enable her children to benefit from a good education.

loans.use: to buy 2 aluminium bowls and 2 plastic bowls.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD DE TAMBO REAL, la socia sigue  dedicándose a la ganadería, la socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia continua vendiendo leche a su clientes que le solicitan en las distintas ferias que se realizan por la zona, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante  a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de una vaca.
texts.en:
Martha is one of the members of the communal bank “Solidaridad de Tambo Real.” She still works raising animals.

Martha appreciates the loan she received and promises to pay the installments on time. She is still selling milk to different customers that contact her during the different regional fairs. This is how she gets ahead with her family.

Martha is requesting a loan to purchase a cow.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Walter

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD DE TAMBO REAL, él socio continua dedicándose a la ganadería, el socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, el socio llevas buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para comprar una vaca.
texts.en: This member belongs to the SOLIDARIDAD DE TAMBO REAL communal bank. He continues to work with livestock. He is grateful for the loan that was given and committed to making the payments. He has had his business for a while and it is going well for him thanks to the hard work he puts into it every day. This is how he gets his family ahead. He is asking for the loan to buy a cow.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Lorenza

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD DE TAMBO REAL, la socia sigue  dedicándose al negocio de venta de quesos, la socia está contenta con el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota, la socia continua elaborando los quesos para de esta manera distribuirlos a sus clientes que le solicitan, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de leche, quesos entre otros.
texts.en: This individual is a member of the Solidaridad Tambo Real community bank. She continues to make a living with her cheese-selling business. She is happy with the loan granted to her and is committed to making her loan repayments on time. She continues to make cheese and deliver it to her customers, which is how she supports her family. She is requesting a loan to buy milk, cheese and other items.

loans.use: to buy milk, cheese and other items.

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD TAMBO REAL, la socia sigue dedicándose a la ganadería, la socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia continua criando a sus animales para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solictan, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de una vaca.
texts.en:
Leonarda is one of the members of the communal bank “Solidaridad Tambo Real.” She continues raising animals.

Leonarda appreciates the loan she received and promises to pay the installments on time. She is still raising animals in order to sell them to different customers that want them. This is how she gets ahead with her family.

Leonarda is requesting a loan to purchase a cow.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
El socio  pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD TAMBO REAL, el socio sigue dedicándose a la ganadería, el socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, él socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, él socio continua criando a sus animales para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan, siendo  de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para comprar una vaca.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the SOLIDARIDAD TAMBO REAL communal bank. He continues to work with livestock. He is happy with the loan and committed to making his payments. He is a responsible and hardworking person. He continues to raise his animals to later sell to the customers that order them from him. That is how he gets his family ahead.

He is asking for the loan to buy a cow.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD TAMBO REAL, el socio continua dedicándose  al negocio de ganadería, el socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, el socio  continua criando a sus animales para luego venderlos  en las diferentes ferias, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para comprar una vaca.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the SOLIDARIDAD TAMBO REAL communal bank. He continues to work the livestock business. He is happy with the loan and committed to making his payments. He continues to to raise his animals to later sell in the different markets. He wants to be able to keep working to keep supporting his family. 

He is asking for the loan to buy a cow.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD TAMBO REAL, la socia sigue dedicándose a la ganadería, la socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia continua vendiendo leche a sus clientes que le solictan, la socia es una persona responsable, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de una vaca.
texts.en: This individual is a member of the Solidaridad Tambo Real community bank. She continues to work raising livestock. She is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her loan repayments on time. She continues to sell a lot of milk to her customers. She is a responsible person, which is how she supports her family. She is requesting a loan to buy a cow.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es:
María Esperanza tiene 35 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa familiar con su madre en el distrito de Cayaltí que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería.

María Esperanza se dedica a la venta de animales como patos, pavos y cerdos, realiza esta actividad desde hace 05 años contando con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El destino del préstamo será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
María Esperanza is 35 years old. She is single and lives with her mother in the Cayaltí district, which is located in the Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region of the northern coast of Peru. Locals work in commerce, agriculture and animal farming.

María Esperanza sells animals such as ducks, turkeys, and pigs. She has been doing this for five years, and has good experience, and good personal and professional references.

María Esperanza will use the loan to buy more animals and feed for them. This will help her to improve her income in the short term, which will in turn result in better living conditions for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy animals and feed for them.

loans.name: Rocio Karen

texts.es:
Rocio Karen tiene 20 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con su hijo en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería como actividades económicas principales.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral como gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, realiza esta actividad desde hace 02 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio. Cuenta con experiencia en este sector y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como cerdos, patos, gallina, cuyes, entre otros así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto Rocio Karen espera incrementar su negocio y satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes lo que tendrá gran impacto en su nivel de ingresos y le va a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Rocio Karen is 20 years old, and is a single mother. She lives with her child in a rural area of Oyotún district, located in Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the north coast of Peru. The inhabitants of this district make a living in agriculture and livestock, which are the main economic activities.

Rocio Karen raises and sells farmyard animals such as hens, ducks, turkeys, and others. She has worked in this for two years, and her business is located in her home. She has experience in this area and regular customers who give her excellent personal and professional references. 

She is requesting a loan to buy more animals such as pigs, ducks, hens, guinea pigs and others, and to buy feed for them. With this loan, Rocio Karen hopes to grow her business and meet her customers' needs, which will have a big impact on her level of income and allow her to improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more animals such as pigs, ducks, hens, guinea pigs and others, and to buy feed for them.

loans.name: Efreen Antonio

texts.es:
Responsable, entusiasta y trabajador son algunas de las cualidades que caracterizan a Efrén, un joven egresado en ciencias de la educación con mención en biología. Él se siente contento en su labor aunque en principio soñaba con ser médico. Sin embargo, poco a poco se enamoró de su carrera pues descubrió que tiene muchas áreas en las que puede mezclar con sus capacidades y habilidades. 
Efrén es consciente de  cuán importante es ir en la vanguardia con los avances tecnológicos y por esto, solicita el financiamiento para comprar una computadora, la cual le servirá para continuar con su crecimiento personal pues tiene planes de estudiar otra carrera. Además, considera importante mezclar la educación con la tecnología,  siendo el docente de adolescente, que son los nativos digitales.
texts.en:
Responsible, enthusiastic and hard-working are just some of the adjectives that could be used to describe Efrén, a young man who is studying education sciences, specialising in biology. He enjoys his studies although he originally dreamed of studying medicine. However, little by little he grew to love his degree, as he discovered that it has many areas in which he can mix  his skills and abilities.

Efrén is aware of how important it is to keep up with technological advances, which is why he is requesting a loan to buy a computer. This will allow him to continue his personal growth as he plans to study another degree. He also believes that it is important to combine education and technology, as he teaches teenagers, who are digital natives.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Maurilio

texts.es:
Maurilio tiene 34 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus 02 hijos en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 08 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de café así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Maurilio espera ofrecer un café de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Maurilio is 34 years old and lives with his partner and his two children in his own rustic home in Pucará district located in Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. Life in this district is peaceful, and its inhabitants mainly make a living in agriculture, trade and livestock.

Maurilio works in agriculture, growing coffee. He has 8 years' experience in this and excellent personal and professional references in the area. He will use the loan he receives to buy compost and fertiliser to look after his coffee crop and to hire labourers to help with the harvest.

With this loan, Maurilio hopes to be able to offer higher quality coffee to his customers, which will have a positive impact on his level of income and, in turn, improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertiliser to look after his coffee crop and to hire labourers to help with the harvest.

loans.name: Esmelin Antonio

texts.es: Esmelin, tiene 42 años de edad, esta casado, vive con su esposa en una aldea del Municipio de Trinidad Santa Barbara. Esmelin se ha dedicado al comercio con la venta de mercadería, como es ropa y achinería de forma ambulante. Hace un año decidió junto a su esposa vender golosinas y productos de la canasta básica en su casa, vende arroz, harina, azúcar, pan, café, sal, condimentos, verduras, productos enlatados y productos de limpieza. Con el propósito de mantener capital de trabajo para mantener surtido el negocio ha solicitado un prestamo por 20,500 Lempiras, con el cual comprará arroz, azúcar, manteca, jabón, refrescos, churros, frijoles, pan, huevos, verduras y otros abarrotes que necesita y poder aumentar las ventas. Con esta inversión espera tener mejor solvencia económica con su familia.
texts.en:
Esmelin is 42 years old and is married. He lives with his wife in a small village in the Municipality of Trinidad Santa Barbara. Esmelin makes a living as a street vendor selling merchandise such as clothing and knickknacks. A year ago, Esmelin and his wife decided to sell sweets and products of basic need from their home. He sells rice, flour, sugar, bread, coffee, salt, condiments, vegetables, canned goods and cleaning products. 

Esmelin has asked for a loan of 20,500 Lempiras in order to maintain his working capital and keep the business well stocked. With the loan he will buy products such as: rice, beans, flour, lard, sugar, soap, soft-drinks, churros, bread, eggs, vegetables and other groceries he needs to be able to increase his sales. With this loan he hopes to have better financial solvency for his family.

loans.use: to buy products such as: rice, beans, flour, lard, sugar, soap, soft-drinks, churros, bread, eggs and vegetables to later sell.

loans.name: Marie Angeline

texts.fr:
Mariée avec 3 enfants, Marie Angeline travaille dur pour soutenir sa famille car le revenu de son mari en tant que machiniste ne suffit pas à subvenir même aux besoins primaires de la famille. Elle a 29 ans. Elle possède un petit commerce de légumes et exerce cette activité depuis 2006.
Son prêt avec CEFOR va lui permettre d'acheter des différents légumes comme des choux, des courgettes,des aubergines, des choux-fleurs, des épinards, des concombres, etc.... et ceci pour que son étalage soit plus attirant.
Ce crédit va lui permettre de développer son activité, d'apporter une sécurité économique à son foyer.
Son but est de pouvoir scolariser ses petits dans un école privée digne, et à long terme d'acheter plus tard son terrain et construire sa propre maison.
texts.en:
Married with 3 children, Marie Angeline works hard to support her family because her husband's income as a machinist is not enough to cover even the primary needs of the family. She is 29 years old. 

She has had a small vegetable sales business since 2006. Her loan from Kiva's Field Partner, CEFOR, will allow her to buy different vegetables, like cabbage, zucchini, eggplants, cauliflower, spinach, cucumbers, etc., to make her display more attractive. This loan will allow her to develop her business and to bring financial stability to her household. 

Her goal is to be able to send her little ones to a good private school and in the long term buy a plot of land and build her own house.

loans.use: to buy different vegetables (cabbage, zucchini, eggplants, spinach...)

loans.name: Fanja Mireille

texts.fr:
Fanja Mireille est mariée, a 5 enfants dont 2 encore à charge. Les 3 autres enfants sont déjà mariés.
Elle exerce depuis 10 ans une activité de vente de friperie avec son époux.
Pour que les vêtements soient à la mode, elle tient à les recoudre ou à les retoucher avant de les revendre.
Son prêt avec CEFOR va lui permettre d'augmenter son stock.
Elle espère pouvoir réaliser son rêve avec son travail acharné:acheter un terrain et y construire une maison car en ce moment, la famille vit dans une maison qu'elle loue. Elle projette aussi d'acheter une machine à coudre surjeteuse pour améliorer la finition de la couture et renforcer ainsi son activité.
texts.en:
Fanja Mireille is married with 5 children, 2 of whom still live at home. The other 3 children are already married.

For the past 10 years, she has been selling used clothing together with her husband. To ensure that the clothes are fashionable, she mends or alters them before reselling them. Her loan from Kiva Field Partner, CEFOR, will allow her to increase her stock.

With her hard work, she hopes to realize her dream: to buy a plot of land and build a house because the family currently lives in a rental house. She also plans to buy an overlock machine to improve the finishing of her clothes and therefore strengthen her business.

loans.use: to buy more used clothes and shoes

loans.name: Lisy

texts.fr:
Lisy, 31 ans est une mère célibataire avec deux enfants, scolarisés à l'école publique. Étant seule, elle doit travailler dur pour soutenir sa petite famille.Elle vend des chaussures de sport depuis 3 ans. Ce prêt va lui permettre d'acheter 2 grands sacs de chaussures fripes pour augmenter et diversifier ses marchandises.
La bonne marche de cette activité lui permettra de réaliser son rêve de continuer à scolariser ses deux petits dans une école privée de bonne réputation et d'avoir une condition de vie meilleure.
texts.en:
Lisy is a 31-year-old single mother of two children, both of whom attend public school. Being by herself, she has to work hard to take care of her small family. 

She has been selling sports shoes for 3 years. This loan will allow her to buy 2 big sacks of used shoes to increase and diversity her merchandise. 

The success of her business will allow her to realize her dream to send her two little ones to a private school with a good reputation and to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy used sports shoes and sandals

loans.name: Dorothée

texts.fr:
Dorothée, 29 ans, mariée, a trois enfants de 10, 12, et 14 ans, tous scolarisés.C'est une femme battante. Elle exerce une activité de production de bobines de fil à coudre depuis l'an 2000.Elle a commencé son activité  en aidant tout simplement ses parents.
Maintenant, elle et son époux s'entraident pour assurer la production, la livraison et la vente des produits finis. 
Ils ont fabriqué eux-même le matériel qui effectue le rebobinage. Son travail lui permet de rester à son domicile et de pouvoir ainsi s'occuper à la fois de ses enfants, suivre leur éducation et préparer leurs repas. Avec le crédit, elle achètera du fil à coudre pour augmenter les stocks afin d'éviter la pénurie.
Elle compte épargner davantage pour subvenir à la scolarisation de ses enfants et aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Dorothée, 29 and married, has three children aged 10, 12 and 14, all in school. She is a driven woman. 

She has had a business of producing thread spools since the year 2000. She started her business simply to help her parents. Now, she and her husband work together to take care of the production, delivery and sale of the finished products. They made the machine used to rewind the yarn themselves. Her work allows her to stay home and take care of her children at the same time, to follow up on their studies and to prepare their meals. 

With the loan, she will buy yarn to increase her stock in order to avoid a shortage. 

She plans to save more to take care of her children's education and her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy yarn cones

loans.name: Joséphine

texts.fr:
Joséphine est une femme mariée, dynamique, travailleuse et mère de deux enfants. Elle a 28 ans.
Elle vends des ustensiles de cuisine depuis 5 ans puisque le revenu de son mari n'arrive pas à couvrir les charges familiales.
C'est par le biais de cette activité qu'elle a pu scolariser ses enfants ainsi que meubler sa maison.
Le crédit est demandé pour l'achat des différentes sortes d'ustensiles de cuisine comme des couteaux, cuillères, fourchettes,bassine, assiettes etc.
Ce crédit lui permettra donc d'augmenter et de diversifier davantage ses marchandises pour que ses étalages soient plus attirants. Elle pourra donc augmenter les bénéfices liées à la vente. A terme, son rêve est d'économiser assez d'argent pour avoir sa propre maison et être indépendante et autonome.
texts.en:
Josephine is a married, dynamic, hard-working woman and mother to two children. She is 28 years old.

She has been selling kitchen utensils for 5 years because her husband's income was not sufficient to cover the family's expenses. It is because of her business that she has been able to send her children to school as well as furnish her house.

She is asking for a loan to buy different types of kitchen utensils, like knives, spoons, forks, basins, plates, etc. This loan will allow her to increase and further diversify her merchandise to make her display more attractive. She will therefore be able to increase her sales revenues. 

In the long term, her dream is to save enough money to buy her own house and to be independent and autonomous.

loans.use: to buy stainless steel kitchen utensils

loans.name: Raharimalala

texts.fr:
Raharimalala,45 ans,a 7 enfants dont 2 à sa charge et les 5 autres ont déjà leur propre foyer respectif.Elle est une femme travailleuse
Elle vend des œufs et des viandes de poulet et ceci depuis déjà 20 ans. La plupart de ses clients sont des petits gargotes qui sont des clients fixes.
Le prêt va lui permettre d' acheter des œufs et des poulets supplémentaires pour quelques nouveaux clients identifiés et ainsi de développer son activité. 
Par conséquent, elle va pouvoir augmenter son revenu et participer à l'achat d'un véhicule pour son fils et pouvoir continuer à scolariser ses 2 derniers enfants.
texts.en:
Raharimalala, 45 years old, has 7 children. 2 of them still live at home, while the other 5 already have their own household. 

She is a hard working woman. She has been selling eggs and chicken meat for 20 years. Most of her clients are small restaurants, who buy from her regularly. The loan will allow her to buy more eggs and chickens for some new clients and to develop her business. 

As a result, she will be able to increase her earnings and contribute to the purchase of a vehicle for her son and continue to be able to send her 2 youngest children to school.

loans.use: to buy eggs and chickens

loans.name: Rosette

texts.fr:
Rosette, âgée de 46 ans, mariée, a deux enfants dont l'un adopté, tous scolarisés. Ça fait 14 ans qu'elle exerce son activité de vente dans une petite quincaillerie.
Elle a besoin d'un crédit afin de ravitailler sa petite commerce, elle va acheter des lampes économiques et spirales, des réglettes, des rallonges, différentes sortes de câbles, des compteurs et des résistances
Avec ce crédit, elle va pouvoir augmenter et diversifier ses marchandises et son étalage deviendra plus attirant.
Son rêve est d'avoir sa propre maison,que ses enfants puissent aller loin à l'école et pouvoir faire une bonne carrière.
texts.en:
Rosette, aged 46 and married, has two children, one of whom is adopted. Both children go to school. 

For the past 14 years, she has had a small hardware business. 

She needs a loan to replenish her stock. She will buy spiral-shaped, energy-saving light bulbs, fluorescent tubes, extension cords, different kinds of cables, electricity meters and electric resistors. With the loan, she will be able to increase and diversity her merchandise and make her display more attractive.
